class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_172171_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_172171'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_172171'>古木参天护碧池，青钱弱叶战涟漪。<div id='poem_sentence_0_172171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_172171'>匆匆游子匆匆去，不见风清月冷时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_172171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_172171'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_172171_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_172172' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_172172' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/172172?labeling=true' target='_blank'>白善坑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1151年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_172172")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_172172_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_172172'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_172172'>银须玉璞紫金精，犯难穷探亦有名。<div id='poem_sentence_0_172172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_172172'>白垩区区土同价，吴侬无事亦轻生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_172172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_172172'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_172172_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='aecd807fa030475c98e3725d6e7dfce2_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("aecd807fa030475c98e3725d6e7dfce2");'><span id='aecd807fa030475c98e3725d6e7dfce2_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1161&endYear=1161')">1161年</a>，36岁</div><div id='aecd807fa030475c98e3725d6e7dfce2' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1161&endYear=1161')">1161年</a>　在故乡，太尉刘錡为淮南、江南、浙西制置使，节制诸路军马，有贺启。作品：《贺刘太尉启》<div id='poem_1258255' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258255' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258255?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺刘太尉启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1161年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258255")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258255_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258255'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258255'>如苍生何，人喜谢安之起；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258255_comment'></div>果吾父也，虏惊郭令之来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258255_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1258255_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1161&endYear=1161')">1161年8月</a>　在故乡，为州守洪遵（景严）作《思贤堂记》。<div id='poem_1258315' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258315' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258315?labeling=true' target='_blank'>思贤堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1161年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258315")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258315_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258315'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258315'>吴郡治故有思贤亭，以祠韦、白、刘三太守，更兵烬久之，遂作新堂，名曰「三贤」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258315_comment'></div>其四年，当绍兴辛巳，鄱阳洪公始益以唐王常侍、本朝范文正之像，复其旧之名亭者榜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258315_comment'></div>先是，公以岁五月来临吾州，由州南鄙，望洞庭，略具区，观三江五湖之吐吞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258315_comment'></div>涛波聒天，旁无边垠，而石堤截然，浮于巨浸之上，若有鬼神之扶倾鲸鳌背负而涌以出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258315_comment'></div>暮夜，人语马嘶，匈匈不绝，公固已语其人，思常侍之功矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258315_comment'></div>周览原田，而相其沟防，东南之播于江，东北之委于海者，脉络酾通，堙芜涤涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258315_comment'></div>夏旱，易以陂，潦水时至，不能齧渚涯以决污邪，荒寒化为麦禾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258315_comment'></div>起景祐，迄兹岁，无大浸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258315_comment'></div>于是，公又曰：「非文正范公之勤其民者乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258315_comment'></div>退而参石记竹书之传，详两贤行事，尚什百于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258315_comment'></div>韩退之名知言，碑王之墓隧，谓治苏最天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258315_comment'></div>盖遗册廑存于一堤，其变灭无考者，不知几也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258315_comment'></div>文正自郡召还，遂参永昭陵大政，德业光明，为宋宗臣，通国之诵曰文正公，而不以姓氏行焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258315_comment'></div>韦、白、刘之馀爱，邦人既已俎豆之，语在旧碑，尚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258315_comment'></div>王、范风烈如此，且有德于吴，宜俱三贤不没，以为无穷之思，此堂之所为得名者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258315_comment'></div>尝谓士才高，必自贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258315_comment'></div>位高或不屑其官，世通患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258315_comment'></div>洪公，忠宣公之子，擢博学宏词第一，名字满四海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258315_comment'></div>馀二十年，既入翰林为学士，未几自列去，甫及里门，制书以左鱼来矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258315_comment'></div>邦人度公且上朝谒，莫能久私公也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258315_comment'></div>然始至之日，咨民所疾苦，退，然不自居其智能，亟从掌故吏访诸贤之旧，图画彷佛，想见其平生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258315_comment'></div>公既以道学文章命一世，顾有羡于五君子者，意将迹其惠术，讲千里之长利，以膏雨此民，彼憧憧往来，视桑荫趣舍人装者，虑安肯出此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258315_comment'></div>夫才高而不自贤，位高而滋共其官，盛德事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258315_comment'></div>斯堂法应得书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258315_comment'></div>会公使来属笔纪岁日，成大世占名数西郭，乐其州多贤守令之不歉于古也，文正公又吾东家丘焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258315_comment'></div>窃愿诧斯堂以夸邻邦，以为邑子荣，乃不辞而承公命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258315_comment'></div>八月既望，州民左从事郎范成大记并书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1258315_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1161&endYear=1161')">1161年10月9日</a>　在故乡，复为洪遵作《瞻仪堂记》。<div id='poem_1258314' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258314' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258314?labeling=true' target='_blank'>瞻仪堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1161年10月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258314")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258314_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258314'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258314'>吴自置守以来，仍古大国，世为名郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258314_comment'></div>又当东南水会，外暨百粤，中属之江淮，四方宾客行李之往来毕，上谒戏下，愿见东道主，城门之轨深焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258314_comment'></div>稻田膏沃，民生其间寔繁，井邑如云烟，物夥事穰，有司程文书应官府者以千万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258314_comment'></div>奉使命大夫行部第郡课，必致详于吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258314_comment'></div>以视列城，其雄剧如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258314_comment'></div>夜漏未尽，太守坐堂上，主吏傧客，旅进退，语言面目不暇相孰何，平明乃得据案听诸曹白事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258314_comment'></div>率常旰食有顷，它客与报期会者又至如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258314_comment'></div>虽精力过绝人，其势亦出甚劳，而后能善治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258314_comment'></div>故吴郡虎符，非名德士若已至大官者，不以朌去之，数十百年，长老犹以为记，至藏其绘像，畏爱之如一日，鄱阳洪公之以内相典城也，乃规东序之间屋为堂，取凡公私所藏故侯之像，颇补其阙遗，列画其上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258314_comment'></div>又采韩退之《庙学碑》语，名之曰「瞻仪」，而命州民范成大词而识诸石，窃尝观郡国方志与耆旧风土之书，既备载山川土疆郭郛所在，必论次前世贤守长爵里姓字之大略著于篇，谓君子尝居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258314_comment'></div>其地政僻陋，犹借此以为宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258314_comment'></div>今吾州不独能志其人，而肖貌具在，章绶相辉，凛凛如对生面，它郡未闻有此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258314_comment'></div>虽大府地重，多显者来，自有以不没，抑吴人习于亲上，至久远且弗弭，忘气俗之美旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258314_comment'></div>洪公盖始表出之，盛事固不宜无纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258314_comment'></div>然公实以绍兴辛巳夏五月至郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258314_comment'></div>是岁，北虏谋畔盟，积甲并塞，使行人来启兵端，又造舟东海上，将数道入寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258314_comment'></div>天子赫怒，大发步骑待边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258314_comment'></div>分命楼船将督水居之士营巨浸，以直贼冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258314_comment'></div>吴前当出师通道，后控海浦所从入，烽堠相望，羽书疾星火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258314_comment'></div>公声气弗为动，舂容颐指，不敛一钱，不籍一夫，机事立决无留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258314_comment'></div>行奸人幸骚摇一逞，心醉叵测，相率遁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258314_comment'></div>里门宴闭，田间无吠犬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258314_comment'></div>行歌刈熟，不知有军兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258314_comment'></div>民德公，甚念无以报恩勤，饮食必祝焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258314_comment'></div>公于艰难时，用剧郡，呼吸变故，曾无足以撄道德之威，齿文章之斧斤者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258314_comment'></div>治行冠一世，而不自以为功，若此足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258314_comment'></div>顾方帅其吏民，以馆御诸贤，览观裴回，若慕用之云者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1258314_comment'></div>夫有馀则毋我，不足者多尚人，君子之德心，岂世俗所能测识者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1258314_comment'></div>后之人历阶而登，有感于作者之意，畴肯以行能盖前闻人，其必葺斯堂而嗣其事，壁间之图，将鱼鳞杂袭，至于无穷可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1258314_comment'></div>敢并书之，以风来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1258314_comment'></div>十月九日，左从事郎范成大记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1258314_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='a81db879acaa47529da7e40e3bd11204_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a81db879acaa47529da7e40e3bd11204");'><span id='a81db879acaa47529da7e40e3bd11204_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1166&endYear=1168')">1166-1168年</a>，41-43岁</div><div id='a81db879acaa47529da7e40e3bd11204' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1166&endYear=1166')">1166年</a>　与王万登姑苏台，招王晓（浚明）、陈渊叔、耿鎡（时举、德基）避暑，复与耿、王唱和。作品：《顷自吏部郎去国时独同舍赵友益追路送诗数月友益得仪真过吴江次元韵招之》《丙戌闰七月九日，与王必大登姑苏台，招王浚明、陈渊叔、耿时举避暑，次时举韵》《明日夜雨陡凉，复次前韵呈时举》<div id='poem_173045' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173045' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173045?labeling=true' target='_blank'>顷自吏部郎去国时独同舍赵友益追路送诗数月友益得仪真过吴江次元韵招之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1166年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_173045")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_173045_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173045'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173045'>东风分袂省西廊，袖有明珠照客航。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173045_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173045'>道义有情通出处，文章无地著炎凉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173045_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173045'>君今犹把一麾去，我敢倦锄三径荒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173045_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173045'>邂逅天涯如梦寐，肯来相对话更长。<div id='poem_sentence_3_173045_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173045'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_173045_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_173334' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173334' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173334?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丙戌闰七月九日与王必大登姑苏台招王浚明陈渊叔耿时举避暑次时举韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1166年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_173334")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_173334_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173334'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173334'>始贺火流西，还嗟斗斜闰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173334'>馀暑犹强颜，新凉颇难进。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173334'>燥刚渴欲坼，焦卷秃如烬。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173334'>炎官扶<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_173334", 173334, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>日毂</span>，辉赫不停运。<div id='poem_sentence_3_173334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173334'>登临有高台，勇往得三俊。<div id='poem_sentence_4_173334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_173334'>仍将王郎子，飞步凌劫仞。<div id='poem_sentence_5_173334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_173334'>风从噫气来，云作坏山阵。<div id='poem_sentence_6_173334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_173334'>乡如垂头鱼，忽已蛰虫振。<div id='poem_sentence_7_173334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_173334'>空明晚逾清，更要孤月印。<div id='poem_sentence_8_173334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_173334'>书生乃易与，俛仰更喜愠。<div id='poem_sentence_9_173334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_173334'>凭阑天为高，举酒山欲近。<div id='poem_sentence_10_173334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_173334'>奇书铁钩锁，丽句锦窠晕。<div id='poem_sentence_11_173334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_173334'>兹游我辈独，难挽软红轫。<div id='poem_sentence_12_173334_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_173334'>君看笼中鸟，宁识咸池韵。<div id='poem_sentence_4_465195_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1167&endYear=1167')">1167年2月</a>　二月，居乡，为吴江县主簿高文虎建厅作《新修主簿厅记》<div id='poem_1258317' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258317' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258317?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新修主簿厅记</a><span class='authorDate'>（乾道三年二月一日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258317")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258317_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258317'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258317'>州县之任，古谓之宦游，岂直以斗升易农而已哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258317_comment'></div>名山大川，雄尊奇秀之境，从事其间，足以窥览观而昌神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258317_comment'></div>古之君子，固有乐乎此矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258317_comment'></div>松江，太湖水国之胜，当天下第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258317_comment'></div>四方好事者，想像其处，欲至而无由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258317_comment'></div>今行临东南，士大夫假道以奏名场，与夫商贾百族，棹船而逐利者，飙帆相摩，此其人皆有所期会，叫呼争先，乱次以济，终夜汹汹有声，其势岂能少留而一寓目，是虽日过乎前而与未始至者奚辨？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258317_comment'></div>余家吴门，莽苍在望，又无声利火驰之役，宜能数游，而躬耕作苦，正尔少暇日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258317_comment'></div>私念诚得筑室苇间，卜邻三高，以朝夕于斯，吾乐可胜计耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258317_comment'></div>乾道丙戌，八月既望，间从容泛舟垂虹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258317_comment'></div>主县簿高君炳儒，适新作治所落其成，余与观焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258317_comment'></div>盖自始役至是，财七十日，而闬闳高昭，牖户靓深，髹缋甓镘，皆中度程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258317_comment'></div>既聚庐之百须，无一可恨，而为之读书之斋，休坐之堂，修竹绕围，光景潇然，所谓垂虹者，乃在其旁数十百步耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258317_comment'></div>夫出有江湖之趣，居有清燕之适，此固古之君子宦游之乐，而余素愿朝夕于斯而不可得者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258317_comment'></div>炳儒之职，会计当而已，无催科敲扑之烦，奔命将迎之劳，而有可乐者如此，于是求文以为识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258317_comment'></div>余闻汉高士不为主簿，孙子严徙舍而有喜色，士未遭随所遇而安其可愧者，不在我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258317_comment'></div>炳儒有文学行谊，而不卑其官，又作意而新之，视祭灶请比邻有加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258317_comment'></div>其志固未易量，姑为叙其所可乐，以告后之贤者使共之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258317_comment'></div>明年二月一日顺阳范成大记并书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258317_comment'></div>左迪功郎平江府吴江县主簿主管学事四明高文虎建。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1258317_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1167&endYear=1167')">1167年</a>　居乡，严焕为建康通判，赋诗送之。作品：《送严子文通判建康》<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1167&endYear=1167')">1167年</a>　居乡，赵友益出知仪真，路过吴江，寄诗邀之。作品：《顷自吏部去国时，独同舍赵友益追路送诗，数月，友益得仪真，过吴江，次元韵招之》<div id='poem_173045' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173045' id='poem_sentence_3_173045_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173045'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_173045_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1167&endYear=1167')">1167年6月</a>　居乡，六月，作《三高祠记》。<div id='poem_1258318' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258318' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258318?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三高祠记</a><span class='authorDate'>（乾道三年六月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258318")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258318_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258318'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258318'>乾道三年二月，吴江县新作三高祠成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258318_comment'></div>三高者，越上将军姓范氏，是为鸱夷子皮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258318_comment'></div>晋大司马东曹掾姓张氏，是为江东步兵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258318_comment'></div>唐赠右补阙姓陆氏，是为甫里先生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258318_comment'></div>三君生不并世，而鸱夷子皮又尝一用人之国，功大名显而去之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258318_comment'></div>季鹰、鲁望萧然臞儒，使有为于当年，其所成就，固不可隃度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258318_comment'></div>要皆以得道见微，脱屣天刑，清风峻节，相望于松江太湖之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258318_comment'></div>故天下同高之，而吴江之人，独私得奉烝尝以夸于四方，若曰：此吾东家丘云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258318_comment'></div>邑大夫赵伯虚以故祠偪陋，将改作，乡老王份献其地雪滩，乃筑堂其上，告迁而奠焉，且属石湖范成大为之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258318_comment'></div>噫，不有君子，其能国乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258318_comment'></div>今乃自放寂寞之滨，掉头而弗顾，人又从而以为高，此岂盛际之所愿哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258318_comment'></div>后之人高三君之风，而迹其所以去，为世道计者，可以惧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258318_comment'></div>至于豪杰之士，或肆志乎轩冕，宴安留连，卒悔于后者，亦将有感于斯堂，而成大何足以述之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258318_comment'></div>然屈平既从彭咸，而桂丛之赋，犹招隐士，疑若隐处林薄，不死而仙，况如三君蝉蜕溷浊，得全于天者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258318_comment'></div>尝试倚楹而望，水光浮天，云日下上，风帆烟蓬，飘忽晦明，意必往来其间，成大亦何足以见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258318_comment'></div>姑效《小山》，作歌三章以招焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258318_comment'></div>遂从而歌之曰：「若有人兮扁舟，抚湖海兮远游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258318_comment'></div>众芳媚兮高丘，忽独君兮不可留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258318_comment'></div>长风积兮浪波白，荡摇空明兮南极一色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258318_comment'></div>镜万里兮鞭鱼龙，列星剡剡兮其下孤蓬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258318_comment'></div>眇顾怀兮斯路，与凉月兮入沧浦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258318_comment'></div>战争蜗角兮昨梦一笑，水云得意兮垂虹可以舣棹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258318_comment'></div>仙之人兮寿无期，乐哉垂虹兮去复来」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258318_comment'></div>载歌曰：「若有人兮横大江，秋风起兮归故乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258318_comment'></div>鸿冥飞兮白鸥舞，吴波鳞鳞兮而在下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258318_comment'></div>嗟人胡为兮天地四方，美无度兮吾之土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258318_comment'></div>脍修鲈兮雪霏，登菰莼兮芼之水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1258318_comment'></div>仙缤兮胥命，君可望兮不可追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1258318_comment'></div>頫倒景兮挥碧寥，娭燕息兮江之皋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1258318_comment'></div>菉蘋堂兮庑杜若，一杯之酒兮我为君酌」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1258318_comment'></div>又歌曰：「若有人兮北江之渚，披云而睎兮颒烟雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1258318_comment'></div>菊莎兮杞棘，岁晼晚兮何以续君食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1258318_comment'></div>偭五鼎兮腥腐，羞三泉兮终古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1258318_comment'></div>千秋风露兮归来故墟，月明无人兮苍石与语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1258318_comment'></div>牛宫洳兮生蒲荷，潮西东兮下田一波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1258318_comment'></div>访南泾兮邻曲，山川良是兮丘垄多稼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1258318_comment'></div>九畹兮今其刈，聊舂容兮兹里」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1258318_comment'></div>是岁六月既望，书遗邑人，使习以侑祠，伯虚请，遂以为记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1258318_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1167&endYear=1167')">1167年8月</a>　居乡，八月，作《吴令壁记》。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1167&endYear=1167')">1167年</a>　赴宜兴，与王葆丧葬事，有挽词。作品：《提刑察院王丈挽词（二首）》<div id='poem_173688' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173688' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1167&endYear=1167')">1167年9月</a>　居乡，九月，关耆孙（寿卿）出守简州，赋诗送行。作品：《送关寿卿校书出守简州》<div id='poem_173572' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173572' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_4_173572_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1167&endYear=1167')">1167年</a>　居乡，有次韵孙长文、耿时举、王直之之作。作品：《次韵孙长文泊苏州馆》《长文再作复次韵》《次韵耿时举王直之夜坐》<div id='poem_172236' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_172236' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_172236")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_172236_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_172236'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_172236'>读书窗下一灯残，忽有诗来为暖寒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_172236_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_465197")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_465197_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_465197'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_465197'>渚蒲汀蓼得霜残，归客思家不计寒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_465197_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_465197'>喜鹊门前人一笑，绝胜<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_465197", 465197, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>风色</span>候长干。<div id='poem_sentence_1_465197_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_465197'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_465197_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_172960' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_172960' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/172960?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵耿时举王直之夜坐</a><span class='authorDate'>（1167年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_172960")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_172960_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_172960'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_172960'>庭叶翻翻闹，灯花粟粟秾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_172960_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_172960'>关山千里雁，风雨满城钟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_172960_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_172960'>陇上<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_172960", 172960, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>新登</span>谷，江头旧熄烽。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1167&endYear=1167')">1167年12月</a>　十二月，起知处州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1167&endYear=1167')">1167年8月15日</a>　居乡，有文。作品：《吴县厅壁续记》<div id='poem_1258319' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258319' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258319?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吴县厅壁续记</a><span class='authorDate'>（乾道三年八月十五日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258319")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258319_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258319'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258319'>吴令壁有记，尚矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258319_comment'></div>唐大历己未，梁肃为之词者，令卢某所立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258319_comment'></div>石亡而文传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258319_comment'></div>本朝元祐壬申郭受为之词者，令许公辅所立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258319_comment'></div>石虽存而中更兵烬，破裂无几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258319_comment'></div>后七十有六年，晋陵袁君祖忠，政成将归，始治二石更刻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258319_comment'></div>又断自建炎以下，为之续记，实乾道纪元之三祀，岁在丁亥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258319_comment'></div>距大历垂四百年，而题名三立，相望可考，吏民以为盛事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258319_comment'></div>然吴之为壮县，固自昔志之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258319_comment'></div>气俗之美，生聚之繁，览观之胜，著于二碑者自若；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258319_comment'></div>独官事抢攘，日不暇给，必出于甚难而后能善治，视昔类不同者，非特吴为然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258319_comment'></div>余行四方，所过县邑数十百，见大夫皆厌苦其官，赍咨太息，悔向之来而忧后之不得脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258319_comment'></div>余私怪其说，甚哉，何至于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258319_comment'></div>及切磋究之，使一二其详，则曰：古吏忧民而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258319_comment'></div>今顾不然，蕞薾小邑负责犹数钜万，昼夜薄遽，唯钱谷之知，且不能报期会，有如一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258319_comment'></div>姑舍是而用力于民，不崇朝百适满矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258319_comment'></div>彼赍咨太息厌苦而欲脱者，真有味其言哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258319_comment'></div>今夫急催科则愧政，专抚字则愧考，兼善之诚难，若袁君，盖几于无愧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258319_comment'></div>其政先理而后情，弛例而举法，故吏不能并缘，士不敢奸以私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258319_comment'></div>民有讼，自揣不当胜，望寺门心醉，却去直者家居待报，曰无庸谒吏，明府自辩此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258319_comment'></div>坐堂上再期，人信之如一日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258319_comment'></div>至于大官之间，须求于不有，责课于非时，则又从容辩给，弗以厉民，率常最于他邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258319_comment'></div>呜呼，可谓难也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258319_comment'></div>旦莫去此，至大官，势益易于为县，其所成就何可量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258319_comment'></div>按《续记》所登载无虑三十人，而未有显者，必将自袁君始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258319_comment'></div>倘余言犹信，来者尚勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258319_comment'></div>八月十五日，左奉议郎主管台州崇道观范成大记并书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1258319_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1168&endYear=1168')">1168年5月</a>　居乡，升对，上论日力、国力、人力疏。作品：《论日力国力人力疏》<div id='poem_1258158' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258158' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258158?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论日力国力人力疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（乾道四年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258158")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258158_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258158'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258158'>臣闻自古建功业者，必有一定之规摹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258158_comment'></div>规摹既定，则以其力之所能及者，日夜淬厉以赴之，而不可分其力于规摹之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258158_comment'></div>所谓力者有三：一曰日力，寸阴是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258158_comment'></div>二曰国力，资用是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258158_comment'></div>三曰人力，思虑智术之所及者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258158_comment'></div>世事无穷，而三力有限，岂可分之于不急之地哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258158_comment'></div>臣虽疵贱，去国未久，固尝仰窥陛下神谟圣策，将大有为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258158_comment'></div>窃计复古之心，规摹已定，然而风俗宴安，期会倥偬，稽古礼文之事太繁，承平虚费之习未尽，日力穷于不急之务，国力耗于不急之须，人力疲于不急之役，皆非所以副陛下规摹之所欲为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258158_comment'></div>非旷然大有以损益之，恐不免于志勤道远之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258158_comment'></div>愿陛下与共政之臣，自治三力，专用之于所欲为之地，凡规摹之外，一切稍缓，俟大欲既济，复之未晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258158_comment'></div>昔越句践未得志也，早朝晏罢，非谋吴之策则不讲，自古能用三力，无出其右者，故功业卓然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258158_comment'></div>此虽陈迹，可以验今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258158_comment'></div>臣故并以为陛下献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258158_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1258158_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1168&endYear=1168')">1168年</a>　居乡，升对，上论慎刑疏。作品：《论慎刑疏》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1172&endYear=1172')">1172年11月26日</a>　赴桂林途中，有文。作品：《重修蒋帝庙记》<div id='poem_1258313' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258313' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258313?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重修蒋帝庙记</a><span class='authorDate'>（乾道八年十一月二十六日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258313")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258313_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258313'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258313'>乾道七年，诏侍卫骑军屯建康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258313_comment'></div>明年，枢密洪公自当涂守安抚本道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258313_comment'></div>乃行城东，直蒋山，得高亢地以为营，循山而北，以谒于蒋帝之庙，慨然念神之食于兹山千数百年，赫有灵响，辅世讨贼，前王赖焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258313_comment'></div>今貔虎万群，连营其左，折冲之威，神尚克相之，而祠宇陋颓不葺，何以徼福！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258313_comment'></div>于是选时鸠徒，治其庙，若神之百须，皆侈而新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258313_comment'></div>四月戊午告成，移书石湖之上，求文以为记云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258313_comment'></div>窃惟神之英烈，能杀身不顾，发灵兵间，漂疾无方，掀推逆凶，已敌先代所忾，至像设舆马皆有行色，可谓壮哉，可谓异哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258313_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258313_comment'></div>秣陵之盗不烈于焰天之寇，石头之逼不惨于旧京之禾黍，钟离之桥，邵阳之栅，不炽于中原万里数十年之氛埃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258313_comment'></div>神于其小者犹能奋其威怒，有此武功，宁独无意于稽天之大耻乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258313_comment'></div>尝试酌椒浆桂酒，酹神而问之，其必有不虚之报，以无负于洪公，公亦将合人神之助，崇建勋业，以无负于上之倚重焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258313_comment'></div>成大不佞，故志其远且大者以告神，且以复公之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258313_comment'></div>八年十一月二十六日，左朝奉郎、充集英殿修撰，新知静江军府事、提举学事、兼管内劝农使、充广南西路兵马都钤辖、兼本路经略安抚使、兼提举买马、吴县开国男、食邑三百户、赐紫金鱼袋范成大记并书，资政殿大学士、左中大夫、知建康军府事、提举学事、兼管内劝农使、充江南东路安抚使、马步军都总管、兼营田使、兼行宫留守、鄱阳县开国子、食邑六百户、赐紫金鱼袋洪遵立。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1258313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1258313'><span class='label'>按：</span>《景定建康志》卷四四，四库全书本。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1258313_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1172&endYear=1172')">1172年12月</a>　赴桂林，李洪有诗送行。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1172&endYear=1172')">1172年12月7日</a>　赴广西帅任。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='ef35b9471d5b491b956e68e61f57b3be_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>，52岁</div><div id='ef35b9471d5b491b956e68e61f57b3be' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>　将抵吴，亲旧来迎。作品：《将至吴中亲旧多来相迎感怀有作》<div id='poem_465220' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_465220' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/465220?labeling=true' target='_blank'>将至吴中亲旧多来相迓感怀有作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1177年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_465220")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_465220_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_465220'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_465220'>望见家山意欲飞，古来燕晋一沾衣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_465220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_465220'>回思客路岂非梦，乍听乡音真是归。<div id='poem_sentence_1_465220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_465220'>新事略从年少问，故人差觉坐中稀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_465220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_465220'>不须更说桑榆晚，霜后鲈鱼也自肥。<div id='poem_sentence_3_465220_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_465220'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_465220_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年10月</a>　入盘门。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>　在苏州，时乐备已卒，为文祭之。作品：《祭乐先生文》《代乐先生还乡上季太守书》<div id='poem_1258356' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258356' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258356?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭乐先生文</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙四年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258356")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258356_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258356'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258356'>维年月日，门生敷文阁直学士朝请郎四川安抚制置使范某，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于删定监簿先生乐公之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258356_comment'></div>呜呼，有如先生之间关兵烬，九死一生，孑然而立身者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258356_comment'></div>有如先生之学问攻苦，兼贯六艺，深醇而成全者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258356_comment'></div>又有如先生之甫上朝谒，突不及黔，忽焉数晦朔而翁媪相从于九原者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258356_comment'></div>呜呼，此先生身世则然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258356_comment'></div>又有如教诲成就，自童而习之，以至同升诸公，如某之托契于乐氏之门者乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258356_comment'></div>藐然远戍，万里来归，谓当复登堂受教，安知其忽焉楸行之下，拜先生之坟乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258356_comment'></div>有菲斯肴，恸哭以奠，其何能将追痛之诚，而酢平生之恩勤乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258356_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉，尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1258356_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258226' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258226' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258226?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代乐先生还乡上季太守书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1177年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258226")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258226_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258226'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258226'>孔子在陈曰：「盍归乎来，吾党之士狂简进取，斐然成章」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258226_comment'></div>孔子在陈，何思鲁之狂士？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258226_comment'></div>说者曰：如琴张、曾皙、牧皮者，孔子之所谓狂也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258226_comment'></div>虽不得谓之中道，而亦足以共学，是以思归而与之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258226_comment'></div>圣人之有乐于父母之国，而爱其乡里，虽其狂士犹且思之，使鲁国而有大贤君子为之师帅长上，可以主盟吾道，则孔子之归，当不待于在陈之时矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258226_comment'></div>伤鲁国之无斯人，而下至于思其狂士，亦圣人之不幸也已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258226_comment'></div>先某之去鲁也，漂流于外，二十年于兹矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258226_comment'></div>夫以圣人号为忘情，去鲁为未久，而在陈之思，有乐于父母之国，而爱其乡里若此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258226_comment'></div>况于漂流二十年，一旦而来归，诚可为客子之喜，而又适遭阁下辱临此邦，可谓有贤人君子为之师帅长上而足以主盟吾道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258226_comment'></div>则某今日之归，犹荣于圣人之归鲁，其为喜可胜既哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258226_comment'></div>虽然，凡羁旅之士，久客而归，归而遇贤主人者，其喜皆犹是也，何独某耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258226_comment'></div>顾某于此，窃又有私喜者，盖尝历数此邦之人，异时遭罹寇戎，肝脑涂地，其得免脱祸机，散而四方者，才十分之三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258226_comment'></div>就三分之中，其不饿踣槁死，与流为奴隶，而能澡雪抆励，自列于冠带之流者，又三分之一而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258226_comment'></div>就一分之中，复得不死，而当贤大夫为政之时，以其痛定之躯，归访亲邻，复游故乡如某者，盖无之而仅有焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258226_comment'></div>宜其较之众人，而窃又有私喜者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258226_comment'></div>复自思念，方痛未定时，形影相携，奉头鼠窜，去舒黄，并荆郢，抗章赣，下九江，登会稽，望海门，而弛担于姑苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258226_comment'></div>其间弓刀矢石，鍧天隐地，草窜莽伏，万死一生之场，与夫深山大川，荒陬绝境，警波飞石，虎嗥鳄暴，欹危震慑之险，以至于寒不丝身，饥不谷腹，穷困逼迫，偷生脱死之状，皆所备尝而饱历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258226_comment'></div>息肩吴门，复理旧业，幸得与当世英俊并游崇论，欲议其于天人祸福、古人成败、圣人行事、是非得失之端，又皆孰数淹贯于其中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258226_comment'></div>顾惟阁下，县邑遗民，虽上寿之老，垂白之叟，其间有能熟于道路，更于世变，老于时事而闲于道理，如某之不肖者，抑又无几焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258226_comment'></div>窃意阁下亦将喜某之来，又非特为某之私喜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258226_comment'></div>是以摄齐叩门趋庭以请见，迹甚疏而意甚密，交甚浅而言甚深，而不自觉其狂率焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258226_comment'></div>恭惟阁下以粹德懿文，翱翔籍甚，而此邦之政又称恺悌，诚恐一旦朝廷深知弱翁治行，促锋车以东去，而鳏寡之遂失职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258226_comment'></div>故某税鞅属耳，旅突未黔，而遽以求见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258226_comment'></div>郑谚曰：我有子弟，子产诲之，我有田畴，子产殖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258226_comment'></div>若某者，其亦可诲也乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258226_comment'></div>始叙其所以喜，终致其愿，安承教之私，区区之诚如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258226_comment'></div>不宣，某再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1258226_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='71935077c2674d7a9ff29819ca559f87_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("71935077c2674d7a9ff29819ca559f87");'><span id='71935077c2674d7a9ff29819ca559f87_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1180')">1178-1180年</a>，53-55岁</div><div id='71935077c2674d7a9ff29819ca559f87' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年</a>　居乡，作《灵祐庙记》。<div id='poem_1258313' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258313' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258313?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重修蒋帝庙记</a><span class='authorDate'>（乾道八年十一月二十六日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258313")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258313_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258313'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258313'>乾道七年，诏侍卫骑军屯建康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258313_comment'></div>明年，枢密洪公自当涂守安抚本道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258313_comment'></div>乃行城东，直蒋山，得高亢地以为营，循山而北，以谒于蒋帝之庙，慨然念神之食于兹山千数百年，赫有灵响，辅世讨贼，前王赖焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258313_comment'></div>今貔虎万群，连营其左，折冲之威，神尚克相之，而祠宇陋颓不葺，何以徼福！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258313_comment'></div>于是选时鸠徒，治其庙，若神之百须，皆侈而新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258313_comment'></div>四月戊午告成，移书石湖之上，求文以为记云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258313_comment'></div>窃惟神之英烈，能杀身不顾，发灵兵间，漂疾无方，掀推逆凶，已敌先代所忾，至像设舆马皆有行色，可谓壮哉，可谓异哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258313_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258313_comment'></div>秣陵之盗不烈于焰天之寇，石头之逼不惨于旧京之禾黍，钟离之桥，邵阳之栅，不炽于中原万里数十年之氛埃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258313_comment'></div>神于其小者犹能奋其威怒，有此武功，宁独无意于稽天之大耻乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258313_comment'></div>尝试酌椒浆桂酒，酹神而问之，其必有不虚之报，以无负于洪公，公亦将合人神之助，崇建勋业，以无负于上之倚重焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258313_comment'></div>成大不佞，故志其远且大者以告神，且以复公之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258313_comment'></div>八年十一月二十六日，左朝奉郎、充集英殿修撰，新知静江军府事、提举学事、兼管内劝农使、充广南西路兵马都钤辖、兼本路经略安抚使、兼提举买马、吴县开国男、食邑三百户、赐紫金鱼袋范成大记并书，资政殿大学士、左中大夫、知建康军府事、提举学事、兼管内劝农使、充江南东路安抚使、马步军都总管、兼营田使、兼行宫留守、鄱阳县开国子、食邑六百户、赐紫金鱼袋洪遵立。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1258313_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1258313'><span class='label'>按：</span>《景定建康志》卷四四，四库全书本。<br /></div><div id='poem_content_173678'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173678'>前年送君朝明光，今年送君还故乡。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173678'>锦官楼上一樽酒，万里阊门折杨柳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173678'>吴波沄沄蜀山苍，人生行路如许长。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173678'>相逢相送鬓如雪，人生能禁几离别。<div id='poem_sentence_3_173678_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1179&endYear=1179')">1179年9月9日</a>　居乡，游石湖。作品：《重九泛石湖记》<div id='poem_1258324' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258324' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258324?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重九泛石湖记</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙六年九月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258324")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258324_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258324'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258324'>淳熙己亥重九，与客自闾门泛舟，径横塘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258324_comment'></div>宿雾一白，垂欲雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258324_comment'></div>至䌽云桥，氛翳豁然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258324_comment'></div>晴日满空，风景閒美，无不与人意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258324_comment'></div>会四郊刈熟，露积如缭垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258324_comment'></div>田家妇子著新衣，略有节物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258324_comment'></div>挂帆溯越来溪，源收渊澄，如行波𤂱地上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258324_comment'></div>菱华虽瘦，尚可采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258324_comment'></div>舣棹石湖，扣紫荆，坐千岩观下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258324_comment'></div>菊之丛中，大金钱一种，已烂熳浓香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258324_comment'></div>正午，薰入酒杯，不待轰饮，已有醉意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258324_comment'></div>其傍丹桂二亩，皆盛开，多栾枝，芳气尤不可耐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258324_comment'></div>携壶度石梁，登姑苏后台，跻攀勇往，谢去巾舆筇杖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258324_comment'></div>石棱草滑，皆若飞步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258324_comment'></div>山顶正平，有拗堂藓石可列坐，相传为吴故宫閒台别馆所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258324_comment'></div>其前湖光接松陵，独见孤塔之尖，尖少北，点墨一螺为昆山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258324_comment'></div>其后，西山竞秀，萦青丛碧，与洞庭林屋相宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258324_comment'></div>大约目力踰百里，具登高临远之胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258324_comment'></div>始，余使虏，是日过燕山馆，尝赋《水调》云：「万里汉家使」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258324_comment'></div>后每自和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258324_comment'></div>桂林云：「万里汉都护」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258324_comment'></div>成都云：「万里桥边客」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258324_comment'></div>明年徘徊药市，颇叹倦游，不复再赋，但有诗云：「年来厌把三边酒，此去休哦万里词」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258324_comment'></div>今年幸甚，获归故国，偕邻曲二三子酬酢佳节于乡山之上，乃用旧韵，句云：「万里吴船泊，归访菊篱秋」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1258324_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1179&endYear=1179')">1179年9月9日</a>　居乡，与客同游阊门、横塘、綵云桥、越来溪、石湖千岩观、姑苏后台等处，赋词为序记之。作品：《水调歌头（万里吴船泊）》<div id='poem_358087' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_358087' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/358087?labeling=true' target='_blank'>水调歌头</a><span class='authorDate'>（1179年9月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_358087")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_358087_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_358087'>淳熙己亥重九，与客自阊门泛舟，径横塘。宿雾一白，垂垂欲雨。至彩云桥，氛翳豁然，晴日满空，风景闲美，无不与人意会。四郊刈熟，露积如缭垣。田家妇子着新衣，略有节物。挂马风溯越来越溪，潦收渊澄，如行玻璃地上。菱华虽瘦，尚可采。舣棹石湖，扳紫荆，坐千岩，观下菊丛中，大金钱一种已烂熳秾香，正午薰入酒杯，不待轰饮，已有醉意。其傍丹桂二亩，皆盛开，多栾枝，芳气尤不可耐。携壶度石梁，登姑苏后台，跻攀勇往，谢去巾舆筇杖，石陵草滑，皆若飞步。山顶正平，有坳堂藓石可列坐，相传为吴故宫闲台别馆所在。其前湖光接松陵，独见孤塔之尖。少北，墨点一螺为昆山。其后西山竞秀，萦青丛碧，与洞庭、林屋相宾。大约目力逾百里，具登高临远之胜。始余使虏，是日过燕山馆，赋水调，首句云：“万里汉都护。”成都云：“万里桥边客。”明年，徘徊药市，颇叹倦游，不复再赋。但有诗云：“年来厌把三边酒，此去休哦万里词。”今年辛甚，获归故园，偕邻曲二三子，酬酢佳节于乡山之上，乃复用旧韵。</div><div id='poem_preface_358087_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_358087'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_358087'>万里吴船泊，归访菊篱秋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_358087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_358087'></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_358087_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_5_173628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_173628'>长材屈小邑，果以循吏称。<div id='poem_sentence_6_173628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_173628'>独有故意长，问疾访姜肱。<div id='poem_sentence_10_173628_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_173628'>亹亹谈昨梦，一一记吾曾。<div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_173256_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173256'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173256'>好在驰烟路，平生载酒行。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173256'>摧藏身久病，契阔岁频更。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173256'>昨夜灯花绕，今朝稻把晴。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173256'>出门新梦境，触目旧诗情。<div id='poem_sentence_3_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173256'>水远推篷眩，天宽倚柁惊。<div id='poem_sentence_4_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_173256'>转湾添繂挽，罨岸并篙撑。<div id='poem_sentence_5_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_173256'>舫后装儿女，舻前酌弟兄。<div id='poem_sentence_6_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_173256'>醅香<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_173256", 173256, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>新曲</span>嫩，茗味小春轻。<div id='poem_sentence_7_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_173256'>红皱分霜果，黄蔫撚夕英。<div id='poem_sentence_8_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_173256'>缬林疏露屋，朱阁静临城。<div id='poem_sentence_9_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_173256'>桃坞论今昔，枫桥管送迎。<div id='poem_sentence_10_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_173256'>山腰<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_173256", 173256, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>樵担</span>动，木末酒旗明。<div id='poem_sentence_11_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_173256'>竟日窑烟直，中流塔影横。<div id='poem_sentence_12_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_173256'>数帆残照满，一笛暮江平。<div id='poem_sentence_13_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_173256'>㬠网枫边桁，牵罾柳际棚。<div id='poem_sentence_14_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_173256'>岫云萦石住，田水穴堤鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_15_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_173256'>过渡牛归速，穿篱犬吠狞。<div id='poem_sentence_16_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_173256'>鱼寒犹作阵，雁远更闻声。<div id='poem_sentence_17_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_173256'>急橹潮痕出，疏钟暝色生。<div id='poem_sentence_18_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_173256'>邻翁欣问讯，逋客愧寒盟。<div id='poem_sentence_19_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_173256'>一昨成归卧，于今负耦耕。<div id='poem_sentence_20_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_173256'>生涯都<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_173256", 173256, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>塌飒</span>，心曲漫峥嵘。<div id='poem_sentence_21_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_173256'>猿鹤休多怨，菰莼尚可羹。<div id='poem_sentence_22_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_173256'>药囊吾厌苦，扶惫且班荆。<div id='poem_sentence_23_173256_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_173256'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_173256_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年9月</a>　居乡，晦日大雪，念乡人御冬之计多未办。作品：《重阳后，半月天气温丽，忽变奇寒，晦日大雪，乡人御冬之计多未办》<div id='poem_173594' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173594' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173594?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重阳后半月天气温丽忽变奇寒晦日大雪乡人御冬之计多未办</a><span class='authorDate'>（1186年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_173594")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_173594_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173594'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173594'>狂飙吹小春，刮面剧剑铓。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173594'>云气泼浓墨，午窗变曛黄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173594'>六花大如掌，浩荡来无乡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173594'>青女正熟睡，不记行新霜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_173594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173594'>寒暑故密移，滕巽乃尔狂。<div id='poem_sentence_4_173594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_173594'>南邻炭未买，北邻绵未装。<div id='poem_sentence_5_173594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_173594'>敢论酒价涌，束薪逾桂芳。<div id='poem_sentence_6_173594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_173594'>岂不解蚤计，善舞须袖长。<div id='poem_sentence_7_173594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_173594'>频年田薄收，十家九空囊。<div id='poem_sentence_8_173594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_173594'>被冻知不免，但恨太匆忙。<div id='poem_sentence_9_173594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_173594'>今朝复何朝，晴色挂屋梁。<div id='poem_sentence_10_173594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_173594'>人物各<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_173594", 173594, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>解严</span>，儿童笑相将。<div id='poem_sentence_11_173594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_173594'>熙如谷黍温，免作沟木僵。<div id='poem_sentence_12_173594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_173594'>两邻报无恙，为汝歌慨慷。<div id='poem_sentence_13_173594_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_173594'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_173594_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1186&endYear=1186')">1186年冬</a>　居乡，雪中送炭与龚养正。作品：《雪中送炭与龚养正》<div id='poem_172638' id='poem_sentence_4_172967_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　杨万里使金，道中有诗见寄，次韵答之。作品：《同年杨廷秀秘监接伴北道,道中走寄见怀之什，次韵答》<div id='poem_173383' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173383' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173383?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同年杨廷秀秘监接伴北道道中走寄见怀之什次韵答之</a><span id='poem_sentence_0_173383'>昨遣长须迓诗老，人言已过阊门了。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173383_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173383'>梅边肠断傍寒溪，诗老官忙应未知。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173383_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173383'>何时真访山中许，已办竹深留客处。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173383_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173383_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　居乡，享受田园之乐，有诗。作品：《腊月村田乐府十首》<div id='poem_173699' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173699' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173699?labeling=true' target='_blank'>腊月村田乐府十首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>冬舂行</a><span class='authorDate'>（1189年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_173699")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_173699_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_173699'>余归石湖，往来田家，得岁暮十事，俋其语各赋一诗，以识土风，号《村田乐府》。其一《冬舂行》，腊日舂米为一岁计，多聚杵臼，尽腊中毕事，藏之土瓦仓中，经年不坏，谓之冬舂米。其二《灯市行》，风俗尤竞上元，一月前已卖原作买，据明本、黄本改灯，谓之灯市。价贵者数人聚博，胜则得之，喧盛不减灯市。其三《祭灶词》，腊月二十四夜祀灶，其说谓灶神翌日朝天，白一岁事。故前期祷之。其四《口数粥行》，二十五日煮赤豆作糜，暮夜阖家同飨，云能辟瘟气，虽远出未归者，亦留贮口分，至襁褓小儿及僮仆皆预，故名口数粥。豆粥本正月望日祭门故事，流传为此。其五《爆竹行》，此他郡所同，而吴中特盛，恶鬼盖畏此声。古以岁朝，而吴以二十五夜。其六《烧火盆行》，爆竹之夕，人家各又于门首燃薪满盆，无贫富皆尔，谓之相暖热。其七《照田蚕行》，与烧火盆同日，村落则以秃帚若麻䕸竹枝辈燃火炬，缚长竿之杪以照田，烂然遍野，以祈丝谷。其八《分岁词》，除夜祭其先竣事，长幼聚饮，祝颂而散，谓之分岁。其九《卖痴呆词》，分岁罢，小儿绕街呼叫云卖汝痴卖汝呆。世传吴人多呆，故儿辈讳之，欲贾其馀，益可笑。其十《打灰堆词》，除夜将晓，鸡且鸣，婢获持杖击粪壤致词，以祈利市，谓之打灰堆。此本彭蠡清洪君庙中如愿故事，惟吴下至今不废云。</div><div id='poem_preface_173699_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173699'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173699'>腊中储蓄百事利，第一先舂年计米。<div "Clauses/5/Comments/1")'>取将</span>仍疾走。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173760_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173760'>儿童却立避其锋，当阶击地雷霆吼。<div id='poem_sentence_5_173760'>十声百声神道宁，八方上下皆和平。<div id='poem_sentence_5_173760_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_173760'>却拾焦头叠床底，犹有馀威可<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_1_173498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173498'>二物于人谁独无，就中吴侬仍有馀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173498_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_173498_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_173350' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173350' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173350?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其十 </span>打灰堆词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1189年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_173350_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173350'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173350'>除夜将阑晓星烂，粪扫堆头打如愿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173350_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173350'>杖敲灰起飞扑篱，不嫌灰涴新节衣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173350_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173350'>老媪当前再三祝，只要我家长富足。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173350_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173350'>轻舟作商重船归，大牸引犊鸡哺儿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_173350_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173350'>野茧可缫麦两岐，短衲换著长衫衣。<div id='poem_sentence_4_173350_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_173350'>当年婢子挽不住，有耳犹能闻我语。<div id='poem_sentence_5_173350_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_173350'>但如我愿不汝呼，一任汝归彭蠡湖。<div id='poem_sentence_6_173350_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_173350'></div><div id='poem_sentence_7_173350_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　居乡，作《重修行春桥记》。<div id='poem_1258325' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258325' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258325?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重修行春桥记</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙十六年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258325")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258325_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258325'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258325'>太湖日应咸池，为东南水会，石湖其派也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258325_comment'></div>吴台越垒，对立两涘，危峰高浪，襟带平楚，吾州胜地莫加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258325_comment'></div>石梁卧波，空水映发，所谓行春桥者，又据其会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258325_comment'></div>胥门以西，横山以东，往来憧憧，如行图画间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258325_comment'></div>凡游吴中而不至石湖，不登行春，则与未游无异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258325_comment'></div>岁久桥坏，人且病涉，向之万景，亦偃蹇若无所弹压，过者为之叹息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258325_comment'></div>豪有力之家，顾环视莫恤，漫以委之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258325_comment'></div>前令陈益、刘棠、皆有意而弗果作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258325_comment'></div>淳熙丁未冬，诸王孙赵侯至县，甫六旬，问民所疾苦，则曰：「政孰先于徒杠舆梁者」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258325_comment'></div>乃下令治桥，补覆石之缺，易藉木之腐，增为扶栏，中四周而旁两翼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258325_comment'></div>岁十二月鸠工，讫于明年之四月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258325_comment'></div>保伍不知，公徒不预，邑人来观，欢然落成而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258325_comment'></div>今天下仕者，视剧县如鼎沸，屏气怵惕，犹惧不蔇，侯于此时，从容兴废，盖亦甚难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258325_comment'></div>四乡之人，不能出力倾助者，至是始有愧心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258325_comment'></div>则相与商略，他日将作亭其上，以憩倦游者，尚庶几见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258325_comment'></div>今姑识治桥之岁月，亭成，将嗣书云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258325_comment'></div>侯名彦真，字德全，旧名彦能，隆兴元年进士，擢第后改今名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258325_comment'></div>桥成之明年日南至，资政殿学士通议大夫提举临安府洞霄宫范成大记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1258325_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　封吴郡开国候。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年11月</a>　居乡，有改元贺表。作品：《改元贺表》<div id='poem_1258131' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258131' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258131?labeling=true' target='_blank'>改元贺表</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙十六年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258131")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258131_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258131'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258131'>春秋谓一以为元，日月重明而丽正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258131_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1258131_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年2月</a>　居乡，作《范村记》。<div id='poem_1258326' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258326' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258326?labeling=true' target='_blank'>范村记<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙元年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258326")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258326_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258326'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258326'>范村者，杜光庭《神仙感遇传》云：「唐乾符中，吴民胡六子与其徒泛海，迷失道，漂流数日，至一山下，即登岸，谋食居，人皆以礼相接，甚有情义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258326_comment'></div>问此何许？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258326_comment'></div>则曰范村也，当见山长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258326_comment'></div>引行至山顶，可十里所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258326_comment'></div>花木夹道，风景清穆，宫室宏丽，侍者森列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258326_comment'></div>一叟坐堂上，命客升阶，与语曰：『吾越相也，得道长生，居此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258326_comment'></div>岁久，山下皆吾子孙，相承已数十世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258326_comment'></div>念汝远来，当以回飙相送』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258326_comment'></div>比下，居人馈以粮糗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258326_comment'></div>解维，风便，俄顷达西岸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258326_comment'></div>时高骈镇淮南，闻之，招六子补六合镇将，始以所见为人言之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258326_comment'></div>光庭之《传》云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258326_comment'></div>惟吾家陶朱公用人之国，勋业盖世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258326_comment'></div>越之君臣，方将社而稷之，乃不俟终日，擢扁舟而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258326_comment'></div>迹其行事，天壤一人而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258326_comment'></div>世无神仙可也，有之，非公谁宜仙者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258326_comment'></div>《列仙传》又谓：「公常卖药兰陵，彼人累代见之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258326_comment'></div>范村岂其所定居耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258326_comment'></div>某奉祠还乡，家西河之上，距海财百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258326_comment'></div>追怀祖武，想像仙山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258326_comment'></div>月生潮来，悠然东望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258326_comment'></div>烟云晻霭，去人不远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258326_comment'></div>会舍南小圃适成，辄以范村名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258326_comment'></div>圃中作重奎之堂，敬奉至尊寿皇圣帝、皇帝所赐神翰，勒之琬琰，藏焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258326_comment'></div>四傍各以数椽为便坐，梅曰陵寒，海棠曰花仙，酴醾洞中曰方壶，众芳杂植曰云露，其后庵庐曰山长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258326_comment'></div>盖瓦不足，参以蓬茅，虽不能如昔村之华，于云来家事，不啻侈矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258326_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1258326_comment'></div>陶朱公渡兵江淮，震曜中国，分地以赐诸侯，功大名显，贵隆富盛，备福之极，度世而仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1258326_comment'></div>昔村所有如此，今无一焉，独不愧斯名乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1258326_comment'></div>虽然，公所成就固烈矣，而心危虑深，未及饮至舍爵，半途腾逝，变姓扫迹，以二十年之成谋而莫之一朝居焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1258326_comment'></div>某不肖，生值圣世，饕窃名禄，无以报塞万分，上恩天载，扶持全安之老而归休，犹得宿卫两朝，赐书于家林之下，婆娑日涉，常在云汉昭回中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1258326_comment'></div>荣光所被，燕及猿鹤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1258326_comment'></div>此则昔村所无而今之所有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1258326_comment'></div>侨立斯名，亦尚无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1258326_comment'></div>按周元王五年，越入吴，陶朱公于是去国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1258326_comment'></div>后千三百五十年，当唐乾符六年，范村之名，始闻于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1258326_comment'></div>又三百二十年，实皇宋绍熙初元，岁在庚戌，某遂以范村名其圃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1258326_comment'></div>上下垂千七百年，其传远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1258326_comment'></div>杜元凯谓范氏世为兴家，斯言犹信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1258326_comment'></div>后之人傥能长保此居，则村名之传，又不知其几世几年乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1258326_comment'></div>书之壁以示同姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1258326_comment'></div>是岁二月望日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_41_1258326_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　居乡，作《姑苏同年会诗序》。<div id='poem_1258276' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258276' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258276?labeling=true' target='_blank'>姑苏同年会诗序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258276")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258276_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258276'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258276'>进士科始隋，盛于唐，本朝因之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258276_comment'></div>偕升者谓之同年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258276_comment'></div>衣冠之好，由来尚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258276_comment'></div>唐人尤憙期集，燕设之名，亡虑十数，而曲江大会，长安坊市为半空，天子至御楼以观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258276_comment'></div>当此时，通榜之士，意气相予甚厚，否则有紫陌青云之讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258276_comment'></div>本朝略去浮侈，但存闻喜一燕而为之，同年之制则加详焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258276_comment'></div>既朝谢，揆日集贡院，奉赐第录黄于香案，列拜庭下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258276_comment'></div>礼毕，更以齿班立，四十以上东序西乡，未四十西序东乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258276_comment'></div>推年最长若最少者各一人升堂，长者中立南乡，少者下立北乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258276_comment'></div>春官吏赞拜，少者拜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258276_comment'></div>又赞答拜，长者洎两序皆再拜，谓之拜黄甲，叙同年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258276_comment'></div>所以明章风期，笃叙事契，委曲之意，过唐远矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258276_comment'></div>士大夫宁得轻负此意，恝然云散，异日相视，如涂之人乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258276_comment'></div>绍熙改元，建阳袁起岩、张元善俱使浙西，始以岁五日会同年之在吴下者于姑苏之台，登临胜绝，倾倒情素，献酬乐甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258276_comment'></div>赋诗相属，州里传写，一夕殆遍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258276_comment'></div>好事者杂然高赞，以为《伐木》之诗也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258276_comment'></div>起岩谓仆尝洿春闱，属为序引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258276_comment'></div>仆时位下，渠足数！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258276_comment'></div>独以亲见诸公贵名之起，又嘉二使君能修旧好，略记团司故实，以代扬觯之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258276_comment'></div>使凡号称同年者，闻风动怀，增重名义，或于雅道小有补焉，非直为一觞一咏设也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258276_comment'></div>二月望日，石湖范某书<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258276_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1258276'>庭下：原无，据「又见」诸书补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1258276_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1258276'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_20_1258276_0'>⑴ 《古今事文类聚》前集卷二九。又见《吴都文粹续集》卷四，《八琼室金石补正》卷二六，国家图书馆藏拓片·章专三五二，《范成大佚著辑存》第一六七页。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1258276_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_9_173401'>浩荡海山春，登临想臞仙。<div id='poem_sentence_9_173401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_173401'>笑我守荒径，<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_11_173401'>拟题忆鄞句，思咽冰下泉。<div id='poem_sentence_11_173401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_173401'>迟公寄新作，使我头风痊。<div id='poem_sentence_12_173401_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_173401'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_173401_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年12月</a>　居乡，作《双瑞堂记》。<div id='poem_1258327' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258327' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258327?labeling=true' target='_blank'>双瑞堂记<span class='inlineComment2'>（绍熙元年十二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1190年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258327")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258327_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258327'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258327'>绍熙初元夏四月，吴郡袁使君为政之再阅月也，长洲之彭华乡，以瑞麦献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258327_comment'></div>又三月，木兰后池以瑞莲献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258327_comment'></div>麦两歧，已坚栗可刈，歧间复出新苗，玉枝青葱，且秀且实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258327_comment'></div>后十日，又歧于新苗之半，亦秀实如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258327_comment'></div>按瑞图自两歧至九歧者有矣，未闻枯茎之稊，一再重出，青黄殊色而三颖俱茂，有生生不穷之意，盖创见云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258327_comment'></div>莲则共蒂异花，连理并秀，丰腴适相当，亦奇产也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258327_comment'></div>吏民欢喜，谓造物者效珍发祥，工深巧妙，非贤使君孰能致此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258327_comment'></div>又谓：使君辱临吾州，政尔煖席，而嘉瑞辄应，何其速耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258327_comment'></div>余闻神人精祲之交，其迹固相绝远，一念感通，则和同无间，直瞬息顷尔，固未可速计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258327_comment'></div>方使君持节按刑时，以柱后惠文绳，郡县弗虔，官吏累足，立逐捕剧贼，血其鲸鲵，风采烈于秋霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258327_comment'></div>朝廷第最课进，直中秘书，就牧此邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258327_comment'></div>吴人憺其威名，相与屏气惕息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258327_comment'></div>使君一日过范村，从容为余言：「向吾以衣绣持斧为职，知饬法锄奸而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258327_comment'></div>今为郡守，号称民父母，当有恻怛之爱，拊摩茕鳏，若乳保之于赤子，使百姓知吾此心，庶几有不忍欺者，虽蒲鞭且弗愿用，况于桁杨敲扑乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258327_comment'></div>余矍然起贺，曰：「公此心当与天通，人固未能户知，神者其知之矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258327_comment'></div>阅时亡几，而叶气薰翔，被于珍物，岂非一念之感，如鼓应桴，有不疾而速，不召而至欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258327_comment'></div>是岁秋，大熟，政成人和，庭讼稀简，郡廓无事，曩之蕲望于民者，皆如本指，益知祥应之不虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258327_comment'></div>于是部使者暨府县之宾佐，皆画图以传，赋诗以相倡酬，犹谓未足传久远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258327_comment'></div>且《春秋》有年、大有年，皆以喜书，今兹乐岁善收，瓯窭污邪，无不满望，二瑞实兆其祥，尤不可以弗识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258327_comment'></div>乃以双瑞名郡之东堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258327_comment'></div>余又为原其所以致祥者为之记，因以附见有年之喜，亦《春秋》之遗意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258327_comment'></div>使君名说友，字起岩，建阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258327_comment'></div>嘉平日，石湖范成大记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1258327_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1190&endYear=1190')">1190年</a>　居乡，杨万里来访。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　居乡，春日有感作诗。作品：《春日览镜有感》<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　游虎丘，有诗。作品：《再到虎丘》<div id='poem_172889' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_172889' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/172889?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再到虎丘</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_172889")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_172889_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_172889'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_172889'>不过溪桥又两年，偶随筇竹访幽禅。<div id='poem_sentence_0_172889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_172889'>有缘再踏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_172889", 172889, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>云岩</span>路，无处重寻石井泉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_172889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_172889'>拟辍半山分座住，先携一枕借床眠。<div id='poem_sentence_2_172889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_172889'>觉来饱吃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_172889", 172889, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>红莲</span>饭，正是塘东稻熟天。<div id='poem_sentence_3_172889_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_172889'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_172889_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1191&endYear=1191')">1191年</a>　居乡，为赵师𢍰 （从善）赋《白玉楼步虚词》。作品：《白玉楼步虚词六首》<div id='poem_173890' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173890' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173890?labeling=true' target='_blank'>步虚声<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>白玉楼六首</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_173890")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_173890_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_173890'>赵从善示余玉楼图，其前玉阶一道，横跨绿霄，中琪树垂珠网，夹阶两傍。绿霄之外，周以玉阑，阑外方是碧落。阶所接亦玉池，中间涌起玉楼三重，千门万户，无非连璐重璧。屋覆金瓦，屋山缀红牙，垂珰四檐。黄帘皆捲，楼中帝座依约可望。红云自东来，云中虚皇乘玉辂，驾两金龙。侍卫可见者：灵官法服骑而夹侍二人，力士黄麾前导二人，仪剑四人，金围子四人，夹辂黄幡二人，五色戟带二人，珠幢二人，金龙旗四人，负纳陛而后从二人。云头下垂，将至玉阶，楼前仙官冠帔出迎，方下阶，双舞鹤行前。云驾之傍，又有红云二：其一仙官立幢节间，其二女乐并奏。玉楼之后又有小玉楼六，其制如前。宝光祥云，前后蔽亏，或隐或现。小案黄本作楼之前，独为金地，亦有仙官自金地下迎。傍小楼最高处，有飞桥直瑶台，仙人度桥登台以望。名数可纪者，大略如此。若其景趣高妙，碧落浮黎，青冥风露之境，则览者可以神会，不能述于笔端。此画运思超绝，必梦游帝所者髣髴得之，非世间俗史意匠可到。明窗净几，尽卷展玩，恍然便觉身在九霄三景之上。奇事不可以不识。简斋有《水府法驾导引歌词》，乃倚其体作《步虚词》六章，以遗从善。羽人有不俗者，使歌之于清风明月之下，虽未得仙，亦足以豪矣。</div><div id='poem_preface_173890_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173890'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173890'>珠霄境，却似化人宫。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173890'>梵气<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_173890", 173890, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>弥罗</span>融万象，玉楼十二倚清空，一片宝光中。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_173890_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_173889' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173889' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173889?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>白玉楼六首</a><span class='authorDate'>（1191年）</span><br /><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　居乡，袁说友来访，书其诗以遗之。后袁帅蜀时刻石置之郡斋。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　居乡，题书帖。作品：《玉候帖》《中流一壶帖》《金橘帖》《论书》《跋司马温公帖》<div id='poem_1258241' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258241' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258241'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258241'>成大顿首，上问尊妗宜人玉候万福，十姐、儿女辈悉布起居之礼，朗娘侍奉均胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258241_comment'></div>女甥甚难容，聊慰目前也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258241_comment'></div>诸院安佳，何时得至后堂耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258241_comment'></div>新法玉麟春十斗，并鲊、黄雀各十瓶，巴段四缶，伴书，以渎椒盘，一笑，一笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258241_comment'></div>成大再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1258241_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258238' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258238' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258238?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中流一壶帖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1193年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258238")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258238_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258238'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258238'>成大再拜，上问二嫂宜人懿候万福，老嫂、儿女辈悉拜起居之礼，朗娘侍奉均庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258238_comment'></div>元日四哥见过，却云得大哥书，近曾不快。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258238_comment'></div>从善书又来，为渠觅丹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258238_comment'></div>闻大段虚弱，甚悬悬也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258238_comment'></div>四哥云，得其侄书，交之，只批数字耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258238_comment'></div>不知先之彼中曾得书否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258238_comment'></div>钟医舍我而它之，亦缘贫病交攻，可亮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258238_comment'></div>想数曾相见，如闻钱卿颇周其急，可谓中流一壶也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258238_comment'></div>平江有委不也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258238_comment'></div>成大顿首再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1258238_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258294_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258294'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258294'>世传字书似其为人，亦不必皆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258294_comment'></div>杜正献之严整而好作草圣，王文正之沉毅而笔意洒落，欹侧有态，岂皆似其人哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258294_comment'></div>惟温公则几耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258294_comment'></div>开卷俨然，使人加敬，邪僻之心都尽，而况于亲炙之者乎。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1258294_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258249'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258249'>宠随龙驭，荣陟凤池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258249_comment'></div>当风云感会之时，复天地交泰之象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258249_comment'></div>传闻四海，欢喜一辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258249_comment'></div>窃以国步方艰，方拨乱而反正；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258249_comment'></div>仕途久壅，当为官而择人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258249_comment'></div>况中书政事之原，乃天下根本之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258249_comment'></div>有德在位，斯民举安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258249_comment'></div>恭惟中书相公学赞皇猷，才全王佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258249_comment'></div>直方大以求诸己，安平泰以济斯民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258249_comment'></div>洗光咸池，亲逢盛旦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258249_comment'></div>宣威沙漠，定策元勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258249_comment'></div>眷注益隆，誉望弥著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258249_comment'></div>某刻心盛德，翘首下风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258249_comment'></div>附骥尾以无阶，贺燕厦之有托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258249_comment'></div>仁者在高位，已符孟子之言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258249_comment'></div>圣主得贤臣，愿奏王褒之颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258249_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1258249_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258253' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258253' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258253'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258253'>伏审辍从宰属，擢贰秋卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258253_comment'></div>监治古以象刑，式司邦禁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258253_comment'></div>列从臣而第颂，允穆朝佥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258253_comment'></div>休声所同，和气自至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258253_comment'></div>窃以得贤可及尧舜，建官尤重于诸曹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258253_comment'></div>致治庶几成康，措刑宜首于庶务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258253_comment'></div>恭惟判部侍郎，毓粹自天，研几于圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258253_comment'></div>济世之道，源远而流长；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258253_comment'></div>华国之文，芒寒而色正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258253_comment'></div>守险夷之一节，更荣滞之两涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258253_comment'></div>上既察于忠纯，时遂加于眷倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258253_comment'></div>南宫之分六职，既藉弥缝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258253_comment'></div>北省之出万几，更资考覈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258253_comment'></div>果膺殊渥，亟践迩联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258253_comment'></div>岂特取儒雅而胜法家，抑亦积誉处而登政路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258253_comment'></div>某久暌英表，远庇馀休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258253_comment'></div>第切忻于得舆，阻趋庆于成厦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258253_comment'></div>进皋陶之淑问，已陟禁严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258253_comment'></div>用方叔之壮猷，伫跻枢要。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1258253_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　居乡，病中自编全集成，命子范莘求序于杨万里。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年</a>　居乡，秋季疾转剧，疏请致仕。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年9月5日</a>　居乡，卒。朝廷赠五官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1193&endYear=1193')">1193年12月13日</a>　归窆。友人龚颐正纪丧葬事。<br /></div>
