id='poem_content_1258245'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258245'>治莫大乎常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258245_comment'></div>天地为大矣，飘风则不终朝，骤雨则不终日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258245_comment'></div>方其飘且骤也，人孰不畏，亦孰不知其不能终朝夕，何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258245_comment'></div>非天地之常故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258245_comment'></div>前日如舒、申诸公，忽天下之常，一命之曰「流俗」，再命之曰「异议」，三命之曰「奸党」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258245_comment'></div>自今观之，其天定矣，俗也，异也，奸也，皆天下之常而已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1258245_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1162&endYear=1162')">1162年</a>　侍郎汪应辰。作品：《上汪侍郎应辰》<div id='poem_1258246' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258246' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258246?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上汪侍郎应辰书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1162年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258246")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258246_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258246'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258246'>汉武帝踞见大将军，不冠不见汲长孺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258246_comment'></div>淮南王谓平津侯以下「如发蒙」，独惮长孺，不敢奋奸谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258246_comment'></div>长孺在朝，官不过内史，而系天下轻重如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258246_comment'></div>今士大夫以顾忌为俗久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258246_comment'></div>其原始于爱重其身者大过，位尊而名益衰，禄厚而利实薄，上不足以取信于君，下无以慰其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258246_comment'></div>彼之爱重其身者，乃所以暴弃而甚轻之也。</div><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258244_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258244'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258244'>不龟手之药，一也，或以封，或不免于洴澼絖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258244_comment'></div>方其洴澼絖也，不自知其可以封也，及其封也，天下不以其止于洴澼絖而已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258244_comment'></div>水之于井也，日汲则冽，不汲则竭，其行于上也，随所遇而变生焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1258244_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1162&endYear=1162')">1162年2月</a>　汤思退出知绍兴，赋诗送之。作品：《镇东行送汤丞相帅绍兴》<div id='poem_173727' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173727' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_sentence_3_1258252_comment'></div>恭惟某官禀晖乔岳，腾茂丛霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258252_comment'></div>经术渊渟，有荀孟赞成之力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258252_comment'></div>畴咨至计，允属真儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258252_comment'></div>傥有说以丰财，殆不难于活国。<div class='inline' class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_172364_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_172364'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_172364'>万杉离立翠云幢，袅袅稀闻晚吹香。<div id='poem_sentence_0_172364_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_172364'>山下行人尘扑面，谁知世界有清凉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_172364_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='/Writing/173228?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题径山寺楼</a><span class='authorDate'>（1165年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_173228")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_173228_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173228'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173228'>浴日苍茫水，扪星缥缈楼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173228_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173228'>神光来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_173228", 173228, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>烛夜</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_173228", 173228, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>寿木</span>不知秋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173228_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173228'>海内五峰秀，天涯双径游。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173228_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173228'>爱山吾欲住，衰疾懒乘流。<div id='poem_sentence_3_173228_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173228'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_173228_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1165&endYear=1165')">1165年11月</a>　在临安，十一月，迁著作佐郎。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1165&endYear=1165')">1165年12月</a>　在临安，作《新开塘浦记》。<div id='poem_1258316' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258316' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258316?labeling=true' target='_blank'>昆山县新开塘浦记</a><span class='authorDate'>（乾道元年十二月一日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258316")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258316_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258316'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258316'>隆兴二年，浙河以西郡国七大水，吴之属县五，昆山为甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258316_comment'></div>长老之记，以为三江、具区占扬州，地势最下，是为东南水之所都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258316_comment'></div>其东，地益下，为昆山；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258316_comment'></div>又东，愈益下，海也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258316_comment'></div>故昆山常受三江、具区之委以入于海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258316_comment'></div>其野甚平而善淤，霖潦时至，则水多高居，必以衡塘从浦疏瀹四出，然后民得污邪而稼之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258316_comment'></div>今岁久弗浚，涂泥满沟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258316_comment'></div>夫地愈益下，而脉落壅底，则其沉涩独甚于他邑固宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258316_comment'></div>明年春二月，民大饥且疫，皆仰哺于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258316_comment'></div>河阳李结次山，适为其邑长，私念水利未修，则水害亡终穷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258316_comment'></div>按农田令甲，荒岁得杀工直以募役，乃饰供上之羡，若劝分所得，为之糗粮、扉履、畚锸，号召前仰哺者，一夕麇至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258316_comment'></div>浚浦五，曰新洋江、曰小虞、曰茜泾、曰下张、曰顾浦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258316_comment'></div>浚塘三，曰郭泽、曰七丫、曰至和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258316_comment'></div>五旬而告休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258316_comment'></div>用民之力役，日十有三万四千六百有奇，糜缗钱一万二千有奇，稻麦以钟计，七千七百有奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258316_comment'></div>而官储不知，公徒无所与焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258316_comment'></div>余时备史官，次山使来，丐书以为记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258316_comment'></div>余闻其土水患旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258316_comment'></div>间者，朝议屡欲遣使发县官钱用诸费以从事，论议藏有司充屋，卒以事大无敢承命者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258316_comment'></div>次山独能群饿羸之馀，尝试之，其绩已不可掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258316_comment'></div>后有来者，逢年而有馀力，必且思前人之意，彷佛其绪而缉之，随水之变而为之救，将终古无后艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258316_comment'></div>此余之所以欲书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258316_comment'></div>饥疫之烈也，延缘数十县，见大夫错立其间，左奉食，右执饮，嗟饿者于路，穷日力且弗给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258316_comment'></div>方是时，人其敢以从容修废望其长哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258316_comment'></div>有能贾濒死者之馀力，以举是役，君子谓之贤劳，而黯然无传，仅与不为者相绝如毛氂耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258316_comment'></div>事固有屈于一时而伸眉于后，此又余之所以欲书者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258316_comment'></div>所谓至和塘者，是姑苏道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1258316_comment'></div>异时舟行，财一长亭辄胶，则折入其旁湖泖，以达于郡，盗区荒寒亡以卫，不然，遇祸不可胜计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1258316_comment'></div>今虽暮夜，犹肆行塘中，如过舟枕席之上，憧憧者身亲蒙其利，不可诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1258316_comment'></div>馀虽在绝远僻陋之滨，以一至和之亲见，足以信其馀之可传，此又余之所以遂书而不辞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1258316_comment'></div>是为记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1258316_comment'></div>乾道元年十二月一日，左宣教郎秘书省著作佐郎范成大记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1258316_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1165&endYear=1165')">1165年</a>　在临安，赵密卒于本年，有挽词。作品：《太保节使赵公挽词》<div id='poem_172831' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_172831' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/172831?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太保节使赵公挽词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1165年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_172831")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_172831_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_172831'>鬓凋犹陛戟，心在惜韬弓。<div id='poem_sentence_1_172831_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1166&endYear=1166')">1166年2月</a>　在临安，除尚书吏部员外郎。作品：《论三朝国史劄子》<div id='poem_1258204' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258204' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258204?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论三朝国史劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1166年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258204")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258204_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258204'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258204'>臣闻自古有国有家，虽盛衰不同，而未尝无一代之史策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258204_comment'></div>以小喻之，譬如士庶之家，大则有家法，小则有日记，虽倥偬弗暇给之时，决不可一日而阙，非若其他翰墨文词空言无用之比也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258204_comment'></div>恭惟国家五朝正史，久已大成，而神宗皇帝、哲宗皇帝、徽宗皇帝三朝史书，始于绍兴二十八年开院纂辑，糜费帑廪，九年于此，惟帝纪略备之外，其馀邈然无涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258204_comment'></div>不惟旧闻失坠，无书可考，亦缘是非褒贬，易招悔吝，朝廷既不督课，有司幸于因循，加以席未及煖，迁徙而去，甚或提纲无官，秉笔全阙，动经旬月，无复谁何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258204_comment'></div>人徒见馆宇邃严，吏胥旁午，皆谓煌煌天朝，必备史策，而不知文具如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258204_comment'></div>臣窃检照景德中修太祖、太宗两史，十年而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258204_comment'></div>天圣中修真宗史，四年而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258204_comment'></div>熙宁中修仁宗、英宗两史，六年而成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258204_comment'></div>今之三史，若只用目前规摹，更数十百年，亦恐汗青无日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258204_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258204_comment'></div>自熙宁初元，至今百年，见闻所逮，尚难追记，只更一二十年，残篇断简渐就散逸，故家遗俗无可询究，虽悔向来之因循，欲决意成之，亦不可复得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258204_comment'></div>文谟武烈，恐遂湮晦，何以仰称陛下追孝清庙、羹墙祖宗之心？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258204_comment'></div>臣每念至此，震慄汗下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258204_comment'></div>伏望特赐圣裁，亟命朝廷讨论史事，立之课程，剋以期限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258204_comment'></div>其熙宁以来旧事，本院无书可考者，许关取秘阁四库所藏，及搜访士大夫家所存干照文字，网罗参订，仍择儒馆优闲之臣数人，增兼编择，庶得并工分力，结局有期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258204_comment'></div>成书之后，荐之宗祏，于以上慰三后在天之灵，燕宁欢喜，介福家邦，与天无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258204_comment'></div>此臣所谓系国体重大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258204_comment'></div>前者亲目其弊，今又再司其职，不敢缄默，且陛下家事也，伏望特留圣虑。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1258204_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1166&endYear=1166')">1166年3月4日</a>　在临安，为言者论罢，主管台州崇道观。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1166&endYear=1166')">1166年</a>　返故乡，同舍赵友益追路赠诗。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='cf29ceef8bb34d7b8c531dad5afe86f5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("cf29ceef8bb34d7b8c531dad5afe86f5");'><span id='cf29ceef8bb34d7b8c531dad5afe86f5_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1165&endYear=1170')">1165-1170年</a>，40-45岁</div><div id='cf29ceef8bb34d7b8c531dad5afe86f5' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1169&endYear=1169')">1169年</a>　内直，数宣对，获皇帝嘉奖。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1169&endYear=1169')">1169年</a>　上疏论政事。作品：《论金使生事劄子》《上孝宗论慎刑疏》《上孝宗论慎刑疏》《请支赐钱米不活赤子疏》《论勤政劄子》<div id='poem_1258207' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258207' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258207?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论虏使生事劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1169年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258207")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258207_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258207'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258207'>臣窃闻前日金国遣使来奉寿觞，其正使沿路于琐琐末节，多欲少变旧例，皆非国体重轻，特出一时无稽之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258207_comment'></div>陛下待之有法，一不得志而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258207_comment'></div>然自近年未尝敢尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258207_comment'></div>其所以敢尔者，士大夫窃议谓有两说：或谓山东饥旱，民多流徙，恐为吾所窥测，故为此骄状以示泰然而坚盟信；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258207_comment'></div>或谓彼国以陛下天锡神武，不忘中原，经理边陲，江淮增势，必虑和好不久，虏之君臣或有计议，使者恐预知之，故敢肆然出此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258207_comment'></div>二说是非，固未易决，要之，皆所以启陛下自治待时之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258207_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258207_comment'></div>从前之说，彼惮于兴役，而惧吾有谋耶，则安知其无可乘之机？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258207_comment'></div>从后之说，彼疑吾经略而不恃和好耶，则安知其无先事之举？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258207_comment'></div>故曰：皆所以启陛下自治待时之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258207_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈与帷幄大臣，乘此闲暇之时，稍纾不急之务，益讲待敌之策，早夜孜孜，更甚前日，以待事至而应焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258207_comment'></div>臣去年面对，尝陈三力之说：一曰日力，寸阴可惜者是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258207_comment'></div>二曰国力，资用所出者是也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258207_comment'></div>三曰人力，愚虑智术之所及者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258207_comment'></div>此三力者有限，不可糜费于不急之地，尽用以待敌，犹恐不给，臣区区愚忠，因使人之来，又有所感，故复为陛下略言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258207_comment'></div>伏惟留神省察。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1258207_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258162' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258162' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258162?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论不举子疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1169年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258162")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258162_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258162'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258162'>臣伏见比者臣寮有请，以福建等路有不举子之风，乞支钱米以济贫乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258162_comment'></div>陛下推天地好生之德，特从其请，恩至渥矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258162_comment'></div>然其间尚有委曲，臣请续终其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258162_comment'></div>姑以臣前任处州言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258162_comment'></div>小民以山瘠地贫，生男稍多，便不肯举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258162_comment'></div>女则不问可知，村落间至无妇可娶，买于它州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258162_comment'></div>计所夭杀，不知其几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258162_comment'></div>检惟绍兴八年指挥，贫乏妊娠，支常平米四斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258162_comment'></div>十五年指挥，改支常平米一石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258162_comment'></div>又著令杀子之家父母邻保与收生之人，皆徒刑编置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258162_comment'></div>赏罚具著如此，而此风未殄者，盖州县以常平积欠，救过不暇，决不敢以此非时发仓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258162_comment'></div>支赐既不复行，罪名亦不复问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258162_comment'></div>臣伏睹去冬圣旨，将诸路常平义仓漏底折欠十七万八千馀石，尽行除放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258162_comment'></div>若以此数救不举之子，当活十七万八千馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258162_comment'></div>而典吏臣蠹陷失如此，陛下尚且置而不问，臣决知陛下无所惜于贫乏之家也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258162_comment'></div>昔苏轼知密州，盘量宽剩，得数百名，专储以养弃儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258162_comment'></div>是时初无常平给赐之令，使轼在今日，则推广上恩，当如何哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258162_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈申饬诸路提举司并州县长吏，有似此风俗之处，依累降指挥，勘会贫乏，如数支赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258162_comment'></div>又须申严法禁，与之并行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258162_comment'></div>并穷山僻县常平义仓所管数少，不了支给，定成空文，乞令运司仿苏轼遗意，措置宽剩，量拨助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258162_comment'></div>每岁各具支过钱米、活过赤子数目奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258162_comment'></div>于以滋圣朝仁寿之福，衍清庙灵长之休，抑又得十年生聚之义，惟宸慈轸念。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1258162_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258195' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258195' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258195?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论记注圣语劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1169年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258195")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258195_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258195'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258195'>臣闻帝者莫盛于尧、舜，其事远，而其书存，《二典》所记都俞吁咈之词，可以端拜而议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258195_comment'></div>因其词，知其所以圣，不然，则虽尧、舜之盛无传焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258195_comment'></div>后世设官以记言，旨意深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258195_comment'></div>恭惟陛下天纵神圣，求治甚勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258195_comment'></div>露朝便坐，日有谟训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258195_comment'></div>凡纪纲法度之说，性命道德之蕴，有汉、唐之君不得与于斯者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258195_comment'></div>是宜史不绝书，以诏万古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258195_comment'></div>臣蒙恩待罪柱下，窃考记注所载，十不一二，盖缘进对臣僚，循习故常，例以无所得圣语为报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258195_comment'></div>绍兴间，史官屡有建明，三曾出榜朝堂，而不报者自若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258195_comment'></div>其报到者，又务为简略，或止片言一字，且漫不及所奏因依，抽毫执简，终无纂述，臣甚惧焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258195_comment'></div>按令文：「亲闻圣语应记注事不报后省者，违制论；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258195_comment'></div>又应报圣语而违者，修注官具申尚书省；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258195_comment'></div>若报到无圣语者，月终类聚以闻」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258195_comment'></div>虽有此法，前后未尝申严，及不曾举行「类聚以闻」之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258195_comment'></div>宜其诸所记注，多违旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258195_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈下臣此奏，付閤门、内侍省，遇有对班，坐条告报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258195_comment'></div>并许史官依令举行，将报到无圣语者，月终类聚奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258195_comment'></div>万机之燕，略赐考察，庶几大哉王言，无敢隐匿，圣谟洋洋，匹休《二典》，天下万世幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1258195_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1169&endYear=1169')">1169年</a>　唱和周畏知赠诗。作品：《己丑五月，被召到行在，遇周畏知司直，和五年前送周归弋阳韵见赠，复次韵答之》<div id='poem_172802' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_172802' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/172802?labeling=true' target='_blank'>己丑五月被召至行在遇周畏知司直和五年前送周归弋阳韵见赠复次韵答之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1169年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_172802")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1169&endYear=1169')">1169年</a>　马先觉、郁异寄示同游石湖诗，有次韵。作品：《次韵马少伊郁舜举寄示同游石湖诗卷七首》<div id='poem_172218' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_172218' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_0_172218_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_172218'>芝草琅玕无锁钥，自无超俗扣门人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_172218_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173578'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173578'>圣人坐明堂，洪覆等穹盖。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173578_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173578_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173578'>要烦第一人，镇抚大荒外。<div id='poem_sentence_3_173578_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_173578_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_173578'>玉色照穹庐，骄子亦心醉。<div id='poem_sentence_6_173578_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1169&endYear=1169')">1169年12月</a>　为起居舍人兼侍讲，仍兼实录院检讨官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1170&endYear=1170')">1170年</a>　在起居舍人任，多有论奏。作品：《论记汪圣语劄子》《论侍立劄子》《奏劄十八则》<div id='poem_1258195' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258195' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258195?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论记注圣语劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1169年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258195")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258195_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258195'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258195'>臣闻帝者莫盛于尧、舜，其事远，而其书存，《二典》所记都俞吁咈之词，可以端拜而议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258195_comment'></div>因其词，知其所以圣，不然，则虽尧、舜之盛无传焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258195_comment'></div>后世设官以记言，旨意深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258195_comment'></div>恭惟陛下天纵神圣，求治甚勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258195_comment'></div>露朝便坐，日有谟训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258195_comment'></div>凡纪纲法度之说，性命道德之蕴，有汉、唐之君不得与于斯者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258195_comment'></div>是宜史不绝书，以诏万古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258195_comment'></div>臣蒙恩待罪柱下，窃考记注所载，十不一二，盖缘进对臣僚，循习故常，例以无所得圣语为报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258195_comment'></div>绍兴间，史官屡有建明，三曾出榜朝堂，而不报者自若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258195_comment'></div>其报到者，又务为简略，或止片言一字，且漫不及所奏因依，抽毫执简，终无纂述，臣甚惧焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258195_comment'></div>按令文：「亲闻圣语应记注事不报后省者，违制论；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258195_comment'></div>又应报圣语而违者，修注官具申尚书省；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258195_comment'></div>若报到无圣语者，月终类聚以闻」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258195_comment'></div>虽有此法，前后未尝申严，及不曾举行「类聚以闻」之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258195_comment'></div>宜其诸所记注，多违旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258195_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣慈下臣此奏，付閤门、内侍省，遇有对班，坐条告报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258195_comment'></div>并许史官依令举行，将报到无圣语者，月终类聚奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258195_comment'></div>万机之燕，略赐考察，庶几大哉王言，无敢隐匿，圣谟洋洋，匹休《二典》，天下万世幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1258195_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258196' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258196' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258196?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论侍立劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1170年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258196")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258196_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258196'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258196'>臣近因奏陈记注，不得尽纪圣语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258196_comment'></div>伏蒙宣谕，正以史官侍立太远，令臣讨论典故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258196_comment'></div>臣窃见今来左、右史侍立，乃在正殿东南隅朵殿之上，漠然并无所闻，诚乖书言记动之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258196_comment'></div>谨按唐制，凡御殿，则二史侍立于殿上御坐左右，执笔以记言动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258196_comment'></div>其紫宸入阁，天子临轩，即立螭头，逼阶倾耳而听之，或殿上，或螭头，皆得密闻王言，即时记录，證据甚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258196_comment'></div>许敬宗、李义府、李林甫为政时，其制方废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258196_comment'></div>文宗复之，至今以为盛举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258196_comment'></div>文宗尝与宰相论当世奢靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258196_comment'></div>时史官执笔螭头，帝谓曰：「适所议论，卿记录未」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258196_comment'></div>以此见虽立殿阶螭头之下，尚得有闻而记述，况侍殿上耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258196_comment'></div>本朝初，复起居院，梁周翰等讨论典故，虽未精详，然亦但云直于崇政殿以记言，以至国史、职官志诸书所载，亦只云便殿侍立，而无今来东朵殿之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258196_comment'></div>所谓朵殿，本无经见，若谓与正殿一体，即容设置供奉官员阁于幕次，憩坐自如，则不可全谓之殿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258196_comment'></div>如果与正殿事体不同，不应侍立左右者，却立于彼，此可谓失记注之地矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258196_comment'></div>又按王容季所载，称本朝故事侍立于御坐后，欧阳修请侍立于御坐之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258196_comment'></div>修罢，复立于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258196_comment'></div>此事虽不见《会要》，然世传之久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258196_comment'></div>《会要》独载：「修乞令上殿臣僚退，少留殿门，俟修注官出，面录圣语，仁宗从之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258196_comment'></div>臣窃料国朝修注官虽立殿上，所谓立于御坐后者，闻见亦自不审。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258196_comment'></div>所以修有「留臣僚于殿门，面录圣语」之请，而又有「移立御坐前」之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258196_comment'></div>要之唐制为详，而本朝之制为略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258196_comment'></div>其原出于建置之初梁周翰等讨论不精之故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258196_comment'></div>当时尚无朵殿之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258196_comment'></div>今则不知閤门如何相承，却止令立于朵殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258196_comment'></div>隆兴元年，左史胡诠等建言立非其地，閤门、御史台讨论典故，故欲令起居舍人起居讫升殿，宰执并台谏奏事，权暂东朵殿侍立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258196_comment'></div>候臣僚奏事时，依讲筵例，于御坐前侍立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258196_comment'></div>其意以为宰相奏事所得圣训，中书门下自有时政记，并台谏论事，亦恐难遽漏泄，其他臣僚奏对，初何妨嫌，而使记注之官不得记述以诏万世，诚为漏典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258196_comment'></div>臣窃见行在百司，皆得举职，独左、右史职记言动而职实不举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1258196_comment'></div>王言既不得闻，而臣僚奏对，又例以无所得圣语为报，则是记言之职，有名无实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1258196_comment'></div>所谓记动者，凡行幸出入，号令设施之类，只凭诸司关报，而国史日历所亦同被受，已先修纂，则后省记注，几成长物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1258196_comment'></div>二史之官，号为职清地近，班缀从臣，而瘝官旷职如此，臣所以夙夜惭惧，不皇宁居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1258196_comment'></div>伏望圣慈参酌前古盛际，特赐检会乾道元年閤门、御史台已讨论到典故，断自圣心，特制史官侍立之地，以为圣代成法。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1258196_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1170&endYear=1170')">1170年2月21日</a>　楼鑰使北归来，谒见。<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_1258061' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258061' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258061?labeling=true' target='_blank'>周必大权礼部侍郎兼权直学士院升同修国史实录院同修撰制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1170年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258061")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258061_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258061'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258061'>敕：朕远稽载郁之文，监于二代；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258061_comment'></div>孰副维寅之命？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258061_comment'></div>佥曰伯夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258061_comment'></div>是咨能贤，俾贰掌礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258061_comment'></div>左朝散郎、试秘书少监兼权直学士院、兼国史院编修官、实录院检讨官兼权兵部侍郎周必大，尚古作者，为时闻人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258061_comment'></div>德性守于宫廷，常特立独行而不顾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258061_comment'></div>文声谐于韶頀，有一唱三叹之遗音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258061_comment'></div>朕夙闻其摛藻之工，尝试以出纶之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258061_comment'></div>乃常羊而难进，虽闻远以益光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258061_comment'></div>逮兹再见之期年，安有用贤而累日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258061_comment'></div>亟跻禁列，以赞春卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258061_comment'></div>夫问揖逊之仪者，何足以治神人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258061_comment'></div>听铿锵而已者，何足以被动植！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258061_comment'></div>其顺中和之致，来资制作之成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258061_comment'></div>益尊见闻，嗣有选任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258061_comment'></div>可特授依前左朝散郎、权尚书礼部侍郎兼权直学士院、兼同修国史、实录院同修撰。</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1258081_comment'></div>以尔详明练习，籍有才誉，乘轺东部，席固未温，进辉郎星，将我使事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258081_comment'></div>调度密则军不乏兴，甘苦均则士有奋志，繄汝之职，往其钦哉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1258083_comment'></div>畴咨时才，往践厥次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258083_comment'></div>以尔闻见有原，儒雅饰吏，公府卿寺，骎骎近密，而辙环江闽，泊然难进，故以论撰清班，俾辅吾子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258083_comment'></div>昔之遴选此官者，号称天下第一，惟清介正立者宜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258083_comment'></div>尔尚无愧，其克钦承。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1258086_comment'></div>而今处之学省者，亦以示文学政事，未尝两涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258086_comment'></div>益尊所闻，以俟选擢。</div><div id='poem_content_1258087'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258087'>寺监设主簿员，均之以勾稽为职，然容台学省，专治礼乐艺文之事，尤为清贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258087_comment'></div>以尔慈明徊翔于王官，尔敦义淹久于讲席，皆以文行自将，并蒙选任，益务进修，以对休渥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1258087_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258088' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_1258088_comment'></div>尔比因锡对，俾游其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258088_comment'></div>宜敬共以赞其长，称朕试功之意。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1258090_comment'></div>奋发文章，方掞天而摛藻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258090_comment'></div>䌷绎金华之业，舂容王笋之班，适会课于宫成，当陟明之功令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_172687_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_172687'>长鸣大咤欺风雪，不是甘心是苦心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_172687_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1171&endYear=1171')">1171年1月</a>　汪大猷奉祠返里，赋诗送行。作品：《送汪仲嘉待制奉祠归四明分韵得论字》<div id='poem_173089' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173089' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173089?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送汪仲嘉待制奉祠归四明分韵得论字</a><span class='authorDate'>（1171年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173089'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173089'>丹霄碧海眇高鶱，厌直承明却自论。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173089'>宝马十年听漏箭，扁舟一雨看潮痕。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173089'>侍臣相忆松门远，归客还怜菊径存。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173089'>清润<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_173089", 173089, id='poem_sentence_4_173089_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1171&endYear=1171')">1171年3月</a>　劝谏阻止外戚张说签书枢密院事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1171&endYear=1171')">1171年</a>　上章论劾秦桧余党宋贶；又请禁射利之徒进迎合只说。作品：《论宋贶召命疏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（一核添加。）</span><div id='poem_1258165' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258165' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258165?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论宋贶召命疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1171年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258165")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258165_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258165'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258165'>臣伏睹中书省录黄指挥，宋贶召赴行在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258165_comment'></div>臣谓率土之滨，莫非王臣，陛下欲见一臣寮，何所不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258165_comment'></div>天鉴之下，将无所逃，用舍废置，皆未可知，固无必不可见之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258165_comment'></div>但臣采之公议，有不得而默者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258165_comment'></div>契勘宋贶当秦桧柄国之时，号为亲昵用事，为世指目，章章尤显者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258165_comment'></div>士大夫丑其姓名，于今有年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258165_comment'></div>臣取会前后章疏，奸污之状，固不一端，为奉使则兴贩北货，摄京府则强略倡优，任版曹则买诸军之银，领赡军则受辟官之赂，司建康留钥，则专为权门起造园宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258165_comment'></div>如此之类，未易概举，亦未暇论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258165_comment'></div>究其始初罢逐之由，正缘司计不职，以致左帑阙乏，支遣不行，至用临安公使库及激赏赡军等库钱物那移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258165_comment'></div>又勘虚旁令军人自往漕司支请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258165_comment'></div>若漕司无钱，几致生事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258165_comment'></div>臣寮论其身为计臣，经画如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258165_comment'></div>是时桧犹无恙，而贶已斥矣，则其才术已试大缪，明白如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258165_comment'></div>今闻忽有召命，窃恐或谓其有富国才术欺陛下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258165_comment'></div>只考元罢户部因由，则是非虚实，灼然可见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258165_comment'></div>臣闻人才难得，弗忍终弃，圣人之用心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258165_comment'></div>使君子之人而偶挂宪网，固当抆拭而进之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258165_comment'></div>使小人而有才，亦可覆其玷缺，驾驭以驱使之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258165_comment'></div>今以贶为君子而偶挂网耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258165_comment'></div>则平生奸污之声，遍于海隅矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258165_comment'></div>以为小人而有才者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258165_comment'></div>则当兵衅未开之前，朝廷积富之后，从容版曹，而使帑藏空乏，至以虚旁拨遣军人，亦可骇矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258165_comment'></div>窃恐一旦进用，不惟无益于国，其馀党类帖息伏潜者，皆将动心经营，侥幸复进，徒使疑议四起，又费弹压。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258165_comment'></div>臣恭惟陛下昭德塞违，以临照百官，正欲安靖国人，统一风俗而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258165_comment'></div>将来贶或有所除授，必致众议纷纷，以发其不靖之机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258165_comment'></div>臣蒙被陛下擢置西掖，正典书命，比之诸臣，尤不当缄默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258165_comment'></div>伏惟圣慈储神委照，揽臣此章，特留圣念，别赐处分，不胜幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1258165_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1171&endYear=1171')">1171年4月</a>　以中书舍人兼侍讲递宿禁中。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1171&endYear=1171')">1171年7月</a>　周必大除礼部侍郎兼权直学士院、升同修国史、实録院同修撰，作制词。作品：《周必大权礼部侍郎制词》<div id='poem_1258061' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258061' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258061?labeling=true' target='_blank'>周必大权礼部侍郎兼权直学士院升同修国史实录院同修撰制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1170年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258061")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258061_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258061'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258061'>敕：朕远稽载郁之文，监于二代；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258061_comment'></div>孰副维寅之命？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258061_comment'></div>佥曰伯夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258061_comment'></div>是咨能贤，俾贰掌礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258061_comment'></div>左朝散郎、试秘书少监兼权直学士院、兼国史院编修官、实录院检讨官兼权兵部侍郎周必大，尚古作者，为时闻人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258061_comment'></div>德性守于宫廷，常特立独行而不顾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258061_comment'></div>文声谐于韶頀，有一唱三叹之遗音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258061_comment'></div>朕夙闻其摛藻之工，尝试以出纶之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258061_comment'></div>乃常羊而难进，虽闻远以益光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258061_comment'></div>逮兹再见之期年，安有用贤而累日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258061_comment'></div>亟跻禁列，以赞春卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258061_comment'></div>夫问揖逊之仪者，何足以治神人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258061_comment'></div>听铿锵而已者，何足以被动植！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258061_comment'></div>其顺中和之致，来资制作之成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258061_comment'></div>益尊见闻，嗣有选任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258061_comment'></div>可特授依前左朝散郎、权尚书礼部侍郎兼权直学士院、兼同修国史、实录院同修撰。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1258061_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1171&endYear=1171')">1171年7月</a>　杨万里除太常博士，作制词。作品：《杨万里太常博士告词》<div id='poem_1258062' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258062' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258062?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杨万里太常博士告词</a><span class='authorDate'>（1171年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258062")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258062_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258062'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258062'>敕左奉议郎国子博士杨万里：六经之道同归，礼乐之用为急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258062_comment'></div>故学官有博士员，而奉常亦设焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258062_comment'></div>皆所以访论稽古，而佐兴人文也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258062_comment'></div>尔湛思典籍，风操甚厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258062_comment'></div>由儒林徙礼寺，职名不殊，柬擢之意则厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258062_comment'></div>高议显相，以大厥官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258062_comment'></div>可依前件。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1258062_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1171&endYear=1171')">1171年</a>　朝廷褒洪遵治绩，为作制词。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1171&endYear=1171')">1171年</a>　言处州税太重，为之减免，寻又蠲旱伤路户税。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1171&endYear=1171')">1171年</a>　在朝，屡有陈奏。作品：《论献说迎合布衣补官之弊劄子 》《缴齐仲死罪案奏状》《论王友直请避亲嫌奏状》《请赵士铢例支嗣王米麦等恩数》《琼州山寨首领黄氏可宜人制》《台州仙居縣尉余閎母潘氏饒州浮梁縣主簿謝偁母董氏并可特封孺人制》《和义郡夫人蔡氏可封硕人制》《赐赵雄辞免参知政事不允第二诏》《右迪功郎汪大可从事郎制》《左迪功郎赵善登可左从政侍郎制》《右迪功郎余颖可右从事郎制》《归正人赵虚己可迪功郎制》《归正人归州助教高粲可右迪功郎制》《閤门宣赞舍人干办皇城司吴瑰施行亲从堆垛子可转右武郎制》《明州水军统制下董珍招安到海贼倪德等可补承信郎制 》《张建阵亡与子德普恩泽补承信郎制》《潘慈明可太常寺主簿、刘敦义可国子监制》<div id='poem_1258198' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258198' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258198?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论献说迎合布衣补官之弊劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1171年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258198")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258198_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258198'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258198'>臣闻圣人在上，所以虚己以来天下之言者，盖欲广见闻，资启沃，以辅聪明之所未及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258198_comment'></div>至于朝变夕改，乘时射利之徒，候伺上意，耳剽口传，为迎合之说，取容一时，以钓爵位者，将安用之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258198_comment'></div>国家之于北虏，可谓血雠矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258198_comment'></div>是雠也，天地神明，社稷苍生，其谁不知？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258198_comment'></div>陛下受太上之托，荷列圣之休，不忘北向，以雪宗庙大耻，可谓有志矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258198_comment'></div>是志也，天地神明，社稷苍生，亦其谁不知？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258198_comment'></div>乃宸谟圣策，甫欲有所设施，而一时射利之徒如前所云者，即便彷佛指意，争献迎合之说，翻旧史以谈计谟，检方志以述地理，询北客以撰事机，走权门以伺报应，如是而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258198_comment'></div>圣朝以其说之惓惓，不吝赏激，至有布衣补官而去者甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258198_comment'></div>一人得志，转相倡和，兢以迎逢为进身事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258198_comment'></div>传播既广，四方翕然，泄陛下之神机，漏朝廷之密指，甚非国家之利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258198_comment'></div>伏望圣慈与腹心辅臣，思大计之甚重，审先务之当行，日夜淬厉，自图实效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258198_comment'></div>凡迎合之虚言，取悦一时之听，无益于国而徒利其身者，不必更诱而进之，以开倖门而玩大谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258198_comment'></div>天下幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1258198_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258063' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258063' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258063?labeling=true' target='_blank'>琼州山寨首领黄氏可宜人制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1171年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258063")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258063_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258063'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258063'>琼管守臣言汝以健妇自将，群盗帖息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258063_comment'></div>旌以褒律，嗣其母封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258063_comment'></div>弗懈益虔，培殖后福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258063_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1258063_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258065' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258065' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258065?labeling=true' target='_blank'>台州仙居县尉余闳母潘氏饶州浮梁县主簿谢称母董氏并可特封孺人制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1170年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258065")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258065_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258065'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258065'>朕归胙庭闱，大霈祭泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258065_comment'></div>凡一命而上，亲年及耄耋者，皆锡封焉，老吾老以及人之老也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258065_comment'></div>往服宠光，以跻寿域。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1258065_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258064' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258064' href='/Writing/1258285?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题佛日净慧寺东坡题名</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙四年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年2月</a>　在临安，上劄子论二广狱事。作品：《论二广狱事劄子》<div id='poem_1258222' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258222' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258222?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论二广狱事劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1178年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258222")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258222_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258222'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258222'>宪司吏指摘片言，以控扼邀求不满所欲，则追逮送勘，故酷吏宁杀囚于狱，以免后灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258222_comment'></div>深广有数十年无详覆事至宪司者，岂真无死囚哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1258222_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年</a>　在临安，上《论朝市仪注劄子》。<div id='poem_1258211' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258211' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258211?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论朝市仪注劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1178年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258211")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258211_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258211'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258211'>臣闻礼之有仪，礼之细也，然仪犹不立，则何礼之足云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258211_comment'></div>今者黄旗紫盖，暂驻东南，朝市之制，当仿京邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258211_comment'></div>所以隆上都而观万国者，安得而不肃哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258211_comment'></div>臣伏见文武百僚正衙朝会及德寿宫朝贺之类，退至宫殿等门，奔趋不暇，纷蹂阒咽，缘内之仗卫，外之从人，自相交鬨，至无路可行，贵臣近列，冠笏欹倾，有不能自持者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258211_comment'></div>入公门，鞠躬如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258211_comment'></div>过位，色勃如也，足躩如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258211_comment'></div>谓君虽不御坐，过君之位者，犹当恭肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258211_comment'></div>今于驾兴班退，失容如此，则朝廷之仪，有当申严者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258211_comment'></div>伏乞睿旨行下所属，每遇朝集将退，纵有他处期会，但少纾顷刻，令编拦人宽出班路，使搢绅各依次序安行趋出，以申「鞠躬」、「足躩」之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258211_comment'></div>臣又伏见车驾行幸，前后禁卫各有重数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258211_comment'></div>今乘舆才过，驾后围子每重只四五人，不能呵卫禁严法物及供奉班联，乃与行路人混为一区，虽袒裼负载者，亦得并行禁围之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258211_comment'></div>汉文帝号称宽恕，县人来，闻跸，犹匿桥下，必不敢阑入仗内如今之纵弛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258211_comment'></div>则扈从之仪有当申严者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258211_comment'></div>伏乞睿旨行下所属，乘舆行幸，增修钩陈壁垒之制，量添驾后卫卒，必俟属车禁卫尽绝，方许民庶通行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258211_comment'></div>臣又伏见在京街道车马相遇，皆有先后定制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258211_comment'></div>今行都九衢之中，不问尊卑贵贱，务相排轧，两不逊避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258211_comment'></div>甚或给使技胥及白身之舆马，下至担夫荷卒，皆与朝臣争道，莫之谁何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258211_comment'></div>古者齿路马及蹙路马之刍者皆有诛，非贵马也，贵君马，所以尊君也，而况君之朝臣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258211_comment'></div>则街道之仪有当申严者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258211_comment'></div>伏乞睿旨下所属检照条法，凡车马相遇，有当避道，有当分道，有当敛马侧立之类，一如仪制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258211_comment'></div>否则，许被犯官司解送惩治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258211_comment'></div>以上三者虽礼之细，而实关事体，所以观国之光在是，诚不可忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258211_comment'></div>臣缪掌邦礼，未敢及其重大，谨按众目之所不安者，姑举一二，伏望圣慈，责之攸司，以严礼禁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1258211_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年2月6日</a>　在临安，上《论两广进士摄官之弊疏》。<div id='poem_1258190' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258190' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258190?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论两广进士摄官之弊疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙五年二月六日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258190")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258190_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258190'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258190'>深广州郡，多以进士摄官权录参司理者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258190_comment'></div>摄官月俸微，既无以养廉，悉以贿成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258190_comment'></div>乞下二广转运司，除依法不许权摄外，不得徇私逐急，以进士摄官兼权狱官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258190_comment'></div>或遇阙员，只以本州县见任官兼摄。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1258190_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年2月21日</a>　在临安，上《论恍怳二字并通乞详定修入礼部韵疏》。<div id='poem_1258191' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258191' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258191?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论恍恍二字并通乞详定修入礼部韵疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙五年二月二十一日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258191")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258191_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258191'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258191'>照对举人程文赋内，押「惚」、「恍」字，或书作「恍」，或书作「恍」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258191_comment'></div>除「恍」字《礼部韵》已收入外，其「恍」字，按《老子》云：「无物之象是惚恍」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258191_comment'></div>系从心从光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258191_comment'></div>《礼部韵》却不曾收载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258191_comment'></div>近年虽曾增广，亦失附入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258191_comment'></div>案《集韵》，「恍」、「恍」，并虎晃切，皆以昏为义，即「恍」、「恍」二字并通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258191_comment'></div>恐碍后来举人引用，乞下国子监详定修入。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1258191_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1178&endYear=1178')">1178年2月25日</a>　在临安，上《乞贡院添卷首长条背印疏》。<div id='poem_1258192' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258192' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258192?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞贡院添卷首长条背印疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙五年二月二十五日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258192")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258192_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258192'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258192'>比年试院多有计嘱拆换卷子之弊，谓如甲知乙之程文优长，即拆离乙文换缀甲家状之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258192_comment'></div>其卷首，虽有礼部压缝墨印，缘其印狭长，往往可以裁去重粘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258192_comment'></div>臣等今措置于卷首，背缝添造长条朱印，以淳熙五年省试卷头，皆缝印为文，仍斜印之，使其印角横亘家状程文两纸，易于觉察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258192_comment'></div>乞自后应干试院，依此施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1258192_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_7_1258115_comment'></div>设桑弧于门左，虽粗效于驰驱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258115_comment'></div>置檀辐于河漘，终难逃于尸素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258115_comment'></div>矧突黔之未久，已台馈之下朌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258115_comment'></div>慰其劬劳之思，宠以燕喜之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258115_comment'></div>特迂敕使，光贲私庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258115_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下，仁寿跻民，恩勤逮下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258115_comment'></div>中昃弗遑于暇食，大亨独谨于养贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258115_comment'></div>在厥初生，贶之大礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258115_comment'></div>至若斗筲之陋，亦污体貌之隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258115_comment'></div>臣敢不戒属厌之心，勉谋远之虑。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年3月</a>　至临安，造朝觐见上疏辞建康守。作品：《辞免知建康府劄子》<div id='poem_1258212' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258212' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258212?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免知建康府劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258212")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258212_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258212'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258212'>准尚书省劄子：「三省同奉圣旨：范成大差知建康府，疾速赴行在奏事讫之任」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258212_comment'></div>臣闻命震惊，罔知所措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258212_comment'></div>臣闻覆载二仪之至公，不独私于一物；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258212_comment'></div>爵禄众贤之所共，难并萃于非才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258212_comment'></div>臣去春蒙恩，阃制海郡，治行亡状，考幽当黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258212_comment'></div>乃二月庚子诏书，忽被误渥，职臣秘殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258212_comment'></div>臣皇惧不敢当，即已陈情控免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258212_comment'></div>俞音未下，又付留钥，中外观听，杂然其惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258212_comment'></div>凡所谓量才不肖，揣分宜休，在臣循省所当辞避之说，皆未敢缕如以渎天威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258212_comment'></div>但方陛下总核名实、登崇俊良之时，而何物么么，浃辰之间，荐污除书，未及满岁，再烦临遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258212_comment'></div>屈天地之私恩，搂众贤之所共，真才实能，于此犹惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258212_comment'></div>况如臣者，政使贪荣冒宠，岂不外惮烦啧，内虞疾颠，积此凌兢，何敢下拜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258212_comment'></div>伏望圣慈委照孤危，收还成涣，改图硕望，俾护北门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258212_comment'></div>则公朝不玷于选抡，小己亦宽于忧畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258212_comment'></div>所有恩命，臣未敢祗受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258212_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1258212_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年3月</a>　至临安，造朝觐见再上疏辞建康守。作品：《再辞免知建康府劄子》<div id='poem_1258213' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258213' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258213?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再辞免知建康府劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258213")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258213_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258213'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258213'>臣比奏辞免差知建康府，伏奉诏书，赐臣不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258213_comment'></div>臣跽读训词，感深涕泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258213_comment'></div>载念臣遭遇圣明，早蒙识擢，盖尝不量亡似，许国驰驱，陛下过听，假臣麾节，填拊方外，四方万里，臣未尝敢辄辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258213_comment'></div>今又以执政宠名，居守留钥，造廷得觐，过蒙上冢，阃外荣遇，殆冠平生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258213_comment'></div>而臣方且彷徨忧畏，稽留诏书，不敢下拜者，盖其怵惕危悃，不止于浃旬叠组非所堪任而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258213_comment'></div>缘臣尪羸早衰，疾痛日深，实恐有误委寄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258213_comment'></div>兼侥逾已甚，常虑挻灾，亦不可更尸腆禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258213_comment'></div>又臣妻族魏氏，见居溧水、宣城之间，皆系所部，岂无瓜李之嫌？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258213_comment'></div>积此凌兢，不遑宁处，须不免再干方命之诛，陈情控免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258213_comment'></div>伏望圣慈矜炤危悃，收还成命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258213_comment'></div>如未许，即就外祠，别乞改差一小郡，使为陛下拊摩鳏寡，图报万一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258213_comment'></div>臣仰恃君父隆宽之恩，用敢尽布腹心，干冒天威，无任昧死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258213_comment'></div>所有恩命，臣未敢祗受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258213_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1258213_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年闰3月13日</a>　在临安，上疏论治明州海盗。作品：《论治明州海盗疏》<div id='poem_1258193' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258193' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258193?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论治明州海盗疏<span class='inlineComment2'>（淳熙八年闰三月十三日）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年闰3月13日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258193")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258193_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258193'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258193'>海道荒杳，界分不明，时有寇攘，并无任责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258193_comment'></div>臣昨将明州管下诸寨，各考古来海界，绘成图本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258193_comment'></div>及根括沿海船户，以五家为甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258193_comment'></div>如一船有犯，同保并科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258193_comment'></div>亦已攒写成册，并藏在制司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258193_comment'></div>如遇获到海贼，即检照犯人船甲，根株究治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258193_comment'></div>乞行下制置司，令于所隶州县一体施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1258193_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>　在临安，孝宗赐御书“石湖”二字及苏轼诗。作品：《御书石湖二大字跋》《跋孝宗书》《纪御书碑》《谢赐御书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（一核添加。）</span><div id='poem_1258295' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258295' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258295?labeling=true' target='_blank'>御书石湖二大字跋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258295")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258295_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258295'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258295'>淳熙八年三月庚戌，制书擢臣守金陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258295_comment'></div>闰六月丁亥，朝行在所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258295_comment'></div>庚寅，辞后殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258295_comment'></div>翼日既望，诏锡清燕苑中，皇帝亲御翰墨，大书「石湖」二字以赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258295_comment'></div>天纵圣能，游艺超绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258295_comment'></div>典则高古，如伏羲画；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258295_comment'></div>体势奇逸，如神禹碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258295_comment'></div>日光云章，垂耀缣素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258295_comment'></div>环列改观，禁籞动色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258295_comment'></div>臣惊定喜极，不知忭蹈，昧死奉觞上千万岁寿，奉宝书以出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258295_comment'></div>越五日，至石湖藏焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258295_comment'></div>石湖者，具区东汇，自为一壑，号称佳山水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258295_comment'></div>臣少长钓游其间，结茅种树，久已成趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258295_comment'></div>春秋时，吴台其阴，越城其阳，登临访古，往迹具在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258295_comment'></div>污莱露蔓，千七百馀年，莫有过而问者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258295_comment'></div>今猥以臣故，彻闻高清，天光博临，燕及荒野，由开辟来，未睹斯盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258295_comment'></div>裴度、李德裕皆唐宗臣，绿野、平泉，亦声震当代，揆今所蒙无传焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258295_comment'></div>何物么么，独冒宠赫，百身万殒，莫能负载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258295_comment'></div>臣蒲柳早秋，仕无补益，县官倘晼晚不休，奸止足之戒，则将上累隆知，俯愧初服，臣用是惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258295_comment'></div>冀幸少日，遂赐骸骨，归老湖上，宿卫奎壁，与山川之神，暨猿鹤松桂，同在昭回中，一介姓名，亦因是不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258295_comment'></div>使后世知臣属厌荣辱，得全于桑榆，以无辱君赐，则陛下丕显休命，不委于草莽，庶几报恩之万一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258295_comment'></div>臣既摩刻扁榜，又被之琬琰以传，且附著臣之自叙云尔。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1258295_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258202' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258202' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258202?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐御书劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258202")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258202_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258202'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258202'>古人书法，字中有笔，笔中无锋，乃为极致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258202_comment'></div>所谓锥画纱屋漏雨之法，盖自钟、王之后，未有得其全者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258202_comment'></div>惟我高考独传此妙，而陛下亲授家学，曲尽圣能，意象自然，笔迹俱泯，而万钧之笔潜寓其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258202_comment'></div>譬犹宇宙阖辟，不见斧凿之痕，云霞舒卷，殊非绘画之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258202_comment'></div>此非圣性天高，学力海富，道腴德辉，被于心画，则何以深造自得，集其大成全美如此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258202_comment'></div>臣又尝论李唐名家，犹得楷法，本朝作者，但工行书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258202_comment'></div>如米芾所作，飘逸超妙，可喜可愕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258202_comment'></div>贵以楷法，殆无一字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258202_comment'></div>此事寂寥久矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1258202_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='a163befdd9644d00ba234f34ed0158a2_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a163befdd9644d00ba234f34ed0158a2");'><span id='a163befdd9644d00ba234f34ed0158a2_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1189')">1188-1189年</a>，63-64岁</div><div id='a163befdd9644d00ba234f34ed0158a2' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　诏令奏事，又辞。不得已，入对。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　在临安，孝宗赐丹砂及御书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　在临安，太子为题寿栎堂。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　在临安，上劄子，请纪太上皇言行。作品：《请纪太上皇言行劄子》《请记高宗退处后言行疏》<div id='poem_1258174' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258174' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258174?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请记高宗退处后言行疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙十五年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258174")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258174_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258174'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258174'>臣闻追孝莫大于显亲，显亲莫大于述事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258174_comment'></div>恭惟高宗皇帝御历三纪，休功盛德，陛下既已著之圣政之编矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258174_comment'></div>至退处德寿之后，天旋日用，岂无可纪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258174_comment'></div>如汉禁中起居注、唐诸王所修内起居注之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258174_comment'></div>向来阙此等一书，使二十五年之间尧言尧行，不得尽闻于世，甚可惜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258174_comment'></div>窃意陛下曩者久奉大养，从容北宫，庆溢庭闱，事兼家国，必有授受之谟训，谅多慈爱之话言，以至岁时燕喜，旷仪盛事，无非载籍之所未闻，皆当志其大略，以侈万古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258174_comment'></div>今事虽已往，日月尚新，陛下孝思永慕，见于羹墙，恐有可以记忆者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258174_comment'></div>又参之以东朝东宫之所闻见，与夫宫禁老成之所流传，特命亲王，悉加记录，以付史氏，则陛下述事之孝，传无穷而施罔极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258174_comment'></div>臣尝考虞书《尧典》一篇，纪陶唐行事备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258174_comment'></div>而《鲁论》有「尧曰咨舜」之训，《孟子》有「放勋劳来」之言，及《庄》、《列》所记游汾、观华、康衢等事，皆在《尧典》之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258174_comment'></div>则知虞舜之世，述尧遗事，必有他书，不止于仅存之一典而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258174_comment'></div>伏惟陛下自留圣心。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1258174_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1188&endYear=1188')">1188年</a>　在临安，有延和殿论事劄子。作品：《延和殿又论二事劄子》<div id='poem_1258216' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258216' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258216?labeling=true' target='_blank'>延和殿又论二事劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙十五年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258216")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258216_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258216'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258216'>臣今有愚见二事，开具于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258216_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1258216'>一、臣窃闻虏中自立璟为太孙，诸子不平，形于谣言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258216_comment'></div>臣顷过保州，是时其嗣允恭尚在，已见承应人密说：国中惟畏服大王，将来恐有李唐秦王之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258216_comment'></div>谓其长子允升也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258216_comment'></div>今又立璟，则其伯叔之心，皆可想见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258216_comment'></div>他日若璟得国，伯叔不服，必有内乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258216_comment'></div>此其机可乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258216_comment'></div>万一璟能制伯叔之命，则必有腹心之臣为之谋主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258216_comment'></div>事成势定，又必有窥伺之图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258216_comment'></div>国家当不辍储备，以待事势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258216_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1258216'>〔贴黄〕臣窃见方今国计未足，民力未裕，求所以足国裕民，则无其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258216_comment'></div>止缘规模未坚定，所经费不可减。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258216_comment'></div>欲储蓄赢羡以足国，而所入不支所出；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258216_comment'></div>欲缓催科除耗剩以裕民，而上煎上迫，实惠难行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258216_comment'></div>若只如此，趣了目前，无复馀力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258216_comment'></div>万一敌人真有机会，亦恐无以应之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258216_comment'></div>天下事莫有大于此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258216_comment'></div>伏想久留圣心，不待愚臣妄论。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1258216_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1189&endYear=1189')">1189年</a>　敖陶孙（器之）有《上闽帅范石湖五首》。<br /></div>

-----title
昆山
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='96c2e0cc9b434ea595d505df941b8a2a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("96c2e0cc9b434ea595d505df941b8a2a");'><span id='96c2e0cc9b434ea595d505df941b8a2a_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1144&endYear=1144')">1144年</a>　在昆山，竭力嫁二妹。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1145&endYear=1145')">1145年6月</a>　在昆山东禅寺读书,并往来于昆吴之间(此后十年间大体如此),亦间有短期出游.作品：《六月七日夜起坐殿庑取凉》<div id='poem_173308' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173308' </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_173308")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_173308_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173308'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173308'>畏暑中夜起，出门月露清。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173308_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_173308'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_173308", 173308, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>彭觥</span>铁拄杖，磔磔栖燕惊。<div id='poem_sentence_6_173308_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_173308'>俗人岂解事，鼻息春雷鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_7_173308_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_173308'>大星送晓来，四窗炯微明。<div id='poem_sentence_8_173308_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_173308'>颢气澡肌骨，栩栩两腋轻。<div id='poem_sentence_9_173308_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_173308'>乘风欲归去，骖鸾羾青冥。<div id='poem_sentence_10_173308_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_173308_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1146&endYear=1146')">1146年</a>　在昆山,邑中士人组诗社,前辈乐备(功成)绍介入社,与马先觉(少伊)唱和,约这此时.作品：《和马少伊韵(气压伊吾一剑鸣)》<span class='inlineComment2'>（见昆山杂咏。）</span><div id='poem_172350' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_172350' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/172350?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和马少伊韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1146年）</span><span id='poem_sentence_1_172350_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_172350'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_172350_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1148&endYear=1148')">1148年</a>　詹叔善(继道)第进士,为其知止堂作志、铭。作品：《詹氏知止堂铭并序》<div id='poem_1258345' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258345' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258345?labeling=true' target='_blank'>詹氏知止堂铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1148年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258345")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258345_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258345'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258345'>信有乡先生詹君者，举进士，历官既倦游，即第家作堂曰「知止」，将老焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258345_comment'></div>后五年，上奉议郎诸王宫教授印组，顿首言县官，愿丏骸骨归州里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258345_comment'></div>制诏：「詹某引年知止，足励士风，录其子一人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258345_comment'></div>读诏中语，适与堂之名合，闻者异之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258345_comment'></div>君之言曰：「始吾为此，非恶宠利之涂而违之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258345_comment'></div>吾见迹焉者矣，惟彼之徇则违己，惟己之合则不如其已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258345_comment'></div>与其倒迕于日昃，孰若去而之山溪苍凉之滨，访初服之亡恙，俯仰昨非，蘧然形寓，吉蠲神明，落其华纷，尚庶几于闻道」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258345_comment'></div>止乎彼而行乎此者，其失得孰多，君子自叙云尔，余何足以辨之，姑用是铭其堂：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1258345'>贤哉大夫，缅其高风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258345_comment'></div>始名斯堂，若与天通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258345_comment'></div>有如不信，视此扁榜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258345_comment'></div>又视天语，如镜中像。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258345_comment'></div>载登斯堂，皦焉初心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258345_comment'></div>平生固然，匪今斯今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258345_comment'></div>卷舒之岐，理不同轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258345_comment'></div>利达之辕，道义之柅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258345_comment'></div>富贵几何，蹈渊若陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258345_comment'></div>吾改吾辕，莫柅其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258345_comment'></div>其行靡靡，望道之涘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258345_comment'></div>孰曰知止？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258345_comment'></div>未见其止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1258345_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1148&endYear=1148')">1148年</a>　在昆山，与至先、唐少梁登山。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1149&endYear=1149')">1149年</a>　在昆山读书。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='5d7663f4627a4581ae4e8825371e22b8_label'><a href='javascript: -----title
徽州（歙县）

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1156&endYear=1156')">1156年</a>　在徽州，与严焕（子文）;胡宗伟;林公正;刘庆充;滕子绍;李深之;赵圣集;汤伯温;黄伯益;林彦强等唱和。作品：《次韵子文探梅水西》<div id='poem_173398' class='_poem'><div class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_173398")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_1_1258058_comment'></div>时为新安掾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258058_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1258058'>吾闻南国之南，水激而山蟠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258058_comment'></div>撋绛绡以袨服，袭茜桃而中单。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258058_comment'></div>湛冰明之<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_10_1258058_comment'></div>斥蜂蜜之黄腻，谢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1258058", 1258058, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>佛桑</span>之红乾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258058_comment'></div>觉龙目之幺么，咍蒲萄之甘酸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258058_comment'></div>藉以秋云之巾，荐以水晶之盘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258058_comment'></div>羞以烧春之浮醅，相以流水之清弹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258058_comment'></div>迨风月之温丽，耿星河其未翻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258058_comment'></div>予一嚼而三咽，滟玉池之清寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258058_comment'></div>恍醉梦之翾飞，掖九天之风翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258058_comment'></div>望涪江与闽岭，麾八极于雷鼾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258058_comment'></div>方溟濛其路暗，倏浩荡其天宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258058_comment'></div>岌芳宫与绣户，窈玉声之阑珊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258058_comment'></div>款荔枝之仙人，苦平生之所欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258058_comment'></div>谓客子其少留，纷擘绿而破丹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258058_comment'></div>招玉环于东虚，御清空之双鸾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258058_comment'></div>访长生之旧曲，有千载之遗叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258058_comment'></div>怅三山之回风，惊南斗之阑干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258058_comment'></div>乱梧竹之满庭，渺云海之漫漫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1258058_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_3_172948_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_172948'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_172948_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1156&endYear=1156')">1156年</a>　在徽州，魏良臣自参政出知绍兴府，寄《蓬莱阁》、《望海亭》诗轴。作品：《望海亭赋》《浙东参政寄示会稽蓬莱阁诗轴，次韵寄题二首》<div id='poem_1258056' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258056' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258056?labeling=true' target='_blank'>望海亭赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1156年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258056")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258056_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258056'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258056'>会稽太守参政魏公，作望海亭于卧龙之巅，率其属为歌诗以落成，录与书来，且使赋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258056_comment'></div>余谨掇其膏馥之馀，拟赋一首以寄，后日获从杖屦，其上于山川之神，尚有旧焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258056_comment'></div>其辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1258056'>诸侯之客，有来自东，而姹会稽之游者，曰：佳乎丽哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258056_comment'></div>越之为邦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258056_comment'></div>萦山带湖，楼观相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258056_comment'></div>背卧龙而崛起，焕丹碧之翚翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258056_comment'></div>跻攀下临，顾瞻无旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258056_comment'></div>平畴蔚以稚绿，乔木森其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1258056", 1258056, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>老苍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258056_comment'></div>淙万壑之春声，写千岩之秋光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258056_comment'></div>朝霞暝霏，扶疏微茫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258056_comment'></div>望山河之故墟，吊草木之馀社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258056_comment'></div>夏后万国之朝，勾践百战之野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258056_comment'></div>兴亡梗概，犹有存者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258056_comment'></div>至于流觞泛雪，高人之旧事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258056_comment'></div>浣纱采莲，游女之遗迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258056_comment'></div>郁溪山之如画，尚仿佛其可识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258056_comment'></div>访故老以问讯，兴慨叹于畴昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258056_comment'></div>是为游览之大略，而蓬莱观风之所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258056_comment'></div>虽然，士固多感，而况于对景以怀古，抚事而凝情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258056_comment'></div>往往使人魂断意折，酒澹而歌不平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258056_comment'></div>故丽则丽矣，而未擅乎登临之胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258056_comment'></div>若夫浩荡轩豁，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1258056", 1258056, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>孤高</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1258056", 1258056, "Clauses/54/Comments/1")'>伶俜</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258056_comment'></div>腾驾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1258056", 1258056, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>碧寥</span>，指麾沧溟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258056_comment'></div>堕忧端于眇莽，挹颢气于空明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258056_comment'></div>飘飘焉有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1258056", 1258056, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>连鳌跨鲸</span>之意，举莫如望海之新亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258056_comment'></div>尝试登兹而望焉：沃野既尽，遥见东极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258056_comment'></div>送万折之倾注，艳寒光之迸射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1258056_comment'></div>浸<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1258056", 1258056, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>地轴</span>以上浮，荡天容而一色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1258056_comment'></div>珠辉具芒，矗蝀横霓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1258056_comment'></div>快宇宙之清宽，怅百年之偪仄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1258056_comment'></div>当其三星晓横，万境俱寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1258056_comment'></div>浴日未动，晨光先激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1258056_comment'></div>波鳞鳞而跃金，天晃晃而半赤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1258056_comment'></div>赪轮腾上，东方皆白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1258056_comment'></div>烟消尘作，栖鸟振翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1258056_comment'></div>俯群动而纷起，寄一笑于遐觌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1258056_comment'></div>永我暇日，苒其将夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1258056_comment'></div>饯斜晖于孤嶂，候佳月于沧浦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1258056_comment'></div>沉沉上下，杳无处所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1258056_comment'></div>惊玉地之破碎，漾银盘而吞吐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1258056_comment'></div>忽褰云而涌雾，献<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1258056", 1258056, "Clauses/93/Comments/0")'>霜影</span>于庭宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1258056_comment'></div>夜色既合，初闻钟鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1258056_comment'></div>觞屡至而不辞，诗欲成而起舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1258056_comment'></div>又若潮生海门，万里一息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1258056_comment'></div>浮光如线，涛头千尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1258056_comment'></div>方铁马之横溃，倏银山之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1258056", 1258056, "Clauses/103/Comments/0")'>崩坼</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1258056_comment'></div>气平怒霁，水面如席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1258056_comment'></div>吴帆越樯，飞上空碧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1258056_comment'></div>此亦天下之伟观，然犹未及乎目力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1258056_comment'></div>燕香<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1258056", 1258056, "Clauses/110/Comments/0")'>舂容</span>，俗客莫陪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1258056_comment'></div>神清意消，徙倚徘徊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1258056_comment'></div>天风激吹，波涛<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1258056", 1258056, "Clauses/115/Comments/0")'>阖开</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1258056_comment'></div>五云明灭，丹宫绛台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1258056_comment'></div>睇三山之不远，其为公而飞来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1258056_comment'></div>遂招汗漫之胜游，下飙车之逸轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1258056_comment'></div>属紫霄之妙质，侑玉斝之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1258056", 1258056, "Clauses/123/Comments/0")'>清醴</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1258056_comment'></div>勤歌鸾与舞凤，寿仙伯以多祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1258056_comment'></div>恍风雨之皆散，但惊尘之四起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1258056_comment'></div>悟真灵之不隔，而何有乎弱水之三万里也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1258056_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1258056_comment'></div>昔之居此者多矣，曾靡暇于经营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1258056_comment'></div>逮山灵之效奇，发遗址于岩扃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1258056_comment'></div>殚妙巧于天藏，超埃𡏖而上征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1258056_comment'></div>极观听之所接，遂杳渺而难名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1258056_comment'></div>嗟此乐之无央，与来者而同登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1258056_comment'></div>决眦荡胸，雪其尘缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1258056_comment'></div>且安知前日之苍烟白露，断蔓而荒荆者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1258056_comment'></div>顾客子之所能道者，才管中之一斑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1258056_comment'></div>惟览者之自得，会绝景于凭阑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1258056_comment'></div>心凝神释，浩如飞翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1258056_comment'></div>而后知兹亭之仙意，而凌虚御风之无难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1258056_comment'></div>主人瞿然而起曰：有是哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1258056_comment'></div>吾将观焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1258056_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_173618' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173618' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173618?labeling=true' target='_blank'>浙东参政寄示会稽蓬莱阁诗轴次韵寄题二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 id='poem_sentence_1_173618_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173618'>尘埃不隔壶中境，功业犹关物外身。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173618_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173618'>鸾鹤莫惊兵卫峻，主人元是白云人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_173618_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173618'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_173618_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_173118' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173118' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173118?labeling=true'
