class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173118'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173118'>鳌背飞来绀碧浮，人间还有小蓬丘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173118'>不须击水三千里，已压中天十二楼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173118'>羽驾旧曾将梦到，芝田今合为公秋。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173118'>玉霄有客方东望，竟欲乘风驭气游。<div id='poem_sentence_3_173118_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173118'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_173118_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1157&endYear=1157')">1157年</a>　在徽州任司户参军。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1158&endYear=1158')">1158年</a>　在徽州，知郡安抚李稙元夕赏红梅赋诗,有次韵.又赋古风咏红梅。作品：《次韵知郡安抚元夕赏倅厅红梅三首》<div id='poem_172952' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_172952' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/172952?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵知郡安抚元夕赏倅厅红梅三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_172952", 172952, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>旧格</span>同。<div id='poem_sentence_1_172952_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_172951_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_172951'>酒阑且驻纱笼看，慢破团团一壁龙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_172951_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1158&endYear=1158')">1158年</a>　在徽州。作品：《新安绝少红梅，惟倅厅特盛，通判朝仪召同幕僚赏之，坐皆有诗，亦赋古风一首》<div id='poem_173709' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173709' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173709?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新安绝少红梅惟倅厅特盛通判朝议召幕僚赏之坐皆有诗亦赋古风一首</a><span class='authorDate'>（1158年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_173709")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_173709_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173709'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173709'>华灯收尽江梅落，别有横枝照林薄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173709_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173709'>天教阆苑染芳根，小住山城慰萧索。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173709_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173709'>腾腾醉后酒红醺，淡淡妆成笑靥新。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173709_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173709'>斟酌东君已倾倒，为渠都费十分春。<div id='poem_sentence_3_173709_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173709'>别乘胸怀有风月，催唤清尊洗愁绝。<div id='poem_sentence_4_173709_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_173709'>花知主客得不凡，一夜光风融绛雪。<div id='poem_sentence_12_173570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_173570'>穷乡眼冷见未曾，道上嗫嚅相指目。<div id='poem_sentence_13_173570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_173570'>云此狭隘何以有二士，直恐翩翩跨黄鹄。<div id='poem_sentence_14_173570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_173570'>广文组解登王畿，诸公贵人争劝归。<div id='poem_sentence_15_173570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_173570'>常日心期有定论，赠行不惜重费词。<div id='poem_sentence_16_173570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_173570'>腰金佩璐众目好，汗简沉碑千载痴。<div id='poem_sentence_17_173570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_173570'>一尊有意重山岳，五鼎无心轻网丝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173712'>荒烟暗白道，行行乱蛩响。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173712_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173712'>日脚午未吐，云头晚犹涨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1258250_comment'></div>伏惟某官，冰壶莹彻，玉缫粹温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258250_comment'></div>傲睨学林，文章乃其馀事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258250_comment'></div>脂锦车而夙驾，结璁佩以昕朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258250_comment'></div>遂由宰士之联，进帅教官之属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258251_comment'></div>富贵吾所自有，不以动心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258251_comment'></div>文辞烂然成章，果能用世。<div class='inline' -----title
丽水
-----detail

href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1168&endYear=1168')">1168年8月</a>　抵处州任。兴义役，规划水利。开通济堰，造平政桥。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1168&endYear=1168')">1168年</a>　在处州，徐蒇子礼提举按部来过，劝作莺花亭，记秦观旧事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1169&endYear=1169')">1169年1月</a>　兴工修水堰。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1169&endYear=1169')">1169年4月</a>　水堰修成,撰《通济堰记》，制《堰规》二十条刊石。作品：《通济堰碑》<div id='poem_1258354' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258354' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258354?labeling=true' target='_blank'>通济堰碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（乾道五年四月十九日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258354")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258354_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258354'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258354'>通济堰，合松阳、遂昌两溪之水，引而东行，环数十百里，溉田广远，有声名浙东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258354_comment'></div>按长老之记，以为萧梁氏时詹南二司马所作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258354_comment'></div>至宋中兴乾道戊子，垂千岁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258354_comment'></div>往迹芜废，中下源尤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258354_comment'></div>明年春，郡守吴人范成大与军事判官兰陵人张澈始修复之，事悉具新规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258354_comment'></div>三月，工徒告休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258354_comment'></div>成大驰至斗门，落成于司马之庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258354_comment'></div>窃悲夫水无常性，土亦善堙，修复之甚难，而溃塞之实易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258354_comment'></div>惟后之人，与我同志，嗣而葺之，将有考于斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258354_comment'></div>今故列其规于石以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258354_comment'></div>四月十九日，左奉议郎、权发遣处州军州、主管学事兼管内劝农事范成大书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1258354_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1169&endYear=1169')">1169年</a>　在栝苍门外造浮桥，作《平政桥记》。<div id='poem_1258320' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258320' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258320?labeling=true' target='_blank'>平政桥记</a><span class='authorDate'>（乾道五年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258320")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258320_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258320'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258320'>栝苍带郭浮桥，岁久不葺，民苦病涉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258320_comment'></div>乾道四年冬，郡守范成大实始改作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258320_comment'></div>郡从事张彻，惠利民，丽水县留清卿调其工费，以授州民豪长者四人，使董役吏毋得有所与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258320_comment'></div>凡为船七十有二，联续架梁，为梁三十有六，筑亭溪南以涖之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258320_comment'></div>岁十一月桥成，名之曰「平政」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258320_comment'></div>亭成，名之曰「知津」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258320_comment'></div>又得废浮图之田五十亩于缙云，以其租属亭，岁时治桥，俾勿坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258320_comment'></div>明年正月，大合乐以落之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258320_comment'></div>众请铭其事于石，使后有考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258320_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1258320'>孰梁斯兮？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258320_comment'></div>踏渊若衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258320_comment'></div>我维新之，栉栉其舻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258320_comment'></div>工庥于亭，有粟在耨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258320_comment'></div>岂维新之，永以不朽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1258320_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1169&endYear=1169')">1169年</a>　莺花亭成，赋诗次徐蒇原韵。作品：次韵徐子礼提举莺花亭子六首。<div id='poem_173425' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173425' class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_173425_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' 宜春

ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1173&endYear=1173')">1173年</a>　在衡州，赋合江亭诗。作品：《合江亭（并序）》<div id='poem_173382' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173382' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173382?labeling=true' target='_blank'>合江亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1173年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_173382")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_173382_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_content_173382'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173382'>石鼓郁嵯峨，截然踞沧洲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173382_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173596_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173596'>我从蛮岭瘴烟来，不怕雨云埋岳趾。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173596_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173596'>忆昔南征款庙庭，往来无恙神所祉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173596_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173596'>当时已有归田愿，帝临此心如白水。<div id='poem_sentence_16_173596'>区区献状眩儿童，乳洞淡岩真戏耳。<div id='poem_sentence_16_173596_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_173596'></div><div -----title
零陵
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='32b72c137eb648edb4987b1373982e69_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("32b72c137eb648edb4987b1373982e69");'><span id='32b72c137eb648edb4987b1373982e69_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1173&endYear=1173')">1173年</a>，48岁</div><div id='32b72c137eb648edb4987b1373982e69' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>经浯溪，赋诗谓颂体不宜涉讥讽，郡人以为妄，郡惟教授王阮韪其旨。作品：《书浯溪中兴碑后（并序）》<div id='poem_465208' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_465208' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/465208?labeling=true' target='_blank'>书浯溪中兴碑后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1173年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_465208")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_465208_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_465208'>乾道癸巳春三月，余自西掖出守桂林。九日渡湘江游浯溪，摩挲中兴石刻，洎唐元和至今游客所题。窃谓四诗各有定体，颂者，美盛德之形容，以其成功告于神明者也，商、周、鲁之遗篇可以概见。今元子乃以鲁史笔法，婉辞含讥，盖之而章，后来词人复发明呈露之。则夫磨崖之碑，乃一罪案，何颂之有？窃以为未安。题五十六字，刻之石傍，与来者共商略之。此诗之出，必有相诟病者。谓不合题破次山碑，此亦习俗固陋，不能越拘挛之见耳。余义正词直，不暇恤也。</div><div id='poem_preface_465208_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_465208'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_465208'>三颂遗音和者希，丰容宁有刺讥辞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_465208_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_465208'>绝怜元子春秋法，都寓唐家清庙诗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_465208_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_465208'>歌咏当谐琴搏拊，策书自管璧瑕疵。<div id='poem_sentence_2_465208_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_465208'>纷纷健笔刚题破，从此磨崖不是碑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_465208_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_465208'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_465208_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在永州，游愚溪。作品：《愚溪在零陵城对岸，渡江即至。溪正狭，一石涧耳。盖众山之水，流出湘中。》<div id='poem_465209' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_465209' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/465209?labeling=true' target='_blank'>愚溪在零陵城对岸，渡江即至。溪甚狭，一石涧耳。盖众山之水，流出湘中</a><span class='authorDate'>（1173年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_465209")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_465209_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_465209'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_465209'>一水弯环罗带阔，千古零陵擅风月。<div id='poem_sentence_0_465209_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 桂林（临桂）

class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258225' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258225?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谕葬文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1173年6月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258225")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258225_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258225'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258225'>契勘守令民之师□，□□□□□□□□□。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258225_comment'></div>化莫急于□□□□□下□□□□有不葬其父母骨肉，妄称家力不办，风水不吉，日月未利，兄弟相妨之类，只将棺柩寄留寺舍，或寘嵓穴，或稿殡于荒园林木之间，少者五年七年，多者二三十年，不与安厝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258225_comment'></div>又信于巫卜，因生事，小不如意，即归罪坟垄，不问□久□行□掘，棺柩破毁，骸骨暴露，或弃草野，□犬豕食□，或□墙□为□□□□□□□□房舍堆□错，虽久无□认□籍就□，永无窀穸之期，□□□□□□□□□。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258225_comment'></div>今欲力□此苦□□此罪□□□□□□□□□保□□□□□□□族有祖□骨肉棺柩遗弃未曾收葬者，并限榜到一月□□安□，过限不□，许本保及诸色人陈告，赏钱五十文□，扣人既无孝心，即是禽兽，□□□□，依条断罪，定不恕减，拘籍家财，究还官赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258225_comment'></div>仍自今后，不得以改葬为名，发掘先垄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258225_comment'></div>更仰漕运司据所管寺观庵舍，保正长据所管园林嵓穴，内有遗弃尸体，并限五日报本主迁归，依限安葬，先具实数，申府照应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258225_comment'></div>其有久年不辨□名，无人识认者，别具数目供申，外县委知县，本府即知府，自行各支官钱，踏逐官地，类聚收葬，俾函冤有归矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258225_comment'></div>乾道九年六月二十八日榜示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258225_comment'></div>静江都督府<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258225_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1258225'>者：原阙，据文意补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1258225_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1258225'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_8_1258225_0'>⑴ 《范成大佚著辑存》第一三一页，国家图书馆藏拓本。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1258225_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1173&endYear=1173')">1173年8月</a>　在桂林，有《祭遗骸文》。<div id='poem_1258355' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258355' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258355?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭遗骸文</a><span class='authorDate'>（乾道九年八月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258355")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258355_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258355'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258355'>维乾道九年八月乙酉，左朝奉郎、充集英殿修撰、知静江军府事兼管内劝农事、充广南西路兵马都钤辖兼本路经略安抚使、兼提举买马、吴县开国男、食邑三百户、赐紫金鱼袋范成大，谨遣左迪功郎临桂县令陈舜韶、左迪功郎司法参军郑郧以清酌庶羞之奠，祭于新冢诸君之灵：呜呼，圣人有言：「卜其宅兆而安厝之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258355_comment'></div>则凡死而无宅兆者，不得其安，可知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258355_comment'></div>形魄降于地，骨肉归复于土，然后其魂气无不之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258355_comment'></div>故曰：人死曰鬼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258355_comment'></div>鬼者，归也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258355_comment'></div>不得其安，不得其归，魂羁而无托，天下之至悲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258355_comment'></div>桂林之俗，或不葬所亲，寓其骨于浮屠，而颡莫泚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258355_comment'></div>与夫远游客死，遗骸委骼，狼藉散乱而弗收者，不知其几也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258355_comment'></div>呜呼，若尔诸君，生何罪于天，而今乃至于此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258355_comment'></div>太守之来，恻然动乎其心，若己手之而弃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258355_comment'></div>属吾同僚，出公帑，营燥刚，实觉华之原，钟官之墟，郁然砥然，以为诸君之墓隧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258355_comment'></div>举凡无归之骨，而竁之域于前列者，有官君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258355_comment'></div>分封于两旁者，姓字不得冥漠，君之类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258355_comment'></div>祭之虽非其亲，藏之虽非其里，有以安而归之，何异于亲与里也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258355_comment'></div>日吉辰良，肴芬而酒旨，魂兮即安，无南无北无东西也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258355_comment'></div>牛羊弗践，樵薪避焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258355_comment'></div>诏于终古，勿毁勿夷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258355_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉，尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1258355_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1173&endYear=1173')">1173年8月</a>　在桂林，访瘗旅柩，作义塚，为文祭之。作品：《举葬文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（据《临桂县志》卷二八载，为张仲宇（德义）作。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1173&endYear=1173')">1173年8月</a>　在桂林，作《中秋赋》。作品：《桂林中秋赋 并序》<div id='poem_1258059' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258059' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258059?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂林中秋赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1173年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258059")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258059_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258059'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258059'>乾道癸巳中秋，湘南楼月色佳甚，病起不觞客，又祈雨，蔬食清坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258059_comment'></div>默数年来，九遇此夕，皆不常其处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258059_comment'></div>乙酉值三馆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258059_comment'></div>丙戌与严子文游松江，有来岁复会之约；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258059_comment'></div>丁亥又以薄遽走阳羡，与周子充遇于罨画溪上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258059_comment'></div>戊子守括苍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258059_comment'></div>己丑以经筵内宿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258059_comment'></div>庚寅使虏，次于睢阳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258059_comment'></div>辛卯出西掖，泊舟吴兴门外；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258059_comment'></div>壬辰始归石湖，而今复踰岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258059_comment'></div>叹此生之役役，次其事而赋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258059_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1258059'>登湘南以独夜兮，挹訾洲之横烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258059_comment'></div>绛霄艳其光景兮，涌冰镜于苍巅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258059_comment'></div>怅<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1258059", 1258059, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>旻宇</span>之佳节兮，并四者其良难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258059_comment'></div>矧吾生之漂泊兮，寄蘧庐于八埏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258059_comment'></div>九得秋而九徙兮，靡一枝之能安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258059_comment'></div>上瀛洲而瀑饮兮，当作噩之初元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258059_comment'></div>旋水宿于垂虹兮，滉金碧之浮天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258059_comment'></div>剋后期而竟爽兮，忽罨画之沧湾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258059_comment'></div>既戊子而守括兮，摘少微于楼栏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258059_comment'></div>丑寓直于玉堂兮，听宫漏之清圆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258059_comment'></div>再西风而北征兮，胡笳咽于夜阑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258059_comment'></div>迨返旆之期月兮，放苕霅之归船。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258059_comment'></div>幸故岁之还吴兮，带夕晖而灌园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258059_comment'></div>甘土偶之遇雨兮，就一丘而考槃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258059_comment'></div>今又飘飘而桂海兮，宾望舒于南躔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258059_comment'></div>访农圃之昨梦兮，杳征路之三千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1258059_comment'></div>月亦随予而四方兮，不择地而婵娟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1258059_comment'></div>谅素娥之我咍兮，老色涴于朱颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1258059_comment'></div>澄观月之曩见兮，炯不动而超然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1258059_comment'></div>适病馀而闭阁兮，屏危柱与哀弦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1258059_comment'></div>复讼风而闵雨兮，谢鼎食之芳鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1258059_comment'></div>阒清斋而晤叹兮，惊足迹之间关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1258059_comment'></div>谁职为此驱逐兮，岂不坐夫微官！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1258059_comment'></div>知明年之何处兮？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1258059_comment'></div>莞一笑而无眠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1258059_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1173&endYear=1173')">1173年9月</a>　在桂林，游七星岩。作品：《同登七星山题名》<div id='poem_1258336' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258336' class='poemTitle ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1173&endYear=1173')">1173年9月9日</a>　在桂林，登七星山，游栖霞、水月诸洞，有题名。<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_173582'>绣肠五车书，不鄙簿领尘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173582_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173582'>黟山与桂岭，一笑二十春。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1173&endYear=1173')">1173年</a>　在桂林，上官卖盐疏，朝廷从之。作品：《请复广西官卖盐疏》<div id='poem_1258179' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258179' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258179?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请复官卖盐疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1173年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258179")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258179_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258179'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258179'>官自卖盐，不过夺商人之利以利官，而民无折米之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258179_comment'></div>往日西路卖及八万箩，今为虚数矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258179_comment'></div>只以实卖及五万箩为率，而权以广西盐价，每一斤以一百四十文足为率，岁可得七十馀万缗，足计九十馀万缗省，霈乎其有馀矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1258179_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1173&endYear=1173')">1173年</a>　在桂林，作《重貂馆铭（并序）》作品：《重貂馆名（并序）》<div id='poem_1258347' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258347' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258347?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重貂馆铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1173年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258347")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258347_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258347'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258347'>峤南风土常燠，惟桂林最善，唐人喜咏歌之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258347_comment'></div>杜子美以谓「宜人」，白乐天以谓「无瘴」，然皆闻而知之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258347_comment'></div>戎昱实从事莫府，始有「重著貂裘」之句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258347_comment'></div>乾道九年，余辱帅事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258347_comment'></div>腊后大雪盈尺，苦寒如中州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258347_comment'></div>一坐屡索衣，至尽用顷使朔庭时所服，乃掇昱语，名西偏拥炉之室，且铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258347_comment'></div>此独以御冬，非所常居，故谓之馆云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258347_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1258347'>炎交维古羲所宅，帝墉漓濆畀南伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258347_comment'></div>清淑回薄郁以积，彼歊𤾠厉窜罔迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258347_comment'></div>宜令大冬枋厥职，雪雰霾空风剨石。<div class='inline' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258346' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258346?labeling=true' target='_blank'>复水月洞铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1174年8月）</span><span id='poem_sentence_0_1258346'>水月洞，剜漓山之麓，梁空，踞江，春水时至，湍流贯之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258346_comment'></div>石门正圆，如满月涌，光景穿映，望之皎然，名宾其实旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258346_comment'></div>近岁或以一时燕私，更其号朝阳，邦人弗从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258346_comment'></div>且隐山东洞，既曰朝阳矣，不应相重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258346_comment'></div>乾道九年秋九月初吉，吴人范成大，莆田人林光朝，考古揆宜，俾复其旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258346_comment'></div>成大又为之铭，百世之后，尚无改也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258346_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1258346'>有嵌孱颜，中淙涨湍，水清石寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258346_comment'></div>圆魄在上，终古弗爽，如月斯望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258346_comment'></div>漓山之英，漓江之灵，嫭其嘉名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258346_comment'></div>范子作颂，勒于巃嵷，水月之洞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1258346_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_11_1258349_comment'></div>名翁所命，而我铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258349_comment'></div>有宋淳熙改元嘉平日刻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1258349_comment'></div></div></div><br class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258349_comment'></div>出门，见二樵者，问曰：「洞中乐乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258349_comment'></div>跬步亦失所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258349_comment'></div>吴人范成大，小筑其处，以识幽讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258349_comment'></div>按诗卒章云：「不缘过去行方便，那得今朝会碧虚」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258349_comment'></div>即以扁榜，且铭之岩壁：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1258349'>空洞维石，中函碧虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258349_comment'></div>谁欤知津？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258349_comment'></div>有翘负刍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258349_comment'></div>我来扣门，两翁在否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258349_comment'></div>虽不能笛，能醉君酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258349_comment'></div>为君作亭，表岩之扃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258349_comment'></div>名翁所命，而我铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258349_comment'></div>有宋淳熙改元嘉平日刻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1258349_comment'></div></div></div><br ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258272")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258272_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258272'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258272'>始余自紫薇垣出帅广右，姻亲故人张饮松江，皆以炎荒风土为戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258272_comment'></div>余取唐人诗，考桂林之地，少陵谓之宜人，乐天谓之无瘴，退之至以湘南江山胜于骖鸾仙去，则宦游之适，宁有踰于此者乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258272_comment'></div>既以解亲友而遂行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258272_comment'></div>乾道九年三月既至郡，则风气清淑，果如所闻，而岩岫之奇绝，习俗之醇古，府治之雄胜，又有过所闻者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258272_comment'></div>余既不鄙夷其民，而民亦矜予之拙而信其诚，相戒毋欺侮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258272_comment'></div>岁比稔，幕府少文书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258272_comment'></div>居二年，余心安焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258272_comment'></div>承诏徙镇全蜀，亟上疏，固谢不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258272_comment'></div>留再阅月，辞勿获命，乃与桂民别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258272_comment'></div>民觞客于途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258272_comment'></div>既出郭，又留二日，始得去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258272_comment'></div>航潇湘，绝洞庭，溯滟滪，驰驱两川，半年达于成都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258272_comment'></div>道中无事，时念昔游，因追记其登临之处与风物土宜，凡方志所未载者，萃为一书，蛮陬绝徼见闻可纪者，亦附著之，以备<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1258272", 1258272, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>土训</span>之图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258272_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258272_comment'></div>锦城以名都乐国闻天下，余幸得至焉，然且惓惓于桂林，至为之缀缉琐碎如此，盖以信余之不鄙夷其民，虽去之远，且在名都乐国而犹弗忘之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258272_comment'></div>淳熙二年乙未长至日，吴郡范成大至能书<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1258272'></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1258272_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1258272'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_1258272_0'>⑴ 《桂海虞衡志》卷首，四库全书本。又见《方舆胜览》卷三八，《粤西文载》卷五一，《古今游名山记》卷一四，《皕宋楼藏书志》卷三四，《万卷精华楼藏书记》卷四四，《静嘉堂秘籍志》卷二○，嘉庆《广西通志》卷二一一。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1258272_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1258343' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258343")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258343_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258343'><div class='articleSentence' 兴安

id='poem_sentence_8_173493'>班荆一炊顷，听此昆弟语。<div id='poem_sentence_8_173493_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_173493'>把酒不能觞，有泪若儿女。<div id='poem_sentence_9_173493_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_173493'>脩程各著鞭，慷慨中夜舞。<div id='poem_sentence_10_173493_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_173493'>功名在公等，臞儒老农圃。<div id='poem_sentence_11_173493_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_173493'></div><div -----title
巫山
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='51d36651ccc249c9a3e5249d01cf2ce2_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("51d36651ccc249c9a3e5249d01cf2ce2");'><span id='51d36651ccc249c9a3e5249d01cf2ce2_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1175&endYear=1175')">1175年</a>，50岁</div><div id='51d36651ccc249c9a3e5249d01cf2ce2' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>自人鲊甕登舟至巫山，作《劳畬耕》。作品：《劳畬耕并序》<div id='poem_173474' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173474' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173474?labeling=true' target='_blank'>劳畬耕</a><span class='authorDate'>（1175年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_173474")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_173474_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_173474'>畬田，峡中刀耕火种之地也。春初斫山，众木尽蹶，至当种时，伺有雨候。则前一夕火之，藉其灰以粪。明日雨作，乘热土下种，即苗盛倍收，无雨反是。山多硗确，地力薄，则一再斫烧始可蓺。春种麦豆，作饼饵以度，夏秋则粟熟矣。官输甚微，巫山民以收粟三百斛为率，财用三四斛了二税。食三物以终年，虽平生不识粳稻，而未尝苦饥。余因记吴中号多嘉谷，而公私之输顾重，田家得粒食者无几，峡农之不若也。作诗以劳之。</div><div id='poem_preface_173474_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173474'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173474'>峡农生甚艰，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_173474", 173474, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>斫畬</span>大山巅。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173474'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_173474", 173474, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>赤埴</span>无土膏，三刀财一田。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173474'>颇具穴居智，占雨先燎原。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173474'>雨来亟下种，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_173474", 173474, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>不尔</span>生不蕃。<div id='poem_sentence_3_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173474'>麦穗黄剪剪，豆苗绿<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_173474", 173474, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>芊芊</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_173474'>饼饵了长夏，更迟秋粟繁。<div id='poem_sentence_5_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_173474'>税亩不什一，遗秉得餍餐。<div id='poem_sentence_6_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_173474'>何曾识粳稻，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_173474", 173474, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>扪腹</span>尝果然。<div id='poem_sentence_7_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_173474'>我知吴农事，请为峡农言。<div id='poem_sentence_8_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_173474'>吴田<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_173474", 173474, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>黑壤</span>腴，吴米玉粒鲜。<div id='poem_sentence_9_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_173474'>长腰瓠犀瘦，齐头珠颗圆。<div id='poem_sentence_10_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_173474'>红莲胜彫胡，香子馥秋兰。<div id='poem_sentence_11_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_173474'>或收虞舜馀，或自占城传。<div id='poem_sentence_12_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_173474'>早籼与晚䆉，滥吹甑甗间。<div id='poem_sentence_13_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_173474'>不辞春<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_173474", 173474, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>养禾</span>，但畏秋输官。<div id='poem_sentence_14_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_173474'>奸吏大雀鼠，盗胥众螟蝝。<div id='poem_sentence_15_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_173474'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_173474", 173474, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>掠剩</span>增釜区，取盈折缗钱。<div id='poem_sentence_16_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_173474'>两钟致一斛，未免<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_173474", 173474, id='poem_sentence_18_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_173474'>晶晶云子饭，生世不下咽。<div id='poem_sentence_19_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_173474'>食者定游手，种者长流涎。<div id='poem_sentence_20_173474_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_173474'>不如峡农饱，豆麦终残年。<div href='/Writing/1258184?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞凤州不测互相应援疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙二年九月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258184")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258184_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258184'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258184'>相度乞下兴州都统司，如凤州不测缓急，所有应援一节，一面应机将附近军马遣发前去，却申制司照会。</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1258184_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1175&endYear=1175')">1175年10月</a>　在成都，上疏，调选戍卒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1175&endYear=1175')">1175年</a>　在成都，上书言边事。作品：《请剿文州夷疏（姑系于此）》<div id='poem_1258169' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258169' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258169?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请剿文州夷疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1175年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258169")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258169_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258169'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258169'>臣伏见四蜀沿边蛮夷，自政和以前，虽有时侵犯边境，当时朝廷鲜曾容贷，旋即举兵问罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258169_comment'></div>固未必皆有大功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258169_comment'></div>然夷人终是畏惮，不敢无时轻发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258169_comment'></div>比年以来，如成都府路嘉、黎、雅三州等处，屡有边事，时议以外备大敌，姑务含忍，又以方市战马，不欲阻绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258169_comment'></div>夷人狃习，谓中国终不能报复，来则有虏掠之利，退则无追蹑之忧，甚者反得犒赏财物，过于未叛之时，是以泰然无所顾忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258169_comment'></div>蜀之诸边，盖未尝得数岁无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258169_comment'></div>迩者，利州西路文州界内，有蕃部侵犯寨堡，杀掠人兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258169_comment'></div>访闻常年如此，官司每是隐忍蔽覆，终于和断而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258169_comment'></div>契勘今来作过蕃部，据边吏张皇关申，其众亦不过三四百人，初无雄杰酋长为之谋，又无坚甲利兵为之用，国家屯戍大军，密迩其处，蕞尔小蕃，乃敢跳踉如此者，政以习见近事故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258169_comment'></div>若不惜暂劳小费，并力讨荡，期于不贷，则岂独文州蕃戎詟惧，其他种落，自此惩创，知中国不可侵犯，此西陲数十年安静之长算也，臣已榜下文州，止告谕非作过蕃部，且许自通贸易，以解散其缔结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258169_comment'></div>又闻蕃寇之来，稍不得利，即依林菁以自固，官军深入，易落奸便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258169_comment'></div>臣亦已行下乘风焚山，严兵清野，徐用乡道，捣其巢穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258169_comment'></div>惟是议者或以为文州系买马地分，恐不即和断，或至阻隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258169_comment'></div>臣再三询究茶马司所买马数，文州不当十之一二，又其品凡下，非宕昌比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258169_comment'></div>兼今来作过主首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258169_comment'></div>止是一族，虽加攻讨，自不妨馀族互市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258169_comment'></div>政使缘此而所买马数少减于常年，权边防利害之重轻，亦恐自有先后缓急之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258169_comment'></div>或又谓朝廷方以备北虏为急，此等癣疥，合且姑息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258169_comment'></div>臣窃谓不然，大敌未平，尤当先除腹心之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258169_comment'></div>诸葛亮岂一日忘中原哉，然五月渡泸，深入不毛，以定南中者，盖出此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258169_comment'></div>不然，方今关外宁肃，而蛮夷敢扰动如此，使岐雍有警，则此等窥伺侵寇，将何所不至！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258169_comment'></div>臣暂此摄事，实有不敢以茍纾岁月为心，而妄为西土画息肩之策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258169_comment'></div>若万分有一，偶合睿旨，欲乞出自圣断，更赐行下兴州都统制吴挺，广设方略，讨荡施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258169_comment'></div>其措置催督之类，臣虽庸愚，不敢不任其责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258169_comment'></div>所有文州数百匹之马，或不及岁额，亦乞暂置度外，俟边防安静，不患马额之不复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258169_comment'></div>臣区区狂率，干犯天威，伏地战越。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1258169_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1175&endYear=1175')">1175年</a>　就蜀帅任，有谢表、谢宰执启。作品：《帅蜀谢表》<div id='poem_1258118' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1175&endYear=1175')">1175年</a>　在成都，将朝廷措置和糴诏谕刻石。作品：《答措置和籴戒谕诏疏》《答措置和籴诏疏》<div id='poem_1258170' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258170' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258170?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答措置和籴戒谕诏疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1175年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258170")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258170_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258170'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258170'>淳熙二年七月，诏复四川制置使，以成都府路安抚制置使臣成大摄使事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258170_comment'></div>臣辞弗获命，奉印章唯谨，于兵民之政，莫敢有所罢行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258170_comment'></div>厥十一月，皇帝亲御翰墨，赐臣戒谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258170_comment'></div>云章自天，光被昌莽，昭回震耀，不可椟藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258170_comment'></div>谨昧死立石，与群有司共之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258170_comment'></div>切惟井络之区，最远天极，吏之勤逸，民之休戚，军政之否臧，不能以时上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258170_comment'></div>蜀父老之病久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258170_comment'></div>陛下明见万里，无隐弗烛，一札十行，有德有刑，雷风鼓舞，咫尺在上，若见若闻，靡不兢慄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258170_comment'></div>臣冒阃外之寄，才薄望轻，不敢先事举职，敢烦威命之辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258170_comment'></div>臣救过且不暇，其何能奉宣大律，以肃官政，犹日夜引领，庶几万一者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258170_comment'></div>惟陛下亟命重臣，俾大此官，讲明宪度，罔有废格，则台家长无西顾之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258170_comment'></div>臣诚大幸，卒蒙全覆，归伏田亩，以终于戾，臣之愿也，非所敢望也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1258170_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1258170'><span class='label'>按：</span>题下原有《赐范成大措置和籴戒谕诏》，今删。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1258170_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1258173' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258173' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258173?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答措置和籴诏疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1175年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258173")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258173_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258173'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258173'>臣窃惟秦陇宿兵，数十年饟道回远者仰哺于籴，此公私俱赡之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258173_comment'></div>吏亡状，猥以贱贾，取盈于民，弊久滋益，至有蓓蓰常赋十以上者，愁叹之声，彻于听闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258173_comment'></div>皇帝若曰：民惟邦本，本固邦宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258173_comment'></div>矧兹遐氓，奈何重困之，且何以震叠丑类，怀徕旧俗！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258173_comment'></div>故自淳熙二年以来，诏旨为和籴而下者，亡虑八九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258173_comment'></div>惟阶、成、和、凤四郡最并边，发政施仁，宜自今始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258173_comment'></div>既蠲籴一年，又下玺书赐臣，使讲求馀财以代民力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258173_comment'></div>臣驽闇乏会计才，久之莫知所出，姑请增贾九之一，勿收头子钱，罢盘量检察官，若朘削本钱苛斗面之弊，一切禁绝，诏可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258173_comment'></div>是岁关外小旱，而四州菽粟顾狼戾，三家之市，皆熙如春台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258173_comment'></div>充代之荣，犹有能尽如圣训，而觌德之应，其捷固已如此，愚心了然，见王道之易易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258173_comment'></div>敬奉奎画，被之琬琰，以临昭西土，使凡有司咸谕天子德意志虑，且以见仁义之得民，诚有速于置邮，承流宣化者其可以不勉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1258173_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>　在成都，新甃石筍街成。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>　在成都，上疏请免蜀中酒赋，并论和籴之害。作品：《论关外四州岁苦和糴劄子》《请减免蜀中酒课奏劄》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>　在成都，上奏论赦囿囚徒之道。作品：《论赦寡囚徒之道奏状》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>　在成都，请朝廷修明将兵之政，责州郡军政之实。作品：《论兵制疏》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>　在成都，请严选诸州将官，应以材武之人充之，不得虚占员数。作品：《论任将疏》<div id='poem_1258172' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258172' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258172?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论任将疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1176年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258172")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258172_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258172'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258172'>臣伏见诸路将兵部辖官，自总管、钤辖而下，则有正副将、部队将、教押军队等官，及沿边主兵窠阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258172_comment'></div>于法，应以材武人充者，皆须事艺可观，胆勇可仗，方为称职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258172_comment'></div>其次，亦须稍知弓马，略识行阵，或人材身手真是武臣者，乃可为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258172_comment'></div>除总管至州钤皆系朝廷选差别有格法外，窃见诸州将官以下窠阙，或以出职杂流及私家给使之人为之，而西蜀尤甚，于弓马行阵懵然不知，使吾选士技卒俯首于下，听驱使而受鞭笞，寻常不平于心，缓急宁肯共力？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258172_comment'></div>此不待智者而知其不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258172_comment'></div>伏睹近降圣旨，今后正将差曾经从军立功，或曾任兵官，并沿边巡尉及经捕盗有劳之人，仰详处分，深合事宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258172_comment'></div>但今来新格，未及副将以下者，岂非以正将得人，则副将以下尚可容其滥吹耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258172_comment'></div>臣窃谓若正将与副将以下同在一处，则可只严选正将一员以为表率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258172_comment'></div>今姑以蜀中诸州论之，则大不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258172_comment'></div>盖副将以下，乃分屯别州，名为副队，其实各当一面，与正将了不相关，而责任一同，皆难以用有名无实之人，缓急误事，悔之恐晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258172_comment'></div>臣愚欲望圣裁，应副将以下官合分屯处，并依今来正将已得指挥，其沿边主兵窠阙，应以材武人充者，亦不得以杂流出职及给使无武艺人虚占员阙，及不许时暂差权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258172_comment'></div>内或有杰然自有武艺智略者，从帅臣保明以闻，特与差注，及许一面权摄，以防遗材，仰副陛下整军经武之实，上肃军政，下厌士心。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1258172_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>　在成都，论黎州买马事。作品：《论黎州买马奏状》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>　在成都，论奏蜀中军政答劄子。作品：《乞免移屯戍军与执政答宣谕劄子》《辟兵官劄子》《论民兵义士劄子》《论蜀兵贫乏劄子》《论知人劄子》<div id='poem_1258208' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258208' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258208?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞免移屯与执政答宣谕劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1176年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258208")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258208_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258208'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258208'>某昨奉钧诲，传谕上指，议欲移屯潼川、绵州大军二千人前来成都，并听成都帅臣节制等事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258208_comment'></div>窃惟成都会府，根本全蜀，而武备玩弛，卒乘单弱，若增屯大军，诚可折冲，惟是潼川、绵州两军屯戍，皆经四五十年，老身长子，各已成家，婚姻盘错，填垄相望，揆之常情，恐未免安土重迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258208_comment'></div>必先为之经画措置，曲尽其宜，使盘挈之初，免家具破散之忧，既到之后，无暴露羁旅之戚，人忘其徙，家安其旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258208_comment'></div>然后有利无害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258208_comment'></div>略计营垒支犒之费，无虑十有馀万，非一日可遽办者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258208_comment'></div>至于目下，脱有奸盗窃发一切缓急事宜有合调发去处，缘去年复再置四川制置司时，已有九月五日专降圣旨，依条具合行事务，内一项：「四川诸州奸宄夷獠之患，许从制置司审度事势，差发都统司西兵捍御」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258208_comment'></div>今来成都帅臣系兼四川制置使，遵照上件指挥，于诸处屯兵自可节制奉行，不至阙误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258208_comment'></div>所有移屯，欲乞钧慈特赐开陈，少宽限期，容某续更子细相度，并计算所费万数，条具申闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258208_comment'></div>某博询熟究，以致拜答稽缓，伏乞钧慈特赐矜恕。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1258208'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1258208_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258205' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258205' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258205?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辟兵官劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1176年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258205")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258205_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258205'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258205'>臣契勘四川去朝廷绝远，事之利害，与近甸不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258205_comment'></div>自关外宿师以来，多有离军使臣及将家子弟所在侨寓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258205_comment'></div>外铨阙少，注拟不行，往往衣食匮乏，狼狈无归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258205_comment'></div>其间却有材武卓然堪备任使之人，失职久闲，理当收恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258205_comment'></div>旧来朝廷将四川城寨兵官八十六阙，专令制置司量才差辟，最有深意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258205_comment'></div>近准尚书省劄子，坐据吏部申请，称上件窠阙本司未见辟人，欲从吏部权行差注一次行下，止令遵依已降指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258205_comment'></div>臣有以见陛下圣谟神断，洞照万里，至纤至悉，无不周尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258205_comment'></div>不然，则前项失职之人愈更坐困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258205_comment'></div>臣照得上件窠阙自前宣抚制置司节次差辟，未尝阙员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258205_comment'></div>止是右选小官，邈在万里，类皆贫窭，无力赴部计会赴身，因循就禄，不敢更校资任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258205_comment'></div>间有到吏部者，或以小节退难取会，往返动是经岁，更一往复，则已任满罢去矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258205_comment'></div>就令无所沮难，得给付身，又被干人抽藏邀取厚利，或将质当钱物因而沉失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258205_comment'></div>以此奉辟之书，实是艰于上达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258205_comment'></div>又前此差辟，不曾一一拍试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258205_comment'></div>自臣到任，尽革弊倖，遇有陈乞差遣者，躬赴教场，按阅事艺，取四色材武应选之人，依资次差辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258205_comment'></div>如武艺不应格者，即令归部参选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258205_comment'></div>向来医卜给使，及进纳吏职之流，与夫癃老疾病、选懦无技者，皆不得以滥吹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258205_comment'></div>臣用此规模，一年以来，沿边城寨诸州将佐皆易以材武之人，几以太半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258205_comment'></div>只更数月，可以尽变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258205_comment'></div>既已择之之精，此等各望资历寸进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258205_comment'></div>臣今逐一与之点对，照验付身，起发奏辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258205_comment'></div>每十员或二十员，作一番保明，自用递筒申发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258205_comment'></div>欲望圣慈降下吏部照会，所给付身乞勿付亲事官及干事人等，并从吏部复用皮筒，递付本司给散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258205_comment'></div>如内有小节不圆，未至切害去处，即乞先次放行，续下本司取会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258205_comment'></div>庶几川远孤进，行五旧人，皆得成就考任，安心效职，为惠甚大，所系不轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258205_comment'></div>取进止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258205_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1258205'>〔贴黄〕臣又契勘：四川大小臣，止缘不即起辟，给降付身，视城寨要害之处，止似权局，不为固志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1258205_comment'></div>又缘举辟官不测替移，被差官亦遂罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1258205_comment'></div>只如去年一年，宣抚司所差，先经郑闻选差一次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1258205_comment'></div>郑闻罢，则随司亦罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1258205_comment'></div>次经沈复差代一次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1258205_comment'></div>沈复罢，则又亦随罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1258205_comment'></div>是一年之间，沿边城寨元不曾有正官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1258205_comment'></div>边防如此，安得不虑？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1258205_comment'></div>此皆缘不即时辟奏，给降付身，所以致然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1258205_comment'></div>伏乞睿照。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1258205'></div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1258205_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258206' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258206' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258206?labeling=true' target='_blank'>又论民兵义士劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1176年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258206")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258206_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258206'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258206'>臣闻天下之议论，常患于易偏，今之言民兵者是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258206_comment'></div>以为可用者，则谓便成一军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258206_comment'></div>以为无用者，则谓不如其已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258206_comment'></div>而不知可用与否，各有所在，未可一偏议也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258206_comment'></div>五方之人，风气不同，强弱各异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258206_comment'></div>臣以身之闻见考之，江浙近地所谓民兵者，直保伍役夫耳，诚不足恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258206_comment'></div>乃若关外之义士，荆襄之义勇，勇鸷健武，人材绝异，技艺纪律，性习所使，虽正军锐卒，未能远过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258206_comment'></div>无廪兵之费，有胜兵之实，养威藏用，最为上策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258206_comment'></div>朝廷要当爱护拊循，特加之意；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258206_comment'></div>申严其法而便安之，讲明其利而增广之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258206_comment'></div>所谓申严其法者，谓如近年关外诸色守把官军，皆已抽回，无人充代，便欲就差义士，拘系于官，轻变成法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258206_comment'></div>朝廷行下禁止，制、帅两司虽已施行，即不知已未依应，当从朝廷立限催促，非因调发，永不得差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258206_comment'></div>又如前此用兵之际，或先驱义士，以尝寇饵敌，弃如草菅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258206_comment'></div>军还有功，赏又弗逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258206_comment'></div>父老至今尝以为言，当从朝廷立定节制，别分头项，使用其长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258206_comment'></div>如是，则其法尽善矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258206_comment'></div>所谓讲明其利而增广之者，谓如关外忠勇一军，皆有蠲免科籴则例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258206_comment'></div>近闻天恩旷荡，已与权免籴一年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258206_comment'></div>若自此以后，常得中熟，虽难永免，自可减科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258206_comment'></div>既薄其税租之输，又严其拘役之禁，则关外民丁，皆有馀裕，凡强壮者，皆可增籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258206_comment'></div>又如荆襄义勇，臣过而见之，荆南一处，已逾万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258206_comment'></div>闻止是团结主户，而客户有力者实多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258206_comment'></div>议者亦谓尚可通融措置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258206_comment'></div>各乞下逐路帅臣，密切相度，申取圣裁，如是，则其利无遗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258206_comment'></div>臣载惟梁荆之民，健武根蒂，攻有馀力，守不待劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258206_comment'></div>若便如此加意，可以特将成军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258206_comment'></div>所有教阅小费，比之养兵，减省十倍以上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1258206_comment'></div>而其人可恃，较之汎然招刺游手之徒、羸弱逃亡常相半者，不可同年而语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1258206_comment'></div>如狂言可采，伏乞圣慈次第施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1258206_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1258206_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258210' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258210' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258210?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论蜀兵贫乏劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1176年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258210")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258210_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258210'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258210'>臣契勘蜀中养兵用民力者，五十年矣，宜军中之富实，而迩来贫乏者众，甚轸顾忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258210_comment'></div>原其致贫之由，皆谓初招军时，止是单身，其后婚娶，人口渐多，势不能给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258210_comment'></div>前来宣抚司措置给钱付都统司，使自回易，以资贴累重之人，每月添支粮米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258210_comment'></div>缘本钱不多，军中营运不行，近来多是以钱放偿与合添支人，谓如每月借与钱引伍千，即令出息一千，便将息钱准折添支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258210_comment'></div>虽军士少济急阙之须，而实无增添之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258210_comment'></div>臣尝议军中回易，非本钱宽馀，无以得倍称之息，又非三两年间可以见效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258210_comment'></div>要当为之算计，其所合添支者若干，合用息钱若干，计其取息，合用本钱若干，然后可以冀实惠之孚尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258210_comment'></div>所谓合与添支之数者，臣尝试拖照支帐，略加料度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258210_comment'></div>蜀军虽九万馀人，除将佐职事官俸给优厚外，又除入队使人，正兵弓箭手有职名人，旧宣司效用义兵强兵等人，月粮本色及折估添支，有得钱引二十道以上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258210_comment'></div>敢勇月粮本色及折估添支，有得钱引八道上下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258210_comment'></div>最强弓手月粮本色及折估添支，亦得钱引六道上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258210_comment'></div>皆粗可足用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258210_comment'></div>以上色额，并不须添支，并不入队人亦未须商议外，其馀入队长行委有贫乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258210_comment'></div>盖缘关外军粮招收放请之制，单身者于所请粮内，以五斗折估钱引，两口者以二斗折估钱引，三口之家则无折估。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258210_comment'></div>当时计口折估，止为粮贵折估贱，故口众者不折，本意欲以优恤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258210_comment'></div>二十年来，粮米价贱，折估价贵，口众之人，全得正色破卖，比之折钱，亏少钱引一道上下，所以累重，全请正色人尤难支梧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258210_comment'></div>此蜀军贫乏之要领也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258210_comment'></div>今当将上件三色长行折估，少者不以口计，量与增折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258210_comment'></div>谓如无折估者，与折二斗三斗之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258210_comment'></div>及强弓手，元添支银三钱，止折得钱引七分五釐，委是微不能济用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258210_comment'></div>枪手等第，亦与此同，亦当与量行增添折银分数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258210_comment'></div>谓如钱引如七分五釐者，添作一引以上之类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258210_comment'></div>两项合与增添者，止以入队人为率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258210_comment'></div>其使臣及其职名人并不入队人，皆不须问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258210_comment'></div>欲望处分将臣此议，以总领财赋官令不下司，密切算计上件人合量与添支数目，共计一岁当费若干，用若干本钱可得上件利息支用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258210_comment'></div>或非目下回易所能办，而所费钱数不多，朝廷可以调度，即乞出自圣慈，特与添给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258210_comment'></div>盖回易逐利，非止目下未能见效，兼军中贸迁，不无搔扰，将兵干当，亦废教习，前来已曾给钱营运，至今措置未行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1258210_comment'></div>臣故为回易之说，切有疑虑，今乞并下总领官，令多方相度，别更有何策可以贴济，奏取圣裁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1258210_comment'></div>兹事体大，伏望留神省察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1258210_comment'></div>取进止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1258210_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1258210'>〔贴黄〕臣劄子中所谓欲问总领所更有何策可以贴济者，切见目今军中比宣抚使虞允文打算之时使臣离军大半，其支折钱估，比旧额当须减省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1258210_comment'></div>兼不入队人内有使臣及军兵有职名大请受之人，数目不少，亦渐合拣退，自此支折钱估，亦当减省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1258210_comment'></div>恐有那融得行之理，故乞并下总领官，究心措置相度。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1258210_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258199' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258199' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258199?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论知人劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1176年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258199")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258199_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258199'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258199'>臣闻古今未尝有不生才之世，而君子常患于无知人之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258199_comment'></div>今有知人之明，则天下之人无不才者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258199_comment'></div>无知人之明，而徒起乏才之叹，是亦厚诬天下而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258199_comment'></div>不知其知兵而使之治财，不知其知财而使之治礼，及其不集事也，则均受不才之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258199_comment'></div>一旦各以其所长，易地而使之，三人者犹前日之人也，而各以其才称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258199_comment'></div>一动其机，才否为之变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258199_comment'></div>是机也，非智力之所能为，天与之明，道与之妙，其于人也，交际密庸于精神视听之表，固不可以言语笔舌谕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258199_comment'></div>文王之立政，克知三有宅心，灼见三有俊心，是以有能官人之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258199_comment'></div>夫谓之克知，谓之灼见，此岂有谕而可传哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258199_comment'></div>今不先究知人之明，而但起乏才之叹，不谓诬，可乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258199_comment'></div>臣尝谓钱谷甲兵，万事之统，皆可以立说，惟人才不知，不可以置论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258199_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258199_comment'></div>知人之明，在人君心术之微，而非变政易令之所及故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258199_comment'></div>呜呼，知人之明尚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258199_comment'></div>其次莫若公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258199_comment'></div>公虽非明，而可以生明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258199_comment'></div>去胸中之私喜怒，用天下之公是非，以进退天下之才，虽不能皆当，要亦十得七八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258199_comment'></div>伏惟圣明省臣激切而加意焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1258199_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>　在成都，有措施边事及乞免黎州欠负诸奏。作品：《论措置边事及乞免黎州欠负奏劄》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1176&endYear=1176')">1176年</a>　在成都，有奏疏论川中税事。作品：《请减放四川酒课折估虚额钱疏》《四川酒课虚额减放蜀民感恩疏》<div id='poem_1258187' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258187' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258187?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请减放四川酒课折估虚额钱疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙三年六月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258187")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258187_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258187'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258187'>四川酒课折估虚额钱四十七万馀缗，乞自淳熙三年为始减放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258187_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1258187_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258188' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258188' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258188?labeling=true' target='_blank'>四川酒课虚额减放蜀民感恩疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙三年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258188")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258188_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258188'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258188'>陛下俯念四蜀酒课虚额之弊，乃六月十二日诏书，各与次第蠲减，岁蠲上供缗钱四十七万，为蜀民代补赡军折估之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258188_comment'></div>令下之日，百万生灵，鼓舞驩呼，如脱沟壑，寰区四路州县节次申到，自今年七月十五日以后，各于寺观启建感恩祝圣道场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258188_comment'></div>臣谨按庆历六年三司使王拱宸建议榷河北沧、滨两州盐，仁宗皇帝曰：「使人顿食贵盐，岂朕意哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258188_comment'></div>下诏弗许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258188_comment'></div>河朔父老相率拜迎于澶州，为佛老会，报上恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258188_comment'></div>今举四蜀之广，民心爱戴，不侔同辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258188_comment'></div>宜与河朔故事俱传不朽，伏望宣付史馆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1258188_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: />年份未详　在成都，上《言飞虎军可用疏》<div id='poem_1258189' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258189' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258189?labeling=true' target='_blank'>言飞虎军可用疏</a><span id='poem_content_173030'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173030'>眼看白露点苍苔，岁月飞流首屡回。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173030_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
