ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>　在成都，为《成都古今丙记序》。<div id='poem_1258275' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258275' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258275?labeling=true' target='_blank'>成都古今丙记序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1177年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258275")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258275_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258275'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258275'>《前记》，赵清献公作于熙宁七年甲寅，凡三十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258275_comment'></div>蜀之始封及分野，梁、益州，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1258275", 1258275, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>剑南</span>，西川，成都府属郡县得名之所自，废置因革之不同，考之详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258275_comment'></div>后八十七年，当绍兴三十年庚辰，王恭简公续为之记，有辨其差误，附益其未载者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258275_comment'></div>二记今皆具在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258275_comment'></div>《续记》之成，距今才十有八年，虽事之当书者不至甚夥，然恐自是日月寖久，来者难考，乃蒐耳目所及者继书之，名曰《丙记》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258275_comment'></div>其二记已载者，皆不重出云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1258275_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>　在成都，上《乞关防蜀中度牒之弊奏》。<div id='poem_1258139' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258139' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258139?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞关防蜀中度牒之弊奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙四年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258139")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258139_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258139'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258139'>蜀中一度牒卖钱引七百一十道，一紫衣止卖钱引六七十道，少者三四十道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258139_comment'></div>小人贪十倍之利，又不费织作，止是楷改数字，以冒法为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258139_comment'></div>当令省部措置，止将上件四川逐司见在绫纸放纸背批凿给散年月及用印记，并置合同号簿勘同等，以为关防。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1258139_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年3月</a>　在成都，上《民为邦本劄子》。<div id='poem_1258175' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258175' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258175?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论邦本疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1177年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258175")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258175_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258175'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258175'>臣闻民惟邦本，本固邦宁，帝兴王成，未有不得民而能立邦家之基也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258175_comment'></div>得民有道，仁之而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258175_comment'></div>省徭役，薄赋敛，蠲其疾苦而便安之，使民力有馀而其心油然，知后德之抚我，则虽天不能使之变，而况蛮夷盗贼水旱之作，安能摇其本而轻动哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258175_comment'></div>此甚易知易行，而后之论治者，往往过计，谓天下之大，将人人而济之，安得力而给诸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258175_comment'></div>于是轻言功利，而重言道德，卒之道德不建，而功利亦无闻焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258175_comment'></div>虽然，论治者皆以仁民为难，而臣今敢以为非难者，诚有得于圣主躬行之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258175_comment'></div>小臣将命，实亲见之者，请略详其目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258175_comment'></div>乃者，四蜀酒估之患，人不聊生，陛下睿断，岁捐钱五十万以代之偿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258175_comment'></div>此令一下，五十馀郡驩呼祝圣者，沸天隐地，旬日皆遍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258175_comment'></div>士大夫舞手相庆，以谓吾蜀当有数十百年之安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258175_comment'></div>臣于是知民之易德有如此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258175_comment'></div>又如关外和籴之困、诏旨下询，有司未知所出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258175_comment'></div>陛下睿断，先免阶、成、和、凤一年之籴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258175_comment'></div>异时岁虽大熟，不足输官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258175_comment'></div>淳熙三年，免籴令下，秋旱薄收，而四川粒米狼戾，充箱溢筥，排门求售，较之穰岁，物价反平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258175_comment'></div>漕臣行部过之，边氓遮道诵说，东向感恩，或至涕下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258175_comment'></div>臣于是知民之易德，有如此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258175_comment'></div>恭惟圣主端委穆清之上，一动其念，加诸远民，而万里之外，觌德丕应，捷如影响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258175_comment'></div>微臣不佞，愚心了然，见王道之易易焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258175_comment'></div>孟子谓保民而王，易若折枝，而非挟山超海之难，不为过论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258175_comment'></div>臣拳拳之诚，更愿帝德广运，益加圣心，深诏内外执事，晓然知陛下仁民固本之指，凡吾民疾苦，悉以上闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258175_comment'></div>茍有可以惠利便安之者，勿牵故常，临以睿断，使光天之下，至于海隅，苍生罔有不被尧舜之泽，如是，则众心成城，道德有威，推恩以保四海，天下可运诸掌矣，其何大欲之不济哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258175_comment'></div>此陛下躬行之效，證于孟轲之言，非臣臆说，惟圣神财幸。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1258175_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>　在成都，朝廷下《措置和籴诏》，为之刻石作跋。作品：《<措置和籴诏>刻石题跋》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>　在成都，和陆游春愁诗。作品：《陆务观作春愁曲悲甚作诗反之》<div id='poem_173492' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173492' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/173492?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陆务观作春愁曲悲甚作诗反之</a><span class='authorDate'>（1177年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_173492")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_173492_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173492'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173492'>东风本是繁华主，天地元无著愁处。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173492'>诗人多事惹閒情，閒门自造愁如许。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173492'>病翁老矣痴复顽，风前一笑春无边。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173492'>糟床夜鸣如落泉，一杯正与人相关。<div id='poem_sentence_3_173492_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173492'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_173492_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>　在成都，奏请朝廷早日为西兵别立营寨。作品：《催西兵营寨劄子》<div id='poem_1258209' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258209' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258209?labeling=true' target='_blank'>催西兵营寨劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1177年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258209")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258209_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258209'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258209'>臣契勘黎州比蒙朝廷添屯西兵，最为良策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258209_comment'></div>盖徼外蕃落，从来以西兵为重，谓之吃人肉虏子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258209_comment'></div>只如近日，就黎州处置叛将王文才，既斩首讫，其见屯西兵，竞分其肉食之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258209_comment'></div>互市诸蛮，皆环布震叠，面无人色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258209_comment'></div>但前此西兵未有营寨，只就城内寺院驻劄，而互市诸蕃，亦入城安泊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258209_comment'></div>臣窃虑往来日久，不免与西兵相遇于途，人情浸熟，渐忘畏惮，无以养威，遂行下知黎州禄柬之，令于城外别立西兵营寨，不令无时入城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258209_comment'></div>柬之已于北城之外，得宽闲寨基，所有起立营房及将官廨宇之类，臣即已拨支合用钱数，尽付柬之，未见申到兴工时日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258209_comment'></div>臣今去官，合具奏禀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258209_comment'></div>伏乞朝廷行下四川制置司及黎州催促，取令日下了毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258209_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1258209_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年4月</a>　在成都，朝廷𢓊诏至，将离任。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>　在成都，陆游、李石有诗送行。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>　在成都，以文学、政事被李垕称为帅蜀之贤者。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>　在成都，上《请支移劄子》。作品：《论支移劄子》<div id='poem_1258220' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258220' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258220?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论支移劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1177年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258220")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258220_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258220'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258220'>内郡拖欠，因循弗偿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258220_comment'></div>边守望轻，莫能理索，拥其空城，坐受艰窘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258220_comment'></div>群蛮习见，意轻中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258220_comment'></div>如眉州输叙州米万石，止与百石、五十石，或全不应副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258220_comment'></div>乞责四路漕臣参酌，别立中制。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1258220'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1258220_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>　在成都，作《石经始末记》。<div id='poem_1258322' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258322' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258322?labeling=true' target='_blank'>石经始末记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1177年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258322")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258322_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258322'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258322'>石经已载《前记》，晁子止作《考异》而为之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258322_comment'></div>《考异》之作，大抵以监本参考，互有得失，其间颠倒缺讹，所当辨正，然古今字画，虽小不同，而实通用耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258322_comment'></div>《考异》并序，凡二十一碑，具在石经堂中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258322_comment'></div>子止之序曰：「鸿都石经，自迁徙邺、雍，遂茫昧于人间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258322_comment'></div>至唐太和中，复刊十二经，立石国学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258322_comment'></div>而唐长兴中，诏国子博士田敏与其僚校诸经，镂之版，故今世六学之传，独此二本尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258322_comment'></div>按赵清献公《成都记》，伪蜀相毋昭裔捐俸金，取九经琢石于学宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258322_comment'></div>而或又云：毋昭裔依太和旧本，令张德钊书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258322_comment'></div>国朝皇祐中，田元均补刻公羊高、谷梁赤二传，然后十二经始全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258322_comment'></div>至宣和间，席文献又刻孟轲书，参焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258322_comment'></div>今考之，伪相实毋昭裔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258322_comment'></div>《孝经》、《论语》、《尔雅》，广政甲辰岁张德钊书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258322_comment'></div>《周易》，辛亥岁杨钧、孙逢吉书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258322_comment'></div>《尚书》，周德正书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258322_comment'></div>《周礼》，孙朋吉书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258322_comment'></div>《毛诗》、《礼记》、《仪礼》，张绍文书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258322_comment'></div>《左氏传》，不志何人书，而详观其字画，亦必为蜀人所书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258322_comment'></div>然则蜀之立石盖十经，其书者，不独德钊，而能尽用太和本，固已可嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258322_comment'></div>凡历八年，其石千数，昭裔独辨之，尤伟然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258322_comment'></div>公武异时守三荣，尝讨国子监所模长兴版本读之，其差误盖多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258322_comment'></div>昔议者谓太和石本授写弗精，时人弗之许，而世以长兴版本为便，国初遂颁布天下，收向日民间写本不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258322_comment'></div>然有讹舛，无由参校判知其谬，犹以为官既刊定，难于独改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258322_comment'></div>由是而观，石经固脱错，而监本亦难尽从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258322_comment'></div>公武至少城，寒暑一再易节，暇日，因命学官雠校之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258322_comment'></div>石本《周易·说卦》：乾，健也，以下有韩康伯注略例，有邢璹注《礼记·月令》，从唐李林甫改定者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258322_comment'></div>监本皆不取外，《周易》经文不同者五科，《尚书》十科，《毛诗》四十七科，《周礼》四十二科，《仪礼》三十一科，《礼记》三十二科，《春秋左氏传》四十六科，《公羊传》二十一科，《谷梁传》一十三科，《孝经》四科，《论语》八科，《尔雅》五科，《孟子》二十七科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258322_comment'></div>其传注不同者尤多，不可胜记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1258322_comment'></div>独计经文，犹三百二科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1258322_comment'></div>迹其文理，虽石本多误，然如《尚书·禹贡篇》『梦土作乂』，《毛诗·日月篇》『以至困穷而作是诗也』、《左氏传·昭公十七年》『六物之占，在宋、卫、陈、郑乎』、《论语·述而篇》『举一隅而示之』、《卫灵公篇》『敬其事而后食其禄』之类，未知孰是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1258322_comment'></div>先儒有改《尚书》『无颇』为《无陂》，改《春秋》『郭公』为『郭亡』者，世皆讥之，此不敢决之以臆，姑两存之，「亦镌诸乐石，附于经后不诬，将来必有能考而正之者焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1258322_comment'></div>子止又刻《古文尚书》于堂，而为之序曰：「自秦更前代法制以来，凡曰古者，后世寥乎无闻，书契之作，固始于伏牺，然变状百出，而不彼之若者，亦已多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1258322_comment'></div>《尚书》一经，独有古文在，岂非得于壁间，以圣人旧藏，而天地亦有所护，不忍使之绝灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1258322_comment'></div>中间虽遭汉巫蛊、唐天宝之害，终不能晦蚀，今犹行于人间者，岂无谓耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1258322_comment'></div>况孔子谓《尚书》以其上古之书也，当时科斗既不复见，其为隶古定此实一耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1258322_comment'></div>虽然，圣人远矣，而文字间可以概想，则古书之传，不为浪设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1258322_comment'></div>予抵少城，作《石经考异》之馀，因得此古文全编于学官，乃延士张𤈴，仿吕氏所镂本再刻诸石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1258322_comment'></div>是不徒文字足以贻世，若二《典》『曰若』、『粤󶸝』之类，学者可不知欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1258322_comment'></div>呜呼，信而好古，学于古训，乃有获，盖前牒所令，方将配《孝经》、《周易》经文之古者，同附于石经之列，以故弗克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1258322_comment'></div>第述一二，以示后之好识奇字者，又安知世无扬子云？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1258322_comment'></div>时乾道庚寅仲夏望日序」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1258322_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1177&endYear=1177')">1177年</a>　在成都，作《成都古寺名笔记》。<div id='poem_1258321' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258321' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258321?labeling=true' target='_blank'>成都古寺名笔记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1177年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258321")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258321_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258321'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258321'>成都画多名笔，散在诸寺观，而见于大圣慈寺者为多，今犹具在，总而记之左，庶几观者可考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1258321'>前寺：多宝塔壁，画地狱变相，待诏左全笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格中品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258321_comment'></div>画四天王四堵，师子国王一堵，释迦佛一堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258321_comment'></div>小壁，势至观音一十二堵，及塔上壁画西方变相阿弥陀佛共三堵，文殊普贤观音大悲如意轮共五堵，并古迹，不知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1258321'>普贤阁：阁外南壁，画南方天王一堵，赵温奇笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258321_comment'></div>画佛会一堵，五如来一堵，八菩萨释迦佛一堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258321_comment'></div>并阁后壁，画文殊普贤，北畔，五髻文殊弥勒下生北方天王，井堂内四柱上，四天王，并辛澄笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格中品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258321_comment'></div>北方肉甲天王，杜敬安笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（能格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1258321'>鲜于院：小阁上壁，画毗卢佛，待诏杜齯龟笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格下品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1258321'>百部院：过廊，画护戒神，僧知评笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1258321'>千部院：佛堂壁，画炽盛光佛，古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1258321'>白马院：佛堂，画十六罗汉，古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258321_comment'></div>近时周忘机画《潇湘图》，王逸民拟任才仲作《桃源图》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1258321'>承天院：祖堂，惠远国师像，孙知微笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258321_comment'></div>近年，院僧粉去古画，别写新像，尚馀侍者二僧，犹在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1258321'>中寺：自中三门北至水陆院，东至如意轮正觉院<span class='inlineComment2'>（系高力士同僧英干建。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258321_comment'></div>中佛殿，殿内壁画维摩居士师子国王变相，待诏左全笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格中品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258321_comment'></div>释迦佛二堵，待诏杜怀玉笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258321_comment'></div>前庑东壁，画起寺金和尚高力士像，古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258321_comment'></div>西壁，画汉孝明帝、蔡愔、秦景王遵及摩腾竺法之像，童仁益笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1258321'>文殊阁：四壁，画北方天王梵王，待诏赵温奇笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258321_comment'></div>阿弥陀佛大悲毗卢十大弟子四堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258321_comment'></div>阁外壁，画大悲三十七尊法华经验大悲菩萨四堵，东南方天王，西方天王，并待诏赵公祐笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（神格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258321_comment'></div>弥勒释迦西方变相，北方天王变相，待诏范琼笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（神格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258321_comment'></div>报身如来，待诏张腾笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258321_comment'></div>无量寿品佛，古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258321_comment'></div>东方天王，待诏赵公祐笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（神格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1258321_comment'></div>帝释，待诏赵温奇笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1258321_comment'></div>千手眼观音势至，张希古笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1258321_comment'></div>阁上周匝壁，画诸佛古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1258321'>华严阁：影壁后，画天花瑞像二，其西，待诏竹虔笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（能格上品。）</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1258321_comment'></div>其东，高道兴笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格中品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1258321_comment'></div>窗外两壁，画大悲，待诏张南本笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格中品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1258321_comment'></div>两畔小壁，画天王，并古迹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1258321_comment'></div>杜悰像，张逢笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1258321_comment'></div>泗州和尚小壁，画太子游雷山，古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1258321_comment'></div>当面四壁，王波利像，吕峣笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（能格上品。）</span>；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1258321_comment'></div>东西二方天王，帝释梵王，待诏赵温奇笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1258321_comment'></div>周匝壁，画佛像，并古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1258321'>文殊阁：院门连寺廊，画金刚神变验二堵，待诏左全笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格中品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1258321_comment'></div>院内观音堂壁，画天王帝释侍从二堵，待诏赵公祐笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（神格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_1258321'>西大悲院：佛堂内，画八明王，古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_1258321'>大将院：壁画罗汉二北方天王及大将部属并帝释梵王，共六堵，并待诏范琼笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（神格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_1258321'>药师院：连寺廊八门两壁，画千眼大悲北方天王大悲释迦变相四堵，待诏范琼笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（神格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1258321_comment'></div>殿内，释迦佛、帝释梵王部众，并古迹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1258321_comment'></div>画文殊普贤维摩无量寿西方天王十二神，共九堵，并待诏赵公祐笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（神格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1258321_comment'></div>瑞像堂周匝画像，并古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_1258321'>寺后门向上小壁，画观音，僧知评笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_1258321'>六祖院：院门北壁，地藏一堵，杜措笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（能格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1258321_comment'></div>南壁，佛会变相一堵，待诏赵忠义笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格下品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1258321_comment'></div>院内山木四堵，唐壁画，古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_1258321'>保福院：门屋，画天王二堵，赵得齐笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1258321_comment'></div>姑苏台一堵，僧惠坚笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1258321_comment'></div>避暑宫一堵，僧楚安笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（能格中品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1258321_comment'></div>小壁，画竹雀二堵，黄筌笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格中品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1258321_comment'></div>佛殿内，罗汉一堂，卢楞伽笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1258321_comment'></div>记中不载，盖自昭觉访神霄徙来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1258321_comment'></div>殿后，海山观音一堵，张南本笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格中品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1258321_comment'></div>亦昭觉移至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1258321_comment'></div>小壁，罗汉一堂，古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1258321_comment'></div>法堂上，湖山一堵，马二堵，近时郭游卿郭熙之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1258321_comment'></div>笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_62_1258321'>大轮堂：壁画大轮部属两堵，金刚二十四尊，并待诏赵温奇笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_63_1258321'>极乐院：门外壁，画散花天女，范琼笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（神格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1258321_comment'></div>大悲菩萨，左全笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格中品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1258321_comment'></div>观音大悲一堵，古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1258321_comment'></div>佛殿内，十六罗汉，卢楞伽笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_67_1258321'>四绝堂：壁画悟达国师真，常粲笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格中品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1258321_comment'></div>画彭州至德山金堂栖贤山二堵，李升笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格下品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_69_1258321'>石像院：门壁，香花菩萨二堵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1258321_comment'></div>门内，菩萨一堵，并古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1258321_comment'></div>《前记》不载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1258321_comment'></div>慧日院门壁，画奉圣国师真齐天大王，泗州和尚宗震笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1258321_comment'></div>佛堂内，十六罗汉，丘文播笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（能格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_74_1258321'>吉安院：画十二面观音，杜齯龟笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格下品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_75_1258321'>寿宁院：佛殿内四壁，画炽盛光九耀，孙知微笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1258321_comment'></div>柱上小像，知微自写其真也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1258321_comment'></div>殿内廊，画太子修行，古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_78_1258321'>东观音堂：画观音十六罗汉，李怀让笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1258321_comment'></div>《雾中山出峡图》，李升笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格下品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1258321_comment'></div>楼上，画惠远送陆道士李翱见药山，孙知微笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1258321_comment'></div>护法神，孙知微笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_82_1258321'>土地堂：孟蜀主真，古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1258321_comment'></div>战胜天王罗汉，共三堵，赵元晟笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_84_1258321'>华严院：殿壁画毗卢佛，张希正笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格中品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1258321_comment'></div>文殊普贤，古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1258321_comment'></div>观音势至五髻文殊，丘文播笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（能格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_87_1258321'>兴善院：殿内，泗州大圣一堵，常粲笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格中品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1258321_comment'></div>八明王，张南本笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1258321_comment'></div>妙格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_90_1258321'>西林院：殿内罗汉，杜措笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（能格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1258321_comment'></div>壁后，弥陀佛二，菩萨弥勒罗汉，卢楞伽笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格上品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_92_1258321'>大悲阁：画观音十堵，楞严变相一十八堵，并宗道兄弟笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1258321_comment'></div>八明王八堵，绣毬观音，并古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_94_1258321'>揭谛院：壁画释迦佛二，菩萨观音势至十六罗汉，并杜齯龟笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格下品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_95_1258321'>宝胜院：藏殿内外圣像，并古迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1258321_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_96_1258321'>弥勒院：壁画十六罗汉文殊普贤，张南本笔<span class='inlineComment2'>（妙格中品。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1258321_comment'></div>画故事山水二堵，刘国用笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1258321_comment'></div></div><div 乐山（龙游）

id='poem_sentence_3_173666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173666'>白毫从地插空碧，散烛象纬天龙惊。<div id='poem_sentence_4_173666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_173666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_173666'>我与化人中共住，镜光觌面交相呈。<div id='poem_sentence_10_173666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_173666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_173666'>言词海藏不胜赞，北峰复有金桥横。<div id='poem_sentence_13_173666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_173666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_173666'>此行且复印心地，衣有宝珠奚外营。<div id='poem_sentence_17_173666_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_173301")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_173301_comment'></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_173301'>飘然空飞五云軿，上宾寥阳留玉京。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173301_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_173301'>石炉丹气常夜明，宠光万柏森千龄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_173301_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_173301'>峡山偪仄岷江萦，洞宫福地古所铭。<div id='poem_sentence_3_173301_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_173301'>云有北阴神帝庭，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_173301", 173301, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>太阴</span>黑簿囚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_173301", 173301, "Clauses/9/Comments/1")'>鬼灵</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_4_173301_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_173301'>自从仙都启岩扃，明霞流电飞<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_173301", 173301, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>阳晶</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_173301_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_173301'>晖景下堕铄<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_173301", 173301, id='poem_sentence_7_173301_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_173301'>十仙怪奇溪女清，瑶池仙仗纷娉婷，琅璈赴节锵欲鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_8_173301_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_173301'>我来秋暑如炊蒸，汗流呀气扶枯藤。<div id='poem_sentence_9_173301_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_173301'>摩挲众迹不暇评，聊记梗概知吾曾。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_173301_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

id='poem_sentence_0_1258197_comment'></div>绍兴三十年，尝大立法禁，五贯之罪死，随行钱物全给告人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258197_comment'></div>罪赏之重，至此极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258197_comment'></div>而终弗败获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258197_comment'></div>盖溟教荒渺，客程飘忽，诚有法禁所不能及者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258197_comment'></div>访闻一舶所迁，或以万计，泉司岁课，积聚艰窘，而散落异国，终古不还，诚可为痛惜而深恨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258197_comment'></div>今法禁既不可制，盍亦循其本而救之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258197_comment'></div>臣愚欲望明诏，试令有司条具，每岁市舶所得，除官吏糜费外，实裨国用者几何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258197_comment'></div>所谓蕃货中国不可一日无者何物？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258197_comment'></div>若资国用者无几，又多非吾之急须，则何必广开招接之路！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258197_comment'></div>且以四明论之，蕃舶所赍，止于青瓷、铜器、螺头、松实及板木之类而已，皆非中国不可无之物，而诱吾泉宝以去，利害重轻，不较而判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258197_comment'></div>臣尝试妄议，以为明州一处蕃舶，岂不可以权住，姑塞漏钱之一穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258197_comment'></div>其他可以类举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258197_comment'></div>此拔本塞源，不争而善胜之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258197_comment'></div>今无法以必禁，又以为蕃货不可无，则当坐视泉宝四散而去，勿惜恨可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258197_comment'></div>惟陛下与大臣熟计而图之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1258197_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1180&endYear=1180')">1180年12月</a>　在明州，从兄成象卒，为文祭之。作品：《祭亡兄工部文》<div id='poem_1258357' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258357' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258357?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭亡兄工部文</a><span class='authorDate'>（淳熙七年十二月一日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258357")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258357_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258357'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258357'>维淳熙七年，岁次庚子，十二月己卯朔初一日，弟中大夫知明州军州事兼沿海制置使某，谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于亡兄致政运使工部之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258357_comment'></div>惟兄以履践为问学，故不载之空言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258357_comment'></div>以廉隅为事业，故无所合于时好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258357_comment'></div>非其道义，一介不取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258357_comment'></div>意所安乐，箪瓢宴如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258357_comment'></div>清净绝欲，半世尘外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258357_comment'></div>天游逍遥，八极环堵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258357_comment'></div>铁石坚忍，如苦行道人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258357_comment'></div>冰霜孤洁，如臞儒列仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258357_comment'></div>虽人仪郎位，出将使节，誉满朝野，德流江湖，视若梦境，弃焉如脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258357_comment'></div>兄之离垢遁俗久矣，故能通乎昼夜之道，安时处顺，来去如一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258357_comment'></div>其属疾也，谢医却药，弗问家事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258357_comment'></div>知不可为，则焚香盥手，翛然告终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258357_comment'></div>昔善其生，今善其死，逝者如此，可谓全归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258357_comment'></div>呜呼，是足以见先伯父与□□□□地下矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258357_comment'></div>惟我范氏，奕世同居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1258357_comment'></div>薄官离逖，咸非本心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1258357_comment'></div>向我归□□□□□□□□基，三径锄荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1258357_comment'></div>兄曰时哉，相汝经营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1258357_comment'></div>又曰老矣，与汝俱佚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1258357_comment'></div>藐是不肖，未克挂冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1258357_comment'></div>复起典州，与兄别离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1258357_comment'></div>平生屡别，盖亦屡见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1258357_comment'></div>奉遣盘门，谓我遄归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1258357_comment'></div>岂其生离，化为死别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1258357_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1258357_comment'></div>西河正东，北城稍南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1258357_comment'></div>蓝舆相过，儿童识知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1258357_comment'></div>乡之二老，独馀一翁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1258357_comment'></div>我今虽归，归亦何心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1258357_comment'></div>新图异书，谁与共阅？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1258357_comment'></div>酿成果熟，谁与共尝？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1258357_comment'></div>横塘之雪，石湖之月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1258357_comment'></div>谁其方舟？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1258357_comment'></div>吴台越城，包山洞庭，桃李之蹊，橘中之洲，谁其曳杖而行？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1258357_comment'></div>前节逢春秋，姻亲会同，惟吾伯兄之敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1258357_comment'></div>与夫冠婚丧祭，故家遗俗，凡情文百为折衷于大宗之门者，今举无适与归矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1258357_comment'></div>兄之存亡，固为范氏重轻，而白首残年，抱触目无穷之悲者，又某之所独也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1258357_comment'></div>翼翼吴都，茫茫九原，岂无他人，不如吾兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1258357_comment'></div>酹觞鄞江，与潮俱西，莫知我哀，兄其知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1258357_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1258357_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>　在明州，立春日，陪前丞相魏杞登三江亭，有诗。作品：《立春日陪魏丞相登三江亭》<div id='poem_172876' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_172876' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/172876?labeling=true' target='_blank'>立春日陪魏丞相登三江亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", id='poem_sentence_0_172876'>佳节登临始此回，聊从<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_172876", 172876, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>晻霭</span>望蓬莱。<div id='poem_sentence_0_172876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_172876'>水分江北渡头去，风自海东潮外来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_172876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_172876'>太白天寒犹带雪，十洲池暖已浮醅。<div id='poem_sentence_2_172876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_172876'>一尊往酹发船鼓，我亦归帆相次开。<div id='poem_sentence_3_172876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_172876'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_172876_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>　在明州，寄诗鹿何（伯可）。作品：《见题鹿伯可见一堂三首》<div id='poem_172599' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_172599' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/172599?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄题鹿伯可见一堂<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_172599")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_172599_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_172599'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_172599'>梦觉春闱俱转蓬，仙凡今隔玉霄东。<div id='poem_sentence_0_172599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_172599'>聊攀铁锁问何似，岂敢避堂邀盖公。<div id='poem_sentence_1_172599_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_172599'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_172599_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_173652' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_173652' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_173652_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_173652'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_173652'>生来于君一岁长，决去愧我三年迟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_173652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_173652'>今世谁不落第二，著鞭尚续堂中诗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_173652_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_465231_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_465231'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_465231'>雪溪兴尽船当回，却拟登陆游天台。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年2月</a>　在明州，除端明殿学士。一再辞免，不允。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年3月</a>　在明州，改帅江东，兼行宫留守，上疏辞。作品：《辞免知建康府劄子》<div id='poem_1258212' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258212' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258212?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免知建康府劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1181年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258212")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258212_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258212'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258212'>准尚书省劄子：「三省同奉圣旨：范成大差知建康府，疾速赴行在奏事讫之任」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258212_comment'></div>臣闻命震惊，罔知所措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258212_comment'></div>臣闻覆载二仪之至公，不独私于一物；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258212_comment'></div>爵禄众贤之所共，难并萃于非才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258212_comment'></div>臣去春蒙恩，阃制海郡，治行亡状，考幽当黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258212_comment'></div>乃二月庚子诏书，忽被误渥，职臣秘殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258212_comment'></div>臣皇惧不敢当，即已陈情控免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258212_comment'></div>俞音未下，又付留钥，中外观听，杂然其惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258212_comment'></div>凡所谓量才不肖，揣分宜休，在臣循省所当辞避之说，皆未敢缕如以渎天威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258212_comment'></div>但方陛下总核名实、登崇俊良之时，而何物么么，浃辰之间，荐污除书，未及满岁，再烦临遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258212_comment'></div>屈天地之私恩，搂众贤之所共，真才实能，于此犹惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258212_comment'></div>况如臣者，政使贪荣冒宠，岂不外惮烦啧，内虞疾颠，积此凌兢，何敢下拜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1258212_comment'></div>伏望圣慈委照孤危，收还成涣，改图硕望，俾护北门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1258212_comment'></div>则公朝不玷于选抡，小己亦宽于忧畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1258212_comment'></div>所有恩命，臣未敢祗受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1258212_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1258212_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1181')">1181年</a>　在明州，将赴建康任，游名胜之地。作品：《寺庄》《鳗井》《自育王过天单松林三十里》《将赴建康出城》《育王方丈》《妙喜泉》《明月堂》《香山》《育王望海亭》《天童三阁》<div id='poem_172196' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1181&endYear=1182')">1181-1182年</a>　在建康，有奏劄。作品：《奏住催江东军器等四劄》《措置荒政劄子》《请免收流移之人渡钱疏》<div id='poem_1258208' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258208' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258208?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞免移屯与执政答宣谕劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1176年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258208")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258208_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258208'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258208'>某昨奉钧诲，传谕上指，议欲移屯潼川、绵州大军二千人前来成都，并听成都帅臣节制等事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258208_comment'></div>窃惟成都会府，根本全蜀，而武备玩弛，卒乘单弱，若增屯大军，诚可折冲，惟是潼川、绵州两军屯戍，皆经四五十年，老身长子，各已成家，婚姻盘错，填垄相望，揆之常情，恐未免安土重迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258208_comment'></div>必先为之经画措置，曲尽其宜，使盘挈之初，免家具破散之忧，既到之后，无暴露羁旅之戚，人忘其徙，家安其旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258208_comment'></div>然后有利无害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258208_comment'></div>略计营垒支犒之费，无虑十有馀万，非一日可遽办者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258208_comment'></div>至于目下，脱有奸盗窃发一切缓急事宜有合调发去处，缘去年复再置四川制置司时，已有九月五日专降圣旨，依条具合行事务，内一项：「四川诸州奸宄夷獠之患，许从制置司审度事势，差发都统司西兵捍御」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258208_comment'></div>今来成都帅臣系兼四川制置使，遵照上件指挥，于诸处屯兵自可节制奉行，不至阙误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258208_comment'></div>所有移屯，欲乞钧慈特赐开陈，少宽限期，容某续更子细相度，并计算所费万数，条具申闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258208_comment'></div>某博询熟究，以致拜答稽缓，伏乞钧慈特赐矜恕。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1258208'></div><div id='poem_1258215' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258215' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258215?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏拨隶转般仓劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1182年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258215")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258215_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258215'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258215'>臣契勘近奉圣旨：「诸路州军应有朝廷米斛去处，专委守臣认数，桩管总司不许干预」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258215_comment'></div>并小贴子：「大军转般桩管米，依前项指挥」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258215_comment'></div>臣已恭依，将本府大军转般仓见在米斛盘到实数，拘收桩管讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258215_comment'></div>伏见目即诸处和籴米纲到仓岸者，舳舻相尾，见系本仓监官合干人交卸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258215_comment'></div>窃缘转般仓虽号建康府户部转般仓，而监官合干人及所管米斛，自来却隶淮西总领所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258215_comment'></div>今朝廷措置既将此米拨付守臣，其合干人等却仍隶总司，事体相违，难以检察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258215_comment'></div>欲望圣慈详酌，特降指挥，将转般仓拨正所隶，则守臣方可任责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258215_comment'></div>实系经久利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258215_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1258215_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1258214' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1258214' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1258214?labeling=true' target='_blank'>奏乞蠲免大军仓欠负劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1182年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 南宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(31372, "南宋", "范成大", "poem_title_1258214")'>范成大</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1258214_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1258214'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1258214'>臣比奉圣旨，盘量总领所大军仓储积米数，今已毕事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1258214_comment'></div>通计净欠八万六千馀斛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1258214_comment'></div>总领所见将合干人送本府左院根勘，照条断罪备偿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1258214_comment'></div>臣窃考之，大军一仓，创于绍兴五年，至今已得四十六年，前后支过军粮，无虑二千馀万斛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1258214_comment'></div>从前即不曾除豁，冒头蠹耗，亦不曾如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1258214_comment'></div>盘量到底，即上件欠数，犹不为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1258214_comment'></div>纵有情弊，恐非尽出于目即。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1258214_comment'></div>合干人等，若绳以三尺，则根株断罪徒配，犹为轻典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1258214_comment'></div>案后备偿估籍，不足充数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1258214_comment'></div>缘情有可矜，理有可察，臣辄冒昧奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1258214_comment'></div>伏望天恩详酌，特降指挥施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1258214_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1258214_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript:
